String.Source: Ha, I can't see my toes. Now I know how a Jarl feels after dinner.
String.Dest: 哈，我看不见我的脚尖了。现在我终于知道一个领主晚饭后是什么感觉了。

String.Source: That tickles. You and your crazy magic.
String.Dest: 好痒……你和你那疯狂的法术。

String.Source: A healing spell. Thank you, brave companion.
String.Dest: 治疗法术。谢谢你，勇敢的同伴。

String.Source: Wait...why are we fighting?
String.Dest: 等一下……我们为什么打架来着？

String.Source: A courage spell, is it? (Laughs) Do I look like I coward to you?
String.Dest: 壮胆法术，诶？ (笑)你看我像胆小鬼吗？

String.Source: I've heard about these bandits. They use these rocks to trap and kill peddlers. Now, we could find another route, but I say this way's more fun.
String.Dest: 我听说过那些强盗，用石头和陷阱害死路人。现在我们可以选择另找条路，不过要我说还是这条路更有意思。

String.Source: These aren't ordinary bandits, traveler. It takes guts to kill a mammoth. Be ready for a fight.
String.Dest: 这些不是那些普通的盗贼，旅行者。杀死一头猛犸象需要极大勇气。准备好战斗吧。

String.Source: Be ready, traveler. There'll likely be more Draugr inside. Necromancers are too cowardly to fight on their own.
String.Dest: 做好准备，旅行者。这里面大概有更多的尸鬼。亡灵术士们都很懦弱以至于他们都不敢亲自上阵去战斗。

String.Source: Another archer on the walkway. Looks like the way up is to the right. Sounds like a group of them talking, we may be able to catch 'em off guard.
String.Dest: 走道上又有一个弓箭手。看起来上去的那条路是往右边去的。好像有一群人在说话，也许我们能给他们来个偷袭。

String.Source: All these goons and locked doors must make this bandit feel real safe. But as of right now, his ransoming days are over.
String.Dest: 上锁的门和住在一起的狐朋狗友让这些土匪感觉相当安全。但是到此为止了。他们打家劫舍的日子到头了。

String.Source: This looks like a spider den, but spiders don't attack caravans. Let's press forward. Maybe one of these adventurers managed to survive.
String.Dest: 这看起来就像个蜘蛛巢穴，但蜘蛛是不会攻击篷车的。让我们走近看一看，说不定还有些冒险者在里面挣扎求生。

String.Source: See that ledge to your left? That's probably a lookout. Rattle those bone chimes, and this whole cave will know we're here.
String.Dest: 看见你左边的那个突出的地方了吗，那可能是个了望台。让那些骨质编钟咯吱作响的话，那整个山洞都会知道我们在这儿了。

String.Source: Something dark and evil is waiting behind those fences. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 一些黑暗和邪恶之物隐藏在暗处虎视眈眈。提高警惕。

String.Source: There's danger ahead, but it looks like this way's the back door. Might be able to catch the bandits napping.
String.Dest: 前面有危险，不过看来这条路是后门。或许可以打强盗们个措手不及。

String.Source: Watch your step, traveler. Looks like that note about the traps wasn't lying.
String.Dest: 注意脚下，旅行者。看起来这本笔记上写的陷阱不是空穴来风。

String.Source: Okay, traveler. Let's follow the light, and cut down everything in its path.
String.Dest: 好的，旅行者。让我们一起沿着光线,把路上所有东西都了结掉。

String.Source: There's a big one! What do you think they feed it? The easy answer is adventurers, but who knows! Maybe magic spiders need a special diet.
String.Dest: 那边有个超大的！你觉得他们是吃什么长大的？最可能是冒险者，但谁知道呢！或许这些魔法蜘蛛需要特殊的菜单。

String.Source: It's always good to reunite a dog with its master. Even better if it comes at the expense of a cult of vampires!
String.Dest: 能够让狗跟它的主人团聚总是令人开心的，更别说是拿一群吸血鬼作为祭品。

String.Source: Those were spider eggs outside, and a dead mammoth beside them. Whatever's in this cave promises to be as huge as it is ugly.
String.Dest: 外面有蜘蛛卵，旁边是头死掉的长毛象。山洞里不管是什么肯定都又大又丑。

String.Source: Pressure plates. Probably rigged with all sorts of traps. My advice? Don't step on the rigged ones!
String.Dest: 压板。也许还连接着其他陷阱。我的建议？别踩！

String.Source: There's one of the witches. It doesn't look like we can take her by surprise. Lucky for us, we only need to take her head.
String.Dest: 那儿就有一个女巫。看来不太好偷袭。不过好在，咱们要的只是她的脑袋，怎么杀死倒是无关紧要。

String.Source: Hm...it looks like they didn't hear us knock. What a shame. Let's rattle a bone chime or two.
String.Dest: 哎……似乎他们没听到我们敲门啊。真遗憾啊。我们不如敲敲骨灰坛吧。

String.Source: Careful. These blades may be old, but they look sharp. Very dangerous, especially if you have a tail!
String.Dest: 小心。这些刀刃可能很旧，但是它们看起来很锋利。特别是如果你有一条尾巴的话，它们会非常的危险！

String.Source: This is a place called "Greywater Grotto." Huh. I guess by "Greywater" they meant "Ice."
String.Dest: 这就是被叫做 "灰水石窟" 的地方吧。恩。我猜 "灰水" 指的是 "冰"。

String.Source: The area in front is well lit, but this tunnel is dark. I think that vampire would look good with an arrow sticking out of his neck.
String.Dest: 前面灯火通明，但是这个洞里却一片漆黑。我认为那个吸血鬼的脖子被箭刺穿之后看起来会很不错。

String.Source: Should we flip a coin, traveler? Heads takes on the mages, tails gets whatever's coming out of these coffins.
String.Dest: 我们应该抛硬币吗，旅行者？正面就去找那些法师，反面就去料理那些棺材里跑出来的玩意儿。

String.Source: Smell that? Blood and death. Theirs will come soon enough.
String.Dest: 闻到了吗？鲜血和死亡。它们即将来临。

String.Source: That's an impressive piece of rock! It reminds me of tales of old towers that pierce the sky, and every level has a new challenge.
String.Dest: 这真是块让人印象深刻的石头！这使我想起了那个古老的高塔刺穿天空，每一层都有一个新挑战的故事。

String.Source: By the Hist! Is that the Eldergleam? Now that's impressive.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这就是古藤圣所？真是叫人印象深刻。

String.Source: If High Hrothgar is the Throat of the World, this must be the collarbone. Still, it's a nice view.
String.Dest: 如果说高吼峰是世界之喉，那这里一定是她的锁骨。而且，这里的景致真不错。

String.Source: Not everyday you find this in your basement. What are they digging for? I don't see any ore. But I do see a corpse.
String.Dest: 你不是每天都能在你家地下室里找到这玩意儿的。他们挖什么呢？我什么矿石也没有看到，但我见到了一具死尸。

String.Source: I think I can see that old tree from here. We're a long way from Morthal, traveler, and a long way from home.
String.Dest: 我想我可以在这看到那颗老树,我们离莫萨尔城还有很长一段路要走，旅行者，并且我们离家还有很长的一段路。

String.Source: By the Hist, will you look at that! In Black Marsh, you learn to fear ripples on the water, but what came out here is a sight to behold.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上，看看那个！在黑沼泽，你会学着害怕水面的涟漪，但是在这出现的东西简直就是奇观。

String.Source: An ancient Dwarven city built into the rock. And judging by that crossbow by the gate, they probably weren't too fond of their neighbors.
String.Dest: 一座建在岩石里的古代矮人城市。看那些大门边上的石弩，他们可不怎么喜欢周围的邻居啊。

String.Source: Is this where Karliah's been hiding out the past 25 years? Are we sure she isn't insane?
String.Dest: 这就是卡莱雅在过去的25年里一直躲着的地方？我们真能确定她没疯吗？

String.Source: For once, I agree with playing the thief's role. Stick to the shadows, traveler. No need for bloodshed.
String.Dest: 这次我建议咱们可以玩玩盗贼流。旅行者，这次我们可以隐藏在阴影中，没必要跟以往一样血淋淋的。

String.Source: By the Hist! This thing can steal starlight? Well, if the weather keeps on like it has, I don't think we'll know the difference!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这玩意可以吸收星光？如果天气再这么保持下去，我看区别不区别的就没意义了！

String.Source: Vampires. If Ula-Wei were here, he'd find his way up those stairs and take out any archers. A straight fight's going to be a lot tougher.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼。假如乌拉卫在这的话, 他会找到自己的办法登上台阶并且跟弓箭手谈谈人生。如果硬上的话这场仗会打得更艰难.

String.Source: That coffin must be where Mikrul sleeps. At least there's plenty of room to fight. Thank the Gods this Draugr likes open spaces!
String.Dest: 那口棺材一定就是米尔库最后沉睡的地方了。至少这里还有足够的空间来战斗。感谢老天，还好这只尸鬼喜欢开阔的地方。

String.Source: I know you want to stop and enjoy the view, and I agree, it's breathtaking. But we owe it to Valdr and his friends to chop some wood first.
String.Dest: 我知道你想停下来欣赏景色，我也一样，这景象太惊人了。但我们还对瓦尔卓和他的朋友们有所亏欠，应该先帮他们砍些木头。

String.Source: This tunnel must have brought safe passage to thousands of travelers to and from the White River. We walk in the footsteps of history.
String.Dest: 这条隧道一定给数千从白河往来的旅行者们带来了安全。我们正沿着历史的足迹前行。

String.Source: By the Hist! The Nords can build a stage. Best of all, unlike in the Marsh, the creeks and waterfalls here aren't filled with tar.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这些诺德人竟然能建一座竞技场。最重要的是，这里的溪流和瀑布不像沼泽那样充满沥青。

String.Source: A Dwemer Museum. You mean to tell me these pieces of scrap metal are considered artifacts? Ha! That's a tail-slapper if I ever heard one.
String.Dest: 一个锻莫博物馆。你说这些破铜烂铁是艺术品？哈哈哈，你敢更搞笑点么？！

String.Source: By the Hist! Now that's impressive.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！真是叫人印象深刻。

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Remarkable.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市。真是不同寻常。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: By the Hist, look. A Dwarven city.
String.Dest: 哦，我的天哪。一座矮人城市。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I guess there's only one way to find out.
String.Dest: 据传锻莫遗迹都是闹鬼的。我猜要想搞清真相只有一种办法吧。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of danger inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看呐。一个山洞。我希望里面够危险。

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。它有数千年之久了吧。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: A cave. What will we find? Trouble, or treasure?
String.Dest: 有个洞穴。到里面会发现什么呢？麻烦？还是宝藏？

String.Source: There's a cave here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 这有个洞穴，咱们进去看看？

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这儿有个洞穴。野兽，强盗，说不定都有。

String.Source: A Dwarven ruin! Wait, you want to go inside? (Laughs) Very well. If the future promises mortals death, then we ought to slay it before it makes good.
String.Dest: 一个锻莫遗迹！等下，你想进去？（笑）赞，如果未来已为凡人的死亡许下诺言，那就让我们在命运达成愿望之前先宰了他！

String.Source: A Dwarven ruin! Wait, you want to go inside? (Laughs) Very well.
String.Dest: 一个矮人遗迹！等等，你想进去？（笑）好吧。

String.Source: The old Nord ruins are like a swamp of traps and stone. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 这个诺德遗迹简直就是石头和陷阱的集中营……小心。

String.Source: A cave. Dark place, dark tidings.
String.Dest: 一个山洞。坏地方，坏消息。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: Sure! Where would you like to move?
String.Dest: 当然！你想搬到哪去?

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: So that's it! We're married. From now on, we don't fight for glory, for boon, or even honor. We fight for each other.
String.Dest: 成了！我们结婚了！从今以后，我们的战斗不是为了荣耀、为了尊严或是正义……我们是为彼此而战！

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: All that's left now is deciding on where to live.
String.Dest: 剩下的就是决定生活在哪里。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sure thing. A little homemade soup, fresh from the swamp.
String.Dest: 当然每次。一碗家常热汤，新鲜的沼泽料理。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Yeah, it turns out I'm pretty good at this selling thing. Must be my lizard charm. Here you go.
String.Dest: 恩啊，事实上我挺擅长卖东西的。一定是因为我蜥蜴的魅力。这是你的份儿。

String.Source: So this is home. It's almost too good to be true. Maybe I'll start a store, to keep me busy when I'm not adventuring.
String.Dest: 家……甜蜜的家……我真的回家了……我想开个小店，每天忙来忙去进货出货而不是打生打死。

String.Source: Welcome back, love. How many bandits did you kill today?
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，亲爱的。你今天又杀了多少强盗啊？

String.Source: You know, cleaning and sweeping really is harder than slaying trolls. The dust, it just keeps coming back for more.
String.Dest: 你懂的，打扫真的比杀死巨魔要难得多。这些该死的灰尘只会不断的越来越多。

String.Source: Not a problem. Why mess with a good thing.
String.Dest: 没问题。为什么要和好事混在一起。

String.Source: That is exactly what I was asking. Do you find me to be an interesting person?
String.Dest: 这就是我刚才在问的。你应该觉得我很有趣吧，嗯哼？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Are you interested in me?
String.Dest: 你对我感兴趣吗？

String.Source: Sure, why not! I think I'm ready to settle down. Is that what you want?
String.Dest: 当然，为什么不呢！我已经准备好定居了。你想这样么？

String.Source: You can start by saying yes.
String.Dest: 你可以从说“是”开始。

String.Source: And here I thought you were going to say no. (Laughs) I've never felt my heart beat so fast!
String.Dest: 而现在我觉得你要说拒绝的话了。(笑)我从没感觉过自己的心跳得这么快！

String.Source: You can start by saying yes.
String.Dest: 你可以从说“是”开始。

String.Source: If I remember it right, I think all that's left now is to tell the priest in Mara. I'll leave that to you.
String.Dest: 如果我没记错的话，就剩下一件事没做了……告诉玛拉祭司。拜托了。

String.Source: Is that an Amulet of Mara? You should be careful with that. I might just get the wrong idea.
String.Dest: 那是马拉的护身符么？你可得小心点那玩意。我会想歪的。

String.Source: Do you think Indrel will show up to the wedding? She'lll probably end up sleeping on the roof.
String.Dest: 你认为英卓尔会出现在婚礼上吗?她可能到头来还是在屋顶上睡大觉。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: In a world of liars, sellswords and turncoats, you stand above. You bring honor to the name, adventurer. Here, a small token of my appreciation.
String.Dest: 你真是个世界顶尖的骗子，佣兵和叛徒。你给这些职业添了光。冒险家。拿着这些钱吧，略表我的心意。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Hold your ground! Keep your hands up!
String.Dest: 坚守岗位！把手举高点儿！

String.Source: Send that milk-drinker back to the farm!
String.Dest: 把那乳臭未干的小子带回农场！

String.Source: Twelve septims on my partner!
String.Dest: 12个金币押我的搭档胜！

String.Source: Fight!
String.Dest: 上啊！!

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住，动起来 ！坚持住，动起来 ！

String.Source: Put that snowback to sleep, traveler!
String.Dest: 把那个外地佬放倒，旅行者！

String.Source: Then good luck, my friend. I'm glad to know the world is safer with you in it.
String.Dest: 那就祝你好运吧，我的朋友。天际有你更美好。

String.Source: And good luck to you as well. The next time you come back to the Rift, maybe our paths will cross once more.
String.Dest: 祝你也好运。下次你回来裂谷城，也许我们的命运会再次交汇。

String.Source: The world isn't dangerous enough for me. It could do with more danger.
String.Dest: 我不觉得这世界对我来说有什么危险。再危险也不怕。

String.Source: Maybe for an adventurer that sounds like a paradise. But for a child without a voice, it's anything but.
String.Dest: 也许对于一个探险家来说那听起来像是是天堂。但是对于一个无法说话的小孩子来说，那就另当别论了。

String.Source: I could come with you.
String.Dest: 我可以跟你一起来。

String.Source: No, you go on and see this Thane back to his home. Maybe when you're finished, you'll find your way back here, and we'll look together.
String.Dest: 不，你去盯着那个男爵回到他的家里。也许在你完成任务后，你会找到回来的路，然后我们再一起看。

String.Source: Why Riften? Are you going to check the orphanage?
String.Dest: 为什么是裂谷城? 难道你打算去孤儿院看看？

String.Source: I thought I'd make a stop there and ask the caretaker if they've seen him. Maybe he was tired of traveling, and just wanted a normal life.
String.Dest: 我想我会停下来问问看守卫有没有人见过他。也许他厌倦了旅行，只是想要一个正常的生活。

String.Source: Why Riften? Are you going to check the orphanage?
String.Dest: 为什么是裂谷城? 难道你打算去孤儿院看看？

String.Source: So we part ways once more, traveler. Next time you come back to the Rift, ask for the lizard in mourning.
String.Dest: 所以我们再次分手吧，旅行者。下次回裂谷城的时候，记得去找哀悼的蜥蜴。

String.Source: All that matters is that the future King is safe.
String.Dest: 最重要的是未来的国王仍然安全。

String.Source: So you're convinced of that, hm? I admit, it takes a strong man to live through something like this and still keep your head.
String.Dest: 所以你相信这个，哼？我得承认，只有坚强的人，才能头脑清醒的挺过这种事情。

String.Source: Look at it this way. If we do, it'll just mean more adventures.
String.Dest: 这样来想这件事：如果我们这么做了，只会意味着更多的冒险。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well said, traveler. Now that's the kind of bleak, worrisome future I can get behind.
String.Dest: （笑）说的好，旅行者。现在我能看得出那个杯具的令人担忧的未来了。

String.Source: Don't worry. This torturer can't hide forever.
String.Dest: 不用急。这个施暴者藏不了多久。

String.Source: You're right. He can't hide. Not from us.
String.Dest: 你说得对。他逃不出我们的手掌心。

String.Source: That's up to Larsdon. After this, we'll be lucky if he isn't the new Pelagius.
String.Dest: 那就看劳斯登的意思了。不管咋说，他如果不是新的佩拉吉奥斯那我们真是撞大运了。

String.Source: You really know how to inspire confidence in your friends, don't you? Are you sure it's not too late to go after that prisoner?
String.Dest: 你很会激起同伴的自信，不是么？你确定追逐那个囚犯不会显得太迟?

String.Source: I agree. Whenever we meet, it's never by chance. Sometimes it's friendship, other times it's fate. This time it could be the latter.
String.Dest: 我同意。我们无论何时见面都不仅仅是运气使然。有时我们是因为友谊的连接，有时是因为仇恨的关联。这次……应该是后者吧。

String.Source: This can't be a coincidence. The person we're looking for has to be there.
String.Dest: 这不可能是个巧合。我们找的人一定在这。

String.Source: In any case, we can head straight west from here. Once we hit the mountain, just look for the columns with the eagle heads.
String.Dest: 在任何情况下，我们可以直接从这里向西。一旦我们爬上了山，就去找那些刻有鹰首的柱子。

String.Source: This can't be a coincidence. The person we're looking for has to be there.
String.Dest: 这不可能是个巧合。我们找的人一定在这。

String.Source: I wasn't aware these were military men, traveler. Bandits, more like it. And the king of bandits is no king of mine.
String.Dest: 我没注意到这些是当兵的，旅行者，要说像强盗还差不多。强盗的大王可不是我的大王。

String.Source: They have every right. The farmers are obligated to help military garrisons.
String.Dest: 他们拥有充分的权利。农民有义务帮助驻军。

String.Source: In any case, we can head straight west from here. Once we hit the mountain, just look for the columns with the eagle heads.
String.Dest: 在任何情况下，我们可以直接从这里向西。一旦我们爬上了山，就去找那些刻有鹰首的柱子。

String.Source: They have every right. The farmers are obligated to help military garrisons.
String.Dest: 他们拥有充分的权利。农民有义务帮助驻军。

String.Source: I guess Gren is as much a High King as Ulfric.
String.Dest: 我想格伦跟乌佛瑞克一样都有资格做至高王。

String.Source: Ha, maybe they ought to rule together. You know what they say, two bad kings are better than one!
String.Dest: 哈哈，也许他们该一起统治。你知道他们说什么吗， 两个坏国王，总比一个强！

String.Source: I guess Gren is as much a High King as Ulfric.
String.Dest: 我想格伦跟乌佛瑞克一样都有资格做至高王。

String.Source: In any case, we can head straight west from here. Once we hit the mountain, just look for the columns with the eagle heads.
String.Dest: 在任何情况下，我们可以直接从这里向西。一旦我们爬上了山，就去找那些刻有鹰首的柱子。

String.Source: Sounds like the Blood of Skyrim alright.
String.Dest: 这听起来像是天际血宴，对吧？

String.Source: So what are they, a cult? All the more reason for the three of us to work together.
String.Dest: 所以这是啥？一个仪式？各种让咱们三个在一起奋斗的原因么？

String.Source: In any case, we can head straight west from here. Once we hit the mountain, just look for the columns with the eagle heads.
String.Dest: 在任何情况下，我们可以直接从这里向西。一旦我们爬上了山，就去找那些刻有鹰首的柱子。

String.Source: Sounds like the Blood of Skyrim alright.
String.Dest: 这听起来像是天际血宴，对吧？

String.Source: We could try walking in opposite directions.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着走反方向。

String.Source: Sure, but Skyrim's like one big circle. Eventually, we'll end up right back where it all began, in the pond the Nords call a marsh.
String.Dest: 没错，但是天际省就好像一个巨大的循环。最终我们都将回到开始的地方，那些诺德人称之为沼泽的池子里。

String.Source: We could try walking in opposite directions.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着走反方向。

String.Source: So tell me, what brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 告诉我吧，是什么风把你吹到裂谷城来的?

String.Source: I know, I'm sick of seeing your face.
String.Dest: 我知道，我厌恶看见你的脸。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, drink a cure potion, friend. Trying to avoid each other is like fighting through the swamp. The more you struggle, the more you sink.
String.Dest: (笑声)好了好了，消消气。想避开别人就像逃离沼泽一样。你越是挣扎，下沉越快。

String.Source: I know, I'm sick of seeing your face.
String.Dest: 我知道，我厌恶看见你的脸。

String.Source: So tell me, what brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 告诉我吧，是什么风把你吹到裂谷城来的?

String.Source: I wouldn't have it any other way, friend.
String.Dest: 我没有其他方式，朋友。

String.Source: Neither would I. Traveling across Skyrim just isn't the same without you.
String.Dest: 我也不会。如果没有你的话，在天际省旅行的光景就完全不同了。

String.Source: I wouldn't have it any other way, friend.
String.Dest: 我没有其他方式，朋友。

String.Source: So tell me, what brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 告诉我吧，是什么风把你吹到裂谷城来的?

String.Source: Well, traveler, try as we might, it looks like we can't go more than fifty paces without running into each other!
String.Dest: 那么,旅者,假设我们可以做到，这看上去就算我们不撞到对方我们也根本走不了五十步！

String.Source: Only they all dress the same, and they've been forcing the farms to ration them supplies by order of the "High King."
String.Dest: 只有他们衣着一样,他们被押到农场以 "至高王"的命令进行配给。

String.Source: Let's just hope we don't end up on the wrong end of this trade.
String.Dest: 祈祷这次交易咱们别吃亏吧……

String.Source: They may not understand, but I know you will. Ever since Dalum-Ei died, I keep thinking back to that day, and the child that was spared.
String.Dest: 他们不会懂，但你一定会懂。达卢姆‧艾死了，我却一直在想着那天的一幕幕情境，以及那个活下来的孩子。

String.Source: Sometimes I feel like this boy, he's the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 有时，我觉得，这个男孩，是我们最后一点荣耀。我得陪着他确保安全。

String.Source: And seeing that temple of blood, it was a reminder of how dangerous this world can be.
String.Dest: 看着那座鲜血的神殿，就能随时提醒人们记得这个世界有多么的危险。

String.Source: Let's go, traveler! He couldn't have gotten far!
String.Dest: 快走吧，旅行者！他现在还没跑远！

String.Source: Safe travels, all of you.
String.Dest: 你们都要注意安全。

String.Source: I'm sorry Thane, but you three will have to go on without me. I have business in Riften.
String.Dest: 抱歉，男爵。但是我不能陪你们三个继续走下去了。我要去裂谷城办点事。

String.Source: Maybe. There's been talk of a group of bandits holed up in an old barrow to the west of here.
String.Dest: 可能，有消息说有一组强盗隐藏在此处西边的古坟。

String.Source: I don't know, healer. It seems like he only got away because we let him.
String.Dest: 我不知道啊，治疗师，看起来他逃走的唯一原因就是我们放的。

String.Source: Wait! I think one of them's missing! Up front! I swear by the Hist, there was someone there!
String.Dest: 等等！我看他们少了一个人！前面上方！我对希斯特发誓那儿绝对有人！

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: The honor is mine, Thane. Or should I say king?
String.Dest: 那是我的荣幸，男爵。或者我应该称您为王？

String.Source: On the brink of death. It doesn't look like magic will be enough.
String.Dest: 在死亡的边缘。它可不是看起来像个戏法就够了。

String.Source: Plus their eyes and tongues have been cut out. What kind of sick ritual is going on here?
String.Dest: 外加他们的眼睛被挖掉，舌头被割掉了。这种恶心的仪式是怎么回事？

String.Source: By the Hist!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！

String.Source: Werewolves! Didn't you say this man breeds them?
String.Dest: 狼人！难道你没有说过这个家伙在饲养它们？

String.Source: Good. I don't think I have any scales left to shave.
String.Dest: 好的。我想我没有什么需要梳理的鳞片啦。

String.Source: The one time the Gods listen to my request, and it's this of all things.
String.Dest: 只要圣灵能听我一个请求，那就是这个了吧。

String.Source: It looks like the High King's been taking more than his fair share from the locals.
String.Dest: 似乎至高王一直以来都从当地人手里夺取了过多的东西。

String.Source: What did I tell you, priest? Go where the action is. It never fails.
String.Dest: 牧师，我怎么说的？去参加那个行动。不会失败的。

String.Source: None. But I know that's where the Draugr are, and it'd be a shame not to slay a few on the way.
String.Dest: 没人，但我知道那里有一大堆的尸鬼……不干掉几个都对不起自己的良心。

String.Source: This is a large barrow, traveler. I suggest we start with the catacombs.
String.Dest: 这座墓很大，旅行者。我建议我们先从陵寝开始吧。

String.Source: Maybe he's just lonely. Have you considered that?
String.Dest: 他大概很孤独，你有考虑过他的感受么？

String.Source: You mean another one?
String.Dest: 你是说另外一个？

String.Source: If he's a former Thane, then he isn't all that important anymore, is he? Unless there's something else you're hiding.
String.Dest: 如果他是前任领主的话，他就不是那么重要了，不是吗？除非你隐藏了别的什么。

String.Source: I almost feel sorry for those old heroes. One night in that stink, and even Ysgramor is going to wish he died a coward!
String.Dest: 我差点就要因为那些古代英雄感到悲哀了。那些臭气熏天的历史，就连伊斯格拉谟都希望那个弱鸡就这么消失了得了！

String.Source: Bleeding wind? That I don't know. If it was breaking wind, we'd be talking about Arnwulf, but I take it he's doing that in Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 血腥的风?那我不知道。如果是破碎的风,我们是在讨论阿恩武夫,但我认为他在松嘉德忙活着呢.

String.Source: (Laughs) I suppose I could, thief, but then there'd be no reason to fight!
String.Dest: (笑声)我想我可以，盗贼，但是我没有理由去战斗啊！

String.Source: I don't really plan myself. It's more fun living dangerously.
String.Dest: 我从不做什么计划。还是过着有悬念的日子比较开心。

String.Source: So did I, for a time. I thought I was strong enough to survive anything. But then I realized it wasn't just my life on the line.
String.Dest: 我也是。有那么一段时间，我以为自己强大到足以从任何东西手中存活。但紧接着，我意识到有危险的不仅是我的生命。

String.Source: I don't really plan myself. It's more fun living dangerously.
String.Dest: 我从不做什么计划。还是过着有悬念的日子比较开心。

String.Source: And I didn't want to be the one to let the company down.
String.Dest: 我可不想成为让自己的同伴失望的那个人。

String.Source: Smart. Best to be prepared for whatever comes.
String.Dest: 聪明。常备不懈，防患未然嘛。

String.Source: You sound like Dalum-Ei. I was always the least prepared among us, and he made it known to everyone.
String.Dest: 你听上去就像达卢姆‧艾。我总是我们之中准备最少的，而他总是把这件事让所有人都知道。

String.Source: Smart. Best to be prepared for whatever comes.
String.Dest: 聪明。常备不懈，防患未然嘛。

String.Source: But the words didn't sink in until that night near the Dunmer village. That's when I realized it wasn't just about me.
String.Dest: 可那些不知所云的话直到在暗精灵村庄附近度过的那晚才有了解答。那时候我才明白不光是我一个人的事。

String.Source: Make sure to stop by the alchemist's shop as well.
String.Dest: 别忘了顺路去一趟炼金药材铺。

String.Source: Way ahead of you. Got health potions for when I get hit, and stamina potions for when I don't.
String.Dest: 早就想到了。当我被打中时就用治疗药剂，没打中时就用精力药剂吧。

String.Source: Make sure to stop by the alchemist's shop as well.
String.Dest: 别忘了顺路去一趟炼金药材铺。

String.Source: If only I was faster and in better shape, I could spend it on an ale instead! Ha-ha-ha!
String.Dest: 如果我再快点，外形再狂拽霸酷一点，我就会被粉丝热情的麦芽酒淹死吧！哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！

String.Source: From Grelka? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 从格瑞卡那边？你是在开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Ha, that would explain the empty stall! But it doesn't matter if she's here or in the void, I can't get her voice out of my head.
String.Dest: 哈，那样的话这空空如也的畜栏就解释得通了！可这不是她是死是活的问题，她的声音在我脑子里挥之不去。

String.Source: Grelka's dead. You won't be buying anything from her.
String.Dest: 格瑞卡死掉了，你再也没法买她的东西了。

String.Source: From Grelka? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 从格瑞卡那边？你是在开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Grelka's dead. You won't be buying anything from her.
String.Dest: 格瑞卡死掉了，你再也没法买她的东西了。

String.Source: You know, "Protect yourself right, buy armor from Grelka!"
String.Dest: 你知道的，“真正的保护自己，从格瑞卡那里买盔甲！”

String.Source: From Grelka? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 从格瑞卡那边？你是在开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Well, usually the dumber they look, the cheaper their prices! But this one, she's not as cheap as she looks.
String.Dest: 是啊，一般来讲，看起来越笨的，价格越便宜！不过这个，她可不像她看起来那么便宜。

String.Source: Where are you headed? Perhaps I can be of some help.
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？也许我能帮把手。

String.Source: A group of bandits have been rumored to be ransoming children off over in Mistwatch. I thought it might be worth taking a look.
String.Dest: 据说有一群强盗在迷雾塔楼拐卖小孩。我想这里值得去看一下。

String.Source: All right. Let's go to Mistwatch.
String.Dest: 好吧。我们一起去迷雾塔楼。

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. Even if we don't find the boy, it'll be worth the trip to clear that place of bandits.
String.Dest: 感谢你，旅行者。就算我们没有找到男孩，这一次清扫强盗的旅程仍是有意义的。

String.Source: Where are you headed? Perhaps I can be of some help.
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？也许我能帮把手。

String.Source: Still no news on the child?
String.Dest: 还没有关于孩子的消息吗？

String.Source: Nothing yet. But I'll let you know if that changes.
String.Dest: 没事。有变故的话我会知会你的。

String.Source: Any word on the child?
String.Dest: 关于孩子有什么要说的吗？

String.Source: Still no news on the child?
String.Dest: 还没有关于孩子的消息吗？

String.Source: No, but I did run into one of your friends.
String.Dest: 没有，但我确实遇到了你的一个朋友。

String.Source: Still no news on the child?
String.Dest: 还没有关于孩子的消息吗？

String.Source: A blind Redguard, claiming to be your blood relative. She asked about you before heading over to the Bunkhouse.
String.Dest: 一个盲眼的红卫人，说是你的直系亲属。她问过你的事之后就去工坊了。

String.Source: You can stop by and say hello, but I suggest keeping your hands on your coin purse.
String.Dest: 你当然可以停下来打招呼，但请把手放在口袋里捏紧钱包。

String.Source: Still no news on the child?
String.Dest: 还没有关于孩子的消息吗？

String.Source: And you do his memory proud. Thank you.
String.Dest: 你做的会让他回忆起来都感到骄傲。谢谢你。

String.Source: Bodan's song...by the Hist...he was here then.
String.Dest: 波登的那种歌声……呕……希斯特……呕……在上，他又……呕……回来了……呕……

String.Source: That looks like a 40 foot drop. Who knows how deep that water is. Well, there's only one way to find out!
String.Dest: 那看起来有40英尺深，谁知道这水下有多深。好吧，只有一种办法来查出来了。

String.Source: What do you think the history is behind these statues? Walking through them, it feels like we're passing into a whole new world.
String.Dest: 你对在这些雕像背后的历史有什么想法？从它们身边路过，这感觉就像我们穿进了一整个新世界。

String.Source: Kill a few Draugr, solve a few puzzles...you know, we might be getting the hang of this adventurer thing!
String.Dest: 杀几只尸鬼，解几个谜语……你知道的，也许我们就能找到当冒险者的窍门儿了！

String.Source: Those candles...it looks like some sort of dark ritual, traveler. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 那些蜡烛…看来是某种黑暗仪式，旅行者。注意防范。

String.Source: Magic spiders, huh. Usually it takes about three bottles of skooma before you see one. But not in this place.
String.Dest: 魔法蜘蛛，哼。一般来说在你喝下三瓶斯库玛之前不会轻易看到这种东西。不过在这里可不是。

String.Source: Spiders on the table, spiders on the dresser...I'm surprised there aren't a few of them in the bed! Good to see even warlocks have their limits!
String.Dest: 桌子上，有蜘蛛；台子上，有蜘蛛……床上还有很多！真是不错，原来术士也有应付不来的东西！

String.Source: Dark sorcery was at work on this table. You might want to stick a dagger in that body. Who knows if it's really dead.
String.Dest: 黑魔法正在这张桌子上起效呢。你或许想要把一把匕首插进那具尸体里。鬼才晓得那家伙到底死没死。

String.Source: By the Leviathan's tail! Look at that mist...not even the blackest swamps could make something that foul.
String.Dest: 鳄鱼尾巴在上！看看那雾…即使是最昏暗的沼泽也没法让东西腐烂到如此程度。

String.Source: There's the beacon. Watch your tail, that things looks like it could char a skeever in less than a second.
String.Dest: 这就是那个灯塔了？小心你的尾巴，我总觉得这玩意可以在一秒之内烤熟一只雪鼠……

String.Source: Foul sorcery lies beyond this door. There's no mistaking it this time.
String.Dest: 邪恶巫术就在门后. 这一次没错了。

String.Source: By the swamps of Black Marsh, look at that! I don't know what that purple egg is, but I say we charge ahead before it hatches!
String.Dest: 在黑沼泽边上，快看！虽然我不知道那个紫色的蛋是什么，但我要说我们得在它孵化之前快冲上去！

String.Source: That's a long way down. But it isn't the fall that kills you, and it isn't even the ground. It's the trolls!
String.Dest: 下到这儿来可是很长一段路。但并不是那条瀑布致你于死地的，甚至也不是这块地面，杀了你的是巨魔！

String.Source: Surprised the chief was in here by himself. In most Strongholds it's the other way around. He must've really loved to mine.
String.Dest: 真令人惊讶，首领自己来这了啊！在很多堡垒里首领是不出现的，他看起来真的喜欢挖矿啊……

String.Source: Skeleton archers, up and down the wall. I say we charge ahead and drop them before they get a chance to aim.
String.Dest: 骷髅弓箭手，城墙上到处都是。我觉得我们应该直接冲过去，在他们有机会瞄准之前干掉他们。

String.Source: It's a bit strange that there aren't more guards posted on this road.
String.Dest: 这条路上没有更多的守卫巡逻这点有些奇怪啊。

String.Source: What's the point of having an army at the front gate, if you can slip in from the side?
String.Dest: 如果你能另一个方向溜走，就算有一支军队守在前门又能怎么样？

String.Source: So this vampire lord kept his own little bowl of blood next to him while he napped.
String.Dest: 所以说这个吸血鬼领主在打瞌睡的时候都会把他盛血的小盆放在自己身边。

String.Source: Well, they do say vampires are animals. So it makes sense that they live like dogs.
String.Dest: 好吧，人们都说吸血鬼是动物的一种。难怪他们活得跟狗似的。

String.Source: These bandits should be thanking us! By the looks of these barrels, if we hadn't come along they would've starved to death!
String.Dest: 这些强盗应该感谢我们！从这些桶来看，如果我们不一起来的话他们就会被饿死！

String.Source: Look at that table. It reminds me of a story Moon-Tai told me, about a bard with severed hands who conjured them back to life to play the flute.
String.Dest: 看那种桌子。它让我想起了月尾给我讲的那个故事，一个关于断手诗人整日祈祷着能重生双臂，再度吹响他的长笛的故事。

String.Source: Of course, I didn't believe him. But unlike these bandits, I wasn't drunk on skooma.
String.Dest: 当然了，我不是相信他。但跟别的强盗不同，我也没喝醉过斯库玛。

String.Source: It's a long story.
String.Dest: 说来话长。

String.Source: I'm afraid we don't. We don't even have a company anymore.
String.Dest: 我很担心我们办不到，我们甚至连其他同伴都没有。

String.Source: (Laughs) Is that so? I would very much like to meet this Argonian, and tell him about the pretty maiden from Hammerfell!
String.Dest: (笑声) 真的吗？我很乐意去会会这位亚龙人，并且告诉他有关落锤省漂亮少女的事！

String.Source: It looks like a 40 foot drop. Who knows how deep that water is. Well, there's only one way to find out!
String.Dest: 看起来这有40英尺，鬼才知道这到底有多深。好吧，只有一个办法能让我们知道这究竟有多深！

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Of course! What are items but things to be shared amongst friends!
String.Dest: 当然了！好东西就要一起分享啊！

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Sure. What do you need?
String.Dest: 当然，你需要什么？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Alright, let's trade.
String.Dest: 好啊，来嘛。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你有什么要我拿的？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Sure, I'll shoulder some of your burden!
String.Dest: 当然，我会替你分担一些！

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Of course! How can I help?
String.Dest: 当然！要帮忙吗？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Sure, I can take something for you.
String.Dest: 当然，我可以给你一些东西。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Name it, and it shall be done.
String.Dest: 起个名字吧，这事儿一定要做。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Not a problem, brave adventurer, if there is one thing I do well, it's standing guard.
String.Dest: 没问题，勇敢的冒险者。如果说有一件事我做得最好的话，那就是站岗了。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: All right love. Should you need me again, I'll be home.
String.Dest: 好吧亲爱的。如果你还需要我帮忙，到家里来找我。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I thank you for your company. If the Hist should guide our paths together once more, you have my blade. Knight's honor, swamp's honor.
String.Dest: 我很感激有你相伴。如果希斯特愿意再为我们指引方向，我站在你这边，以沼泽和骑士的荣誉起誓。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: (Laughs) Are you sure this time?
String.Dest: （笑声）你确定现在吗？

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Sure.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: Need me to do something?
String.Dest: 需要我做些什么吗？

String.Source: Lead brave one, and I will follow.
String.Dest: 你勇敢你先走啊，我就在后面跟着就好了。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: That's impossible.
String.Dest: 这不可能。

String.Source: Can't be done.
String.Dest: 无法完成。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: A passageway like this is a double-edged sword. It's a good escape route, but it's also an open invitation to assassins.
String.Dest: 这样的通道有利有弊。虽然它利于逃跑，但也易进入杀手。

String.Source: I like the way this Redguard thinks. Charge ahead, take 'em down, and sort out the pieces.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个红卫人的作风。冲上去，干掉他，收拾好。

String.Source: Your aunt was a true knight, Golldir. It took a lot of courage to come in here alone. Even more to leave you behind.
String.Dest: 你的伯母是位真正的骑士，高迪尔。独自到这儿就需要很大的勇气，更别说要将你抛在身后了。

String.Source: A warm fire, wine and cheese. Looks like whoever runs this bandit crew isn't too bright. You never want your sentries to feel comfortable.
String.Dest: 温暖的炉子，酒还有奶酪。看来这伙强盗的头头不够聪明啊。哨兵永远不该呆的过于舒服。

String.Source: So these bandits just tossed their leader into the pit? You'd think even the lowliest of companies would show a little more respect.
String.Dest: 所以这些强盗就把他们的首领扔进了坑里？你会想到即使是最卑微的同伴也该给予他们更多的尊重。

String.Source: With his wife dead, Christer probably attacked you knowing you'd kill him. Some people will follow you to the void if they have to.
String.Dest: 知道他老婆死了，克里斯特大概会来攻击你好让你杀了他。有些人在迫不得已时是情愿跟别人一起死的。

String.Source: You sure we should let this Fjola live? She is a murdering, kidnapping bandit after all. But at least she was kind enough to talk to us first!
String.Dest: 你确定我们应该让这个菲欧拉活着吗？毕竟她是个把谋杀绑架当作吃饭喝水的土匪。但至少她第一次跟我们说话的时候足够亲切。

String.Source: I'm actually not surprised the Wolf Queen's back. Skyrim has so many walking corpses and would be rulers, it makes sense for some of them to overlap.
String.Dest: 其实我对狼心女王的归来并没感到有多惊讶。天际已经有这么多的行尸走肉想要成为统治者了。这之间有一些相似的道理。

String.Source: I really like the layout of this tavern. Apparently, so did the Falmer!
String.Dest: 我真的很喜欢这家酒馆儿的设计。显然，那些雪精灵也是这么想的！

String.Source: The Rueful Axe. Do you think this wizard really used it to "cure" his daughter? I mean, do you see any werewolves around here?
String.Dest: 可怜的斧子。你真觉得这个巫师用这玩意去“治愈”他的女儿？我是说，你在这周围看到任何一只狼人了么？

String.Source: So there's unnatural noises and lights coming from Wolfskull cave. Figures. You buy a nice house in a good area, and the neighbors are all witches!
String.Dest: 从狼头骨洞穴里会传来奇怪的声响，也会有奇怪的光亮。显然。你在一个不错的地段买了一幢不错的房子，而你的邻居还都是女巫！

String.Source: So tell me, priest, what's this group done exactly that has you chasing after them?
String.Dest: 那么告诉我，祭司，在你追踪那伙人的时候他们到底做了什么？

String.Source: So if I understand this right, this quartermaster told you where to find this war teacher?
String.Dest: 如果我没想错的话，这个军需官告诉你该去哪儿找战争导师了？

String.Source: So nice of these bandits to set up camp for us. Even nicer of them to attack. Now we don't have to share!
String.Dest: 这些强盗真好啊，给咱们支好了营地。更好的是他们还打我们。所以现在就不用合住一起啦。

String.Source: (Meridia's Beacon) So you've got a Daedric Prince in your head? It happens to the best of us.
String.Dest: 现在有个魔族王子在你脑袋里？这是我们碰到最好的事情了。

String.Source: You can't really blame this bandit for hiding his treasure here. It's safer in a cave of full angry bears than in a camp full of his peers!
String.Dest: 你不能责怪这个强盗把他的财宝藏在这儿。比起那个到处是他的同行的营地，还是这个满是愤怒的熊的山洞更安全些！

String.Source: So do Elder Scrolls exist outside of time? I wonder if it sees a nice warm bath in our future!
String.Dest: 这样说上古卷轴能够游离于时间之外？我希望从卷轴里能看到我们在洗一个舒舒服服的热水澡~

String.Source: All these damn spores...this place is dustier than a Thalmor's handshake.
String.Dest: 这些该死的臭脓包...这地方简直比梭默的握手行为还要肮脏。

String.Source: Nothing like some good old indoctrination to build an army. Still, the Falmer don't trust them completely, if they're arming them with rusty maces.
String.Dest: 老话说得好，军队即王道。不过，这堆雪精灵们似乎不完全认同这点，这帮二货还用生锈的锤子武装自己呢。

String.Source: This alchemist took 3 arrows in the ribcage. Do you think he opened the door for the machines, or did they just let themselves in?
String.Dest: 这个炼金师胸口中了三箭……你觉得他把机器的门打开了还是他让他们进来了？

String.Source: Watch your step, traveler. It's a long way down.
String.Dest: 小心脚下！路才刚开始呢！

String.Source: The Dwemer spent all this time building spiders. Maybe it was the spiders that did them in.
String.Dest: 锻莫们花了他们的全部时间来制造机械蜘蛛。也许就是这些机械蜘蛛造成了他们的消失。

String.Source: Who do you think this was? You'd think one of these bandits would've passed him that ale.
String.Dest: 你认为这是谁做的？你该不会觉得有哪个强盗会把这啤酒递给他吧。

String.Source: When Arnwulf said something that didn't make sense, he could always blame it on the mead. This Septimus should leave more bottles lying around.
String.Dest: 当阿恩武夫说一些毫无意义的事的时候，他总是把这归咎于蜜酒身上。这个金币旁边应该放多些瓶子。

String.Source: All these puzzles and traps make it nearly impossible to get to that ledge from below. Of course, you could just drop in from above.
String.Dest: 所有的这些谜题和陷阱使得从下面到达那个窗台成为一件几乎不可能的事情。当然，你可以想个办法从高处掉到窗台上。

String.Source: Is this it? We worked our way up this massive hill and all we found were skeletons. Not even a necromancer to conjure them. I feel cheated.
String.Dest: 就这样而已？我们费了半天的力气爬上这大山就只找到几具骷髅。甚至连召唤它们的亡灵术士都没看见。我觉得上当了。

String.Source: My scales always get the shivers in a place like this. Old ghosts haunt these halls, and long shadows hide them.
String.Dest: 我的鳞片总是不自觉地这么打颤。古老的幽灵盘旋不去，浓厚的阴影覆盖着他们。

String.Source: The only thing I've seen up here is snow and goats. If we stay up here tonight, I can pretty much guess what we're having for dinner.
String.Dest: 我在这只看到了雪和羊。如果我们今晚留在这儿，我已经预感到晚餐的菜谱了。

String.Source: Dragons...Alduin's wall...ancient Akaviri temples...this is getting heavy traveler, but I'll be here if you need help carrying the weight.
String.Dest: 龙...奥杜因之墙...古老的阿卡维尔庙宇...这听起来太玄了旅行者, 但当你需要我的时候我会为你减轻负担的.

String.Source: The Thalmor don't fight as well in a place like this. It's almost as if they're the ones afraid to get their hands dirty!
String.Dest: 梭莫也不会再在这样的地方开打。就好像他们那种害怕把自己的手弄脏似的。

String.Source: What's the rush? I say we let a couple more Thalmor get down here before we get bored.
String.Dest: 你急什么？我是说在我们厌倦之前，总得放倒几个梭默吧。

String.Source: Friend or foe, I don't think I'll be able to avoid this stranger for long. Not if he knows where I live!
String.Dest: 无论是朋友还是敌人，我不认为我可以避开这个陌生人太长时间。要是他知道我住在那里的话!

String.Source: Arnwulf couldn't be bested by strength, and Ula-Wei couldn't be killed by stealth. This assassin is dangerous, Companion. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫不可能在力量上被战胜，乌拉卫不可能被暗杀。这刺客是危险的，朋友。你们务要儆醒。

String.Source: Bodan once took down half a dozen men in the middle of a song, before finishing his set. He won't have much trouble with these sellswords.
String.Dest: 波登曾用半首歌的时间解决了六个人，他都没唱完组曲。他要搞定这几个佣兵一定不会费吹灰之力。

String.Source: It will be good to see Dalum-Ei again. I don't think I ever said goodbye.
String.Dest: 能再看见达卢姆‧艾真的挺好的。我想我还没跟他道别呢。

String.Source: If Dalum-Ei is our foe, then be on your guard, traveler. He's a master swordsman, a living legend, and a true knight.
String.Dest: 如果达卢姆‧艾是我们的敌人的话，你可得保持警惕了，旅行者。他是一位剑术大师，一个活着的传奇，一名真正的骑士。

String.Source: I'm surprised to see Malborn made it out of that scumhole. Maybe we ought to give him a sword!
String.Dest: 马伯恩居然从那个洞穴就这么逃出来了？！我们是不是应该给他一把剑？

String.Source: Malborn didn't make it, huh. He wasn't a soldier, but he was gallant all the same.
String.Dest: 马伯恩没能做到，嗯。他不是战士，但他与战士一样英勇。

String.Source: I hope Delphine's mistaken. The people of Kynesgrove wouldn't last more than a minute against a dragon.
String.Dest: 我希望戴尔菲娜是错的。基耐森林的人们跟龙斗的话坚持不了一分钟。

String.Source: So, our friend wants to meet in Riverwood. It's a quiet place, but one where you might let your guard down. I don't like it, Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 那么，我们的朋友想在河木镇碰面。那是个安静的地方，但要到那个地方去你就不能带上你的护卫。我可不喜欢这一点啊，龙裔。

String.Source: These Draugr have such horrible manners! You set out a bunch of plates and bowls, and they prefer to eat off the table!
String.Dest: 这些尸鬼真无礼! 你丢给他们盘子和碗，他们却选择啃桌子!

String.Source: Klimmek ought to really invest in a horse. Or is that not allowed? Eh, might be easier to pay off pilgrims then buy a sack of oats.
String.Dest: 真应该买匹马。或者这是不受允许的？呃，先还清朝圣者们的欠债再买一袋麦子应该会更轻松。

String.Source: Pretty amazing, traveler. Opening your mouth and making everything scatter. Here I thought Lurbuk was the only one who could do that!
String.Dest: 真是厉害，旅行者。张张嘴，一切都烟消云散。我还以为只有卢布克能做到呢！

String.Source: Ivarstead. There's something peaceful about this place. Even the leaves look like they're meditating. Well Dragonborn, you ready to make the climb?
String.Dest: 紫杉镇. 这是一个和平的地方。即使是叶子看起来也像是在冥想。好了龙裔, 你准备爬上去了吗?

String.Source: So a couple of gutter rubes were going to overthrow the Thieves Guild? (Laughs) Maybe you should've joined them instead.
String.Dest: 那么说来一对肮脏下贱的乡巴佬想颠覆盗贼公会？（大笑）或许你应该转而加入他们。

String.Source: The shopkeeps earn their gold through sweat and hard work, and the thieves throw a tantrum because they think they're entitled to it. It's not right.
String.Dest: 店主们付出汗水和努力获得金币，但是盗贼却因为没获得这些所谓的“应得之物”而大发雷霆？呵呵，呵呵呵，呵呵呵呵。

String.Source: I don't know about breaking into this estate, but killing a band of sellswords sounds like something I'd approve of.
String.Dest: 我并不了解闯入房子的后果，但是消灭一队佣兵倒是我乐意的。

String.Source: Black-Briar mead or Honningbrew mead, it doesn't really matter. In the end, it's still mead! Not even the Gourmet can make gutter bile tasty!
String.Dest: 黑荆棘酒或是蜂蜜酒，这无所谓。反正它们都是蜜酒嘛！就连高梅特也不可能用那种下水道的污水变出美味来！

String.Source: (Laughs) Gajul-Lei? Why in Oblivion would Gulum-Ei use an Argonian name as an alias? Doesn't he know they all sound the same to foreigners?
String.Dest: (笑声) 古拉姆？古鲁姆·埃他妈的怎么会打算用一个亚龙人名字做化名？他不知道对外乡人来说这俩听起来没啥区别吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) Am I the only one who thinks an army of skeevers would make perfect sense? They're like fleshflies. They breed fast, and feed fast.
String.Dest: (笑声)我是唯一一个意识到雪鼠军队的设想讲得通的人吗？它们就像肉蝇一样，吃的快，生的快。

String.Source: Sabjorn's having a mead tasting? (Laughs) And here I thought the one thing I liked about the Nords is that they weren't stuck up wine sippers!
String.Dest: 撒布乔恩要去品尝蜜酒？(笑声) 我想我喜欢诺德人的一点是他们在喝酒时不会高傲自大。

String.Source: So Gulum-Ei is a fence now? You've got to hand it to the thieves. They won't let an attempt to destroy their guild keep them from hiring you.
String.Dest: 这么说古鲁姆·埃现在是个销赃人？你现在不得不表扬下那些盗贼们。他们不会让一个尝试破坏他们行会对你的雇佣关系。

String.Source: It's a relief to see you standing, traveler. I'd give my tail to stick my sword into Mercer's gut, but this is Karliah's revenge. We do it her way.
String.Dest: 看见你还活着我真高兴，旅行者。我真想把我的剑刺进墨瑟人的胸膛，但这个是卡莱雅的复仇啊，我们按照她来就好了。

String.Source: So Mercer runs off with all the loot. So much for honor among thieves. What's next, Dark Brotherhood members killing each other? Works for me.
String.Dest: 所以墨瑟带着所有的战利品逃跑了。还有那盗贼的荣誉。那么接下来是什么，黑暗兄弟会的成员们互相残杀？为我工作吧。

String.Source: A copy of the Lusty Argonian Maid? (Laughs) I knew Mercer was giving me dirty looks, but I didn't know just how dirty!
String.Dest: 一本《元气满满的亚龙人女仆》？(笑声) 我知道墨瑟一直都在给我塞小黄书，不过没想到这淫棍口重到这个份上！

String.Source: You should stop if you have doubts. I don't know what makes a Nightingale special, but I bet Mercer bleeds like any man if you stick him.
String.Dest: 心存疑虑的话就应该停手。我不知道夜莺的特别之处在什么地方，但我知道墨瑟被剑刺入胸膛的时候一样会流血、死亡。

String.Source: There you are. Good to see you made it out safe. And Mercer didn't.
String.Dest: 欢迎回归，很高兴看到你安全出来了，而墨瑟没出来。

String.Source: You know, you could just throw the skeleton key away. If the thieves have bad luck, it means good luck for everyone else!
String.Dest: 你知道的，你完全可以把骷髅钥匙扔得远远的。小偷的霉运对其他人意味着幸运!

String.Source: Traveler, I don't know whether to praise you for returning the Skeleton Key, or scold you for bringing the thieves luck! But you did it with honor.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我不知道是否要因为你归还骷髅钥匙而赞美你，或责骂你带来这小偷的运气！但你却带着荣誉这样做了。

String.Source: So, they've made you master of this motley band of misfits. Say what you will about these thieves, but they know a leader when they see one.
String.Dest: 所以，你已经成了这帮乌合之众的头子。不管你怎么看这帮盗贼，在他们看见一个领导人的时候总还是能认出来的。

String.Source: I agreed to follow you, and protect you. But if you join the Thieves Guild, I won't steal for you. Not for you, not for anyone.
String.Dest: 我会跟着你，保护你。但是如果你加入了盗贼工会，我不会为你偷窃。不只是你，所有人都如此。

String.Source: So Kodlak's in a better place, and you get to keep his bed! (Laughs) But traveler, I can't think of a person more deserving.
String.Dest: 所以克拉科去了一个更好的地方，而你仍卧在他的床上！ (笑声) 但是旅行者,我想不出比你更有资格享受这一切的人了。

String.Source: So these ghosts want to test our valor? (Laughs) Fine by me.
String.Dest: 这些鬼魂想试试我们是不是勇猛？（笑声）我倒是无所谓。

String.Source: This death cannot go unavenged, traveler. Take the fight to the Silver Hand. Fight bravely, and fight well.
String.Dest: 这些人不能白白死去，旅行者。跟银手战斗吧。英勇战斗，把他们全都干翻！

String.Source: It would take an army to capture a fort this large. Which means we'll have to clear an army of bandits to liberate it.
String.Dest: 想要俘获这么大的堡垒需要一整支军队。也就是说我们需要干掉一支军队那么多的强盗才能解放它。

String.Source: The Companions don't seem to care that Skjor's dead. I don't think Aela's told any of them.
String.Dest: 战友团看上去并不在乎思科月的死。我不认为艾拉已经把这事告诉战友团的其他人了。

String.Source: Well, will you look at that. I think one of these bandits just invented the wheel!
String.Dest: 好吧,你看看那个. 我猜其中一个强盗刚刚发明了这个轮子!

String.Source: Blood, chains, and bones. One of these bandits has a hobby. He might even be a cannibal. But at least Leifnarr got off easy, judging by that arrow.
String.Dest: 血，锁链，还有尸骨。这帮强盗之中有人有特殊的癖好。甚至可能是一个食人族。但至少雷夫纳尔逃脱了，从那支箭来看。

String.Source: This lunar forge looks like any other. But I'm not exactly a smith. Or a mage.
String.Dest: 这个月之熔炉看起来就像其他的什么。但我不完全是个铁匠，或者法师……我看不出来。

String.Source: This reminds me of the old days. I once asked Ula-Wei to spar, but Arnwulf grabbed my arm and shook his head. Assassins don't know how to hold back.
String.Dest: 这让我想起了过往的日子。我曾经要求和乌拉卫比划两下，结果阿恩武夫抓住我的手一个劲儿地摇头。刺客们可不懂什么叫“点到为止”啊。

String.Source: It was a cave just like this one. Not unlike thousands of others strewn about Tamriel. Coffins, corpses, and candles on the ground. And black robes.
String.Dest: 是个跟这一样的洞穴。和其他成百上千遍布在泰姆瑞尔大陆的洞穴不一样。棺材，尸体，地上的蜡烛，黑色的长袍。

String.Source: There's a lot of narrow tunnels in these caves. Better for mages, usually. They don't need a lot of room to swing their arms.
String.Dest: 这些洞穴里有着大量的细小通道……简直是违法是战斗而设计的啊，完全不用考虑武器挥不挥的起来啊。

String.Source: (Laughs) Mages can wield the elements, they can come back from the dead as flying wraiths, and it still won't save them from old fashioned steel.
String.Dest: (笑声)法师可以支配元素，他们可以像是漂浮的幽灵一般从尸体之中回归，而这依旧不能把他们从老旧的钢制品之中拯救出来。

String.Source: The Companions value being true to yourself. Still, while you can have a lot of personalities, a good company should always fight for a single goal.
String.Dest: 同伴的价值在于永远对你真诚。同样，而你可以保留自己的个性，一个优秀的搭档永远都只会为一个目标而战斗。

String.Source: Savos and Mirabelle dead, and yet the slimy worm still lives. A true knight would never let such deaths go unavenged. Nor would a swamp one.
String.Dest: 萨沃斯和米拉贝勒死了，但是那些只会拍马屁的蛀虫还活着。一个真正的骑士不会让一个未得雪耻的人就这么走了。即使被掩埋在历史深处。

String.Source: So nice of Ancano to leave us a present. And here I thought I'd only get to kill one Thalmor today.
String.Dest: 安卡诺留给我们的礼物真是棒极了。我今天已经迫不及待的想去杀个梭默了。

String.Source: That poor mortal. Died shackled to the wall, listening to this voice moan and groan all day. It's time we gave him some peace.
String.Dest: 那可怜的凡人。到死都被锁在墙边，听着呻吟和抱怨。是时候该我们给他个清静了。

String.Source: Bloodsuckers have come a long way it seems. Now they drink from cups!
String.Dest: 似乎吸血鬼还有很长一段路要走。现在他们在用杯子喝血！恶心！

String.Source: Wisps, drawn to that cemetery. Seems like it's them or us. And I don't know about you, traveler, but this is the last place I want to be buried.
String.Dest: 幽魂，也被这墓地吸引了。看来他们跟我们都一样。我不知道你是怎么想的，旅行者，但这是我想要最后被埋葬的地方。

String.Source: Now that was a fight! Dragons bursting from the earth, mages lurking in the corners. I don't know about you, but I can't wait to see what's next.
String.Dest: 那战斗可是惊天地泣鬼神啊！巨龙们破土而出，奥术师埋伏在角落里。我不了解你，但我等不及想看看接下来要发生什么了。

String.Source: A talking orb of light. I must be losing my mind! But if what he says is true, I say it's Ancano that should lose his head.
String.Dest: 一个会说话的光球？！我疯了还是这个世界疯了？！……等等，它说的真的假的啊？安卡诺的脑袋掉了？

String.Source: Don't know what he wanted, but that Psijic gave me a cold shiver up my scales. Well, I got off easy. I think Ancano went off to change his diaper!
String.Dest: 不知道他想要什么，但赛伊克都让我的尾巴寒得直起鸡皮疙瘩啦。呃，我很容易就能恢复的。我想安卡诺已经放弃给他换尿布了！

String.Source: The Arcanaeum is more like a wine cellar. If Orthorn really wanted to suck up to the mages, he should have left the books and stolen the liquor!
String.Dest: 秘藏馆更像一个酒窖。如果奥松恩真的想巴结这个法师，他就应该把书留下把酒卖掉！

String.Source: Well what do you know, they've been torturing vampires! I'm starting to like these mages!
String.Dest: 噢你知道吗，他们在折磨吸血鬼！我开始喜欢这些法师了！

String.Source: Good to see it isn't just soldiers who are preparing for a war against stationary targets!
String.Dest: 看来在为这场以固定靶子为对象做准备的人并不仅仅只有士兵们啊，这可真让人高兴！

String.Source: Are you sure you made the right decision? I don't know if I'm comfortable leaving here knowing we let this mage live. But it's your call.
String.Dest: 你确定你做了正确的决定？我不确定在我知道“让这法师活着”的时候我会很舒服的离开这里。但这是你的要求。

String.Source: We killed a necromancer and saved her prisoner. Yes, he was a thief, and an idiot. But traveler, you still did the honorable thing.
String.Dest: 我们杀掉了亡灵术士，拯救了她的囚徒。是啊，他是个贼，是个白痴。不过旅行者，你还是做了件令人尊敬的事。

String.Source: Damn that Thalmor. But this isn't over. I swear by the Hist, he won't win.
String.Dest: 该死的梭默。但事儿还没完。以希斯特的名义起誓，他赢不了。

String.Source: You impress me more by the day, traveler! Tolfdir too, it seems. And that Draugr we just pummeled? Even more so!
String.Dest: 旅行者，你今天和托夫迪尔一样给我留下了深刻的印象！这个就是我们刚才秒掉的尸鬼？还有么？我还没打够呢！

String.Source: You sure this mage can find his way out? Maybe we should leave him something to eat besides his toes!
String.Dest: 你确定这法师能找到自己的出路？也许我们应该给他留点儿东西吃，别让他光啃自己的脚趾！

String.Source: Well traveler, now I think I've seen just about everything. How do you suppose they buried the ones at the top? I never knew Nords to be acrobats!
String.Dest: 好吧旅行者，现在我觉得我已经看清一切了。你怎么会觉得是他们烧掉了顶上的那些呢？我可没听说过诺德裔的杂耍演员啊！

String.Source: Well traveler, the bad news is the Falmer stole some of our fun. The good news is, killing Falmer is just as enjoyable!
String.Dest: 好吧旅行者，坏消息是雪精灵抢走了我们一部分乐趣。好消息呢是去杀雪精灵也是一种乐趣。

String.Source: Be cautious, he says. This place could be filled with anything, he says. Then he tells us to poke around. Ha, I think this mage is trying to kill us.
String.Dest: 小心点，他说。他还说，这里不知道都埋伏着些什么乱七八糟的东西。然后他让我们四处逛逛。哈，我觉得这个法师想弄死我们。

String.Source: Your first lesson was on wards, huh. So that's how you protect yourself from mage fire! And all this time I've been dodging it!
String.Dest: 你的第一堂课学的是结界吗？这样就能挡住法师的火球了！我一直以来都是拼命躲闪来着。

String.Source: So the townsfolk think the mages blew up their town? Not a surprise. Small mistakes lead to big accidents. I should know, I make them all the time!
String.Dest: 那么镇民认为法师炸了他们的镇子？那没什么。小错误会导致大事故。我当然知道这些，因为我一直在捅娄子！

String.Source: So this woman tends the shop all day while that lout drinks away her profits. They say you can't choose family, but you can sure as hell beat them.
String.Dest: 结果这个女人一边苦心经营她的小店一边被那混蛋把她的利润喝个精光。虽然说你不能选择你的家人，可你肯定可以狠狠地揍他们！

String.Source: Feels good, doesn't it? We helped a stranger and killed a monster. It doesn't get more satisfying than that.
String.Dest: 感觉很好是吧？帮助了一个陌生人，然后干掉了一头恶魔……简直是一本满足啊！

String.Source: The throne room's ahead. Be ready, traveler. This Vokun sounds tough, but if we fight as one, no single foe can defeat us.
String.Dest: 正殿就在前头。准备好咯，旅行者。要打败沃昆听起来很困难，但只要我们同心协力，就没人能战胜我们。

String.Source: Hey, one of those levers has a fox! That's new.
String.Dest: 哈，有个拉杆上面有只狐狸！太新鲜了！

String.Source: This Argonian needs to stop whining and get off his tail. It doesn't matter what you were meant to be. You still have to meet destiny halfway.
String.Dest: 这个亚龙人需要停止抱怨和拿开它的尾巴。不管你是什么意思。你仍然需要面对你不完整的命运。

String.Source: The Windpeak Inn is rather lively tonight, and thanks to you, all these folks can look forward to a good night's sleep.
String.Dest: 今晚的风岳旅店可真热闹。多亏了你啊，这里的乡亲们都能放心睡个好觉了。

String.Source: If I joined the Legion, I might've ended up a dog like this Halfhand character. It seems those old recruiters did me a favor!
String.Dest: 如果我加入帝国军团，也许我就不会再被当做没有爪子的狗了，看起来那些老兵帮了我一个忙啊。

String.Source: The wench here doesn't have a great voice, but she has personality. All the charm in Tamriel couldn't save Lurbuk though!
String.Dest: 这个姑娘没有优美的嗓音，但是她很有个性。即使是泰姆瑞尔大陆上的所有魔法也不能让卢布克清醒起来。

String.Source: A fresh pond and fresh water. This looks like a good spot for a camp. Although I'm sure that alchemist over there thought the same.
String.Dest: 干净的水池和新鲜的池水。这儿看起来是个扎营的好地方。虽然我看对面的炼金术士也跟咱想的一样。

String.Source: These temples are nice, but there's something mystical about nature, and walking among the Hist that stone and mortar can't capture.
String.Dest: 这些庙宇看上去很不错……但我总是有种对大自然的敬畏感，即使我漫步在这些石头砌起来的希斯特雕像中也不能降低半分。

String.Source: Fort Hraggstad. The air's thin up here. Hope you brought a stamina potion.
String.Dest: 哈格斯塔德堡垒. 这里的空气是愈发稀薄了。但愿你有带着耐力药剂。

String.Source: Ysgramor, huh. Elia once told me she was a descendant of Arslan II, but I think she was just being an arse.
String.Dest: 伊斯格拉谟，哈。艾拉曾告诉我说她是阿斯兰的后裔，但是我认为她不过就是个蠢蛋而已。

String.Source: What are you some sort of mannequin? Could've fooled me, the way those Elves have you playing dress up!
String.Dest: 你是什么服装模特儿么？你在愚弄我，用这种装扮成那些精灵的方式玩弄我！

String.Source: I heard this tavern was full of drunken soldiers and nightly bar fights. Looks like it's much worse. The place is practically empty!
String.Dest: 我听说这家酒馆里满是酩酊大醉的士兵和夜间斗殴的事情。但实际情况好像比这更糟。这里完全是空的！

String.Source: Be careful around this Dark Elf. I don't trust him, but with mages I don't trust myself. Whatever you decide, I'm with you.
String.Dest: 小心那个黑暗精灵。我不信任他。但于站在法师的角度，我也不信任我自己。无论你做出什么决定，我都支持你。

String.Source: Thane of Hjaalmarch, huh. I wonder if that makes you my Thane as well. There's a nasty rumor going around that I live here!
String.Dest: 希雅陲领领主啊，哈。我想知道这个会不会也让你变成领主啊……真是个恶毒的谣言啊，咱们还住在这呢！

String.Source: Thane of the Reach. You're quite the social climber. But don't go trading your sword away for a crown. You'll regret it.
String.Dest: 瑞驰的男爵。你确实是个趋炎附势的人。但别为了个王冠就用你的剑去交换。你会后悔的。

String.Source: Damn. This is why I don't trust mages. I rely on my sword, and the smith who forges it, not some sick corpse ritual.
String.Dest: 该死的。这就是我不信任法师的原因。我依赖我的剑，而我的剑是靠着铁匠打造的，不是这些变态的尸体仪式。

String.Source: I'd stay clear of this dog. I've seen that look before. He'll follow you to Black Marsh if you let him.
String.Dest: 我不想与这条狗扯上任何关系，我以前见过他这样的，只要你允许，这小家伙就会一直跟着你，哪怕到黑降都会跟着你。

String.Source: From my camp, I often see the fire blazing from this fort. And while it lit up the western sky, at no point did it feel warm.
String.Dest: 从帐篷向外看去，我总会看到那堡垒明亮的火焰不时的闪耀着。虽然这照亮了西方的天空，可我却感不到丝毫温暖。

String.Source: Arnwulf once told me there were 2 types of people who lived in forts. The kind who read, and the kind who bed. And look at all these books!
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫曾告诉我住在城堡里的有两种人。一种是读书的人，另一种是上床的人。看看所有这些书！

String.Source: It seems this Dunmer took half the Draugr in this crypt with him to the void. How selfish of him.
String.Dest: 看起来这个黑精灵杀了地穴里一半的尸鬼，太自私了，也不给我留一点。

String.Source: What is this, some kind of throne? I don't know if it was big enough to hold Movarth's ego.
String.Dest: 这是啥，某种君主头衔么？我不知道这种头衔能不能够装下莫瓦斯那膨胀的自负。

String.Source: I admit, I don't pay much attention to what goes on in this town. But the murder of a child bears investigating.
String.Dest: 我得承认，我没注意这个小镇发生了什么。但似乎一个杀了孩子的凶手正在被追捕。

String.Source: Lami's always experimenting with ingredients, which is a good for the mind, but bad for the coin purse. Well, bad for her coin purse, anyway.
String.Dest: 拉米对草药经验丰富，这有益于头脑灵活，但不利于钱包健康。当然，只是对她的钱包而已。

String.Source: Mixing torchbugs and skeever hides is a quick way to restore stamina. That must be why the Nords have so much energy. No shortage of rats.
String.Dest: 将雪鼠皮与火虫混合出的东西能够快速地恢复体力。所以诺德人才会如此地精力旺盛，他们那儿从来不缺老鼠。

String.Source: Looks like Thonnir's practicing to become a bard. Why doesn't he play at the inn? (Laughs) Afraid that Orc will upstage him?
String.Dest: 看起来东尼尔是在为成为一个吟游诗人而努力，那他为什么不在旅馆里演奏？（大笑）难不成是怕兽人抢了他的风头？

String.Source: If only Hroggar loved his child as much as this vampire did. I don't care what magic Alva used, that fool of a Nord has no excuse.
String.Dest: 真希望赫鲁加能像这个吸血鬼一样的爱他自己的孩子。我才不管阿尔瓦到底施了什么魔法，反正那肯定不足以成为这个傻诺德的借口。

String.Source: A vampire's coffin. But only one. Strange, I expected there were more of them. No, hoped is more like it.
String.Dest: 一个吸血鬼的棺材。但只有一个。奇怪，我期望这儿有更多的吸血鬼。不，我希望的是更多像这样的棺材。

String.Source: Look at this rack. Chains and blood. I wonder if this will make it into the museum. It should.
String.Dest: 看看这刑架。铁链和鲜血。我怀疑这东西是不是会因为这个而被送进博物馆。它应该被送进去。

String.Source: It looks like this one was frozen in place, and the other 2 tried to run. What would scare a pair of trained Legionnaires? An unwashed uniform?
String.Dest: 看起来这家伙冻死在这里了，而其他两个正在试图逃跑。到底是什么东西把这几个善战退伍老兵吓成这样？多年未洗的臭制服吗？

String.Source: Indrel was an archer like you. She said as a child, she would do shows for spare gold shooting apples off a beggar's head. Don't get any ideas.
String.Dest: 英卓尔像你一样是个弓箭手。她说，当她还是个孩子时，她就能用省下来的金币射中乞丐头上的苹果了……我的意思是，他用金币贿赂乞丐，让乞丐自愿成为靶子。别多想。

String.Source: Two-handed weapon, huh? It suits you. I'm surprised you don't use your tail to swing it too!
String.Dest: 双手武器，哼嗯？挺适合你的。不过我感觉你拿尾巴也能抡人啊。

String.Source: Two-handed weapon, huh? It suits you. If you had a tail, I'm sure you'd find a way to wrap it around your hilt!
String.Dest: 双手武器，哼嗯？挺适合你的。如果你有尾巴，再把尾巴训练一下，你也可以弄个三刀流啊……

String.Source: If this ass-drinker of a Jarl wants a sword dipped in Daedric blood, he ought to find a Daedra and stab it himself!
String.Dest: 如果窝囊废领主想血溅魔族，那他得自己去找个魔族自己下手。

String.Source: Here you are, not the slightest bit worse for wear. They say no one escapes Cidhna Mine. I guess we better start calling you "No One!"
String.Dest: 给你……穿上这个吧，总比没有的穿要强。他们说没人能逃离哪个矿坑？那好吧，我是不是该称呼你为“没人”？

String.Source: How big do you think this spider is? Ten feet wide? Twenty? My blood is boiling just thinking about slaying it.
String.Dest: 你能想象这蜘蛛有多大吗? 十英尺那么宽? 还是二十英尺? 我只感到热血沸腾想冲上去宰了它.

String.Source: I admit, I don't pay much attention to what goes on in this town. But the murder of a child bears investigating.
String.Dest: 我得承认，我没注意这个小镇发生了什么。但似乎一个杀了孩子的凶手正在被追捕。

String.Source: Weapons and armor on the table. Could be Forsworn. I hope its Forsworn.
String.Dest: 桌子上有武器和铠甲。可能是弃誓者的。我希望是弃誓者。

String.Source: A reward! How delightful! And here I thought we murdered that Vigilant for nothing!
String.Dest: 奖赏！太爽了！我还以为我们得白白杀了那些警戒者呢！

String.Source: That's an impressive sword you carry. I've always marveled at Akaviri craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 你带这把剑真是让人印象深刻。我总是对阿卡维尔的技艺感到无比惊叹。

String.Source: This place isn't as lively as The Bannered Mare, but at least they sell weapons. That almost makes up for it.
String.Dest: 这地方不像母马横幅一样兴盛, 但至少他们出售武器. 这在某种程度上弥补了它的不足.

String.Source: Good to see no one's killed Lurbuk. Yet.
String.Dest: 还没人干掉卢布克。不错。

String.Source: Funny, I never noticed these spheres have crossbows on their arms until now. Why don't they use them? Ha, what am I saying. Better they don't.
String.Dest: 真有趣，直到现在我才注意到这些金属球儿胳膊上架着弩呢。他们为什么不用呢？哈，我在说什么。他们不用才是最好的。

String.Source: We can take out the rest of the Falmer here. Draw them with a bow or a magic spell, and I'll do the rest.
String.Dest: 我们可以把这里剩下的雪精灵连窝儿端。用弓箭或魔法吸引他们的注意，剩下的就交给我。

String.Source: These Forsworn spies don't lack in numbers. It's a good strategy. Not even a Leviathan can shake off a legion of rats.
String.Dest: 那群弃誓者间谍的人数倒是不少，这是个不错的战略。体型再怎么大的生物也无法抵挡一群老鼠的围攻。

String.Source: So Lurbuk's finally dead. I knew I should've cut out his tongue. Might've saved his life!
String.Dest: 所以卢布克终于死了。我就知道应该把他的舌头割下来。说不定那么做能救他的命！

String.Source: You're not going to help this coven of cannibals, are you? Normally, I say to each their own, but not if you eat your own.
String.Dest: 你不会去帮助这些食人女巫对吧？一般来说，我是指所有的这种家伙，除非你想吃了你自己。

String.Source: So that priestess, and I use the term loosely, wants us to kidnap a child to be her new leader. This is going to go over real well with the family.
String.Dest: 结果女祭司跟我把那个词说的那么轻而易举，她希望我们绑架一个孩子成为她的新领袖。而这可不会给孩子的家人留下什么好印象。

String.Source: We better kill these Forsworn quickly. I don't think the miners can stand being around their wives!
String.Dest: 我们最好快点把那些弃誓者干掉。因为恐怕矿工们在和妻子们一起的地方熬不了太久啊。

String.Source: They say to solve a conspiracy, you just have to follow the trail of gold. Seems to me all the gold in this city leads here.
String.Dest: 他们说，要解决一个阴谋，你只需要跟着黄金的踪迹走。在我看来这，这城里所有的黄金都指向了这儿。

String.Source: Next time the boy should just shout where he wants to meet. I think only half of the city saw him pass you that note.
String.Dest: 那个男孩下次该大吼着要去哪里见他了。我觉得大半个城市都看见他给你递了那张纸条。

String.Source: They call this side of town the "Dry Side." Good to see it doesn't apply to the mead!
String.Dest: 他们管城镇的这一边叫“干燥地带”。这不适用于蜂蜜酒真是太好了！

String.Source: This Mulush talks tough, but he's soft enough to fear what his employers will do to him, should the miners slack.
String.Dest: 这个家伙口气很强硬，不过 等到他知道他老板要怎么做的时候他就会知道害怕的。

String.Source: This might sound like a stupid question, but who's Arnleif? Really, is there an Arnleif here? I'd like to speak to an Arnleif. Any Arnleif will do.
String.Dest: 或许这听上去很蠢，但谁是阿雷夫？说真的，有个阿雷夫在这儿吗？我想和阿雷夫说说话。随便来个阿雷夫就行。

String.Source: This grove has all sorts of weird plants and fungus around it. If the creek was made of black ooze, it'd feel just like home!
String.Dest: 这块土地上生长着各种各样奇怪的植物和菌类。要是把那条消息换成一块黑色的泥地，那感觉就像我的故乡！

String.Source: The stallion's potion? (Laugh) Perhaps the Steward ought to live in a stable. He'd have a better chance at finding a mate!
String.Dest: 种马药水？（笑）恐怕那管家还是去马厩生活比较好。那儿好方便他找到配偶！

String.Source: I imagine towers like Bannermist used to be important defensive outposts before the Empire united this land. Well, it may be of some use soon enough.
String.Dest: 我觉着在帝国还未统治这片土地时，像旗霭塔那样的塔应该是一个重要的防御前哨站，说不定不久之后它就会重回它原本的角色。

String.Source: Why are there cages here? Doesn't this fort already have a dungeon? (Laughs) Maybe these are for recreational use!
String.Dest: 这里要这么多笼子干嘛？不是已经有地牢了么？ (笑声)不会是还有什么观赏或者娱乐的用处吧？

String.Source: Coffins? And so few of them! Why, these won't last the hour!
String.Dest: 棺材？而且这么少！有什么用呢，都撑不过一个小时！

String.Source: A witch, huh? Well, I guess it had to be this way. I doubt either of us could keep a secret!
String.Dest: 一个女巫哈？好吧，我猜就得是这样。我怀疑我们俩都保守不住秘密！

String.Source: That Elf was a real sharp one, crossing the heroes who just killed a giant spider. Only a matter of time before he sat on his own sword.
String.Dest: 那个精灵就是一个大骗子，说什么杀了大蜘蛛的英雄。你看着吧，他早晚一屁股坐到自己的剑上。

String.Source: Strange. What kind of fool goes into a Draugr crpyt by his lonesome and leaves the muscle behind?
String.Dest: 奇怪。什么样的呆子才会因为孤单而不带任何护卫就闯到尸鬼的地穴里？

String.Source: This bandit likes sleeping with a Imperial corpse by his bed. I prefer a warm body, but to each his own!
String.Dest: 这个强盗喜欢跟帝国士兵的尸体睡在一起？我还是喜欢温暖的躯体，但我怀疑他两个都喜欢。

String.Source: There's something about that Dark Elf that makes my tail stand on end. Careful with that one.
String.Dest: 这个黑暗精灵身上的什么东西让我的尾巴都竖起来了……小心点。

String.Source: You alright, traveler? (Laughs) You look like you need a nap! Was it killing the dragon that got you tired, or eating its soul?
String.Dest: 你还行吗，旅行者？（笑）你看起来该睡一觉了！是杀那条龙把你累着了，还是因为你吃了它的魂？

String.Source: Thane of Whiterun! (Laughs) You're a noble, and all it took was killing a dragon. Still, I'd rather do that than kiss the Jarl's ass!
String.Dest: 白漫城的领主! (笑声) 你是个贵族，但你所做的唯一一件事情就是干掉了一条龙……好吧，跟用跪舔换取身份相比，我想要获得贵族身份的话宁可去杀龙。

String.Source: Sovngarde or not, Kodlak will always be with you. That's what it means to be a company. That's what it means to be family.
String.Dest: 不论生死与否，克拉科会一直在你身边陪伴你。这就是一名同伴的意味。这就是一个家人的意味。

String.Source: Ah, so you're a Companion. It's a fine honor, and a fine company.
String.Dest: 啊，原来你也是战友团的。还不错的荣誉，不错的团体啊。

String.Source: Of all the farms around Whiterun, I like this one the best. They're the only ones that let you drink wine on the job!
String.Dest: 对于白漫城周边所有的农场我最喜欢这个。这是唯一的一个上班时间允许喝酒的地方啊！

String.Source: A blind man standing watch? I didn't know bandits had a sense of humor.
String.Dest: 瞎子站岗？强盗也开始走搞笑娱乐路线了？

String.Source: The bandits hang these bodies over the pit, so the wolves will hunger for the scent of mortal flesh. This one's a bit stale though.
String.Dest: 强盗把尸体挂在斗兽场中，好激起狼群对人类血肉的渴望，尽管这具尸体已经有点腐烂了。

String.Source: Isn't this a nice place for a picnic! Well, except for the ants, and the bandits, but that's why the Divines invented boots, and blades.
String.Dest: 这难道不是一个野餐的好地方么？好吧，除了那些蚂蚁，还有那群强盗，这就是为什么圣灵发明了靴子还有刀刃。

String.Source: I'm surprised bandits even know how to work a lever, let alone build a tiny city.
String.Dest: 我连强盗会用扳手都觉得惊讶，更何况建造一座小城了。

String.Source: This place looks better than most people's homes! The folks from Riverwood ought to move in here!
String.Dest: 这地方的房子看起来比大多数人的都好！河木镇的人应该搬到这儿来！

String.Source: I don't know what's more inviting, the smell or the fire. Both would come second to a warm bed.
String.Dest: 我不知道什么对我更有吸引力……食物的香味还是温暖的篝火？……不过我觉得，这两样都比不上一张温暖的床……

String.Source: Only three beds? These fire mages must sleep in shifts. Or standing up!
String.Dest: 只有三张床？这些火焰法师必须换地方。要么就给我站着睡！

String.Source: The layout of this mining colony makes it perfect archers. Should be a good place to stock up on arrows.
String.Dest: 这个迷你阳台的格局非常适合弓箭手们。这将是一个储存弓箭的好地方。

String.Source: I hope you know what you're doing, because this Silus fellow hasn't a clue.
String.Dest: 我希望你知道你自己在做什么。因为希鲁斯他们一点线索都没有。

String.Source: (Laughs) Look at that shelf. The Short Life of Uriel Septim? Who does this Orc think he's fooling? No one reads this drivel.
String.Dest: (笑声) 看那个架子，尤里尔·赛普丁短暂的一生？是谁让这个兽人认为他在自作聪明？没有人理解了这段胡言乱语的话。

String.Source: These people deserve their vengeance. I just hope the fates offer us the bounty.
String.Dest: 这些人理应得到他们的复仇。我只是希望命运能够慷慨地对待我们。

String.Source: Ready yourself, hero, this Halldir is no ordinary foe.
String.Dest: 英雄，你得做好准备，这位霍迪尔可不是寻常人物。

String.Source: They call this Bonechill Passage? Well, there's bones, and there's chill. Nords are such a creative people!
String.Dest: 他们管这儿叫寒骨通道？呃，这里是有骨头，也挺寒冷的。诺德还真是个有创意的民族！

String.Source: Ah, Dragon Bridge. Wait, the Nords call that a bridge? You can practically jump across!
String.Dest: 啊，龙桥。等等，诺德人把这叫做桥？你都能直接跳过去吧！

String.Source: This Sven fellow fancies himself a skald? (Laughs) I didn't know there was war being fought at the Sleeping Giant Inn!
String.Dest: 斯万这家伙把自己当成战地诗人？（笑）我可不知道沉睡巨人旅馆里有战争！

String.Source: These hunters weren't killed. They were sacrificed. Move with caution, traveler, I don't like this one bit.
String.Dest: 这些猎人不是被杀的。他们是被献祭的。小心行事，旅行者。我一点儿也不喜欢这种事。

String.Source: The Giants here must pray to the sleeping tree. No crazier than Talos worship, I suppose!
String.Dest: 这里的巨人必须向沉睡的树祈祷。我猜，没有什么比塔洛斯崇拜更神经病的了！

String.Source: Sometimes, walking through these caves, my eyes show me images of that orphaned boy. Why do Falmer have to skulk about like children?
String.Dest: 当我在洞穴中行走时，我眼前的景象总会让我想起某个孤儿。为什么雪精灵要像孩子一样蹑手蹑脚地四处走动呢？

String.Source: Arnwulf always waxed poetic about his homeland, but he didn't do Skyrim justice. Probably because Arnwulf was a terrible speaker!
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫总是试图吹嘘和粉饰太平，可是他没有给天际省带来和平，他不过是个喷子而已！

String.Source: An inn! And here I was beginning to think you never slept.
String.Dest: 一家酒馆儿！话说你真的一直都不用睡觉吗。

String.Source: When I arrived here, I forgot this town had such a large cemetery. I thought the people were kind, they thought I was mourning.
String.Dest: 当我到这的时候，我已经忘记了这个城镇有这么大的一个墓地……这里的人民很友好……他们一直觉得我在悼念谁谁谁。

String.Source: The skald at the Silver-Blood Inn has a classic Nord voice, cut from the cold. Yet I'm partial to Redguard voices, smooth as the dunes of the Alik'r.
String.Dest: 银血旅店的那个诗人是标准的诺德嗓，寒冷的沧桑味儿。只是我还是更喜欢红卫人的嗓音，柔美得像阿利克尔的沙丘。

String.Source: First time I came to Ivarstead everyone assumed I was a pilgrim. Ha! What marsh lizard wants to climb a mountain? The thin air doesn't suit our kind.
String.Dest: 我第一次来紫杉镇的时候，人人都以为我是个朝圣者。哈！什么样的沼泽蜥蜴才会想去爬山啊？稀薄的空气可不适合我们。

String.Source: The Redguard at the inn here. I once saw him fight in the Imperial City Arena. He was undisciplined. Wild. A brute. And a force to be reckoned with.
String.Dest: 那个红卫人在这家酒馆。我曾经看过他在皇城竞技场的战斗。他散漫，狂野而残暴。还有一股不容小觑的力量。

String.Source: With the return of the dragons, the world watches Skyrim with bated breath. Our actions are the winds upon which fate will chart its course.
String.Dest: 伴随着巨龙的回归，整个世界都在默默屏息注视着天际。我们的行动便是那动摇命运轨迹的清风。

String.Source: Old Rorik has some ambition. I'm surprised he doesn't have his own banners yet. Maybe someone will confuse him for a Jarl!
String.Dest: 老罗里克有些野心。我很奇怪他怎么还没自立为王。也许有人想要让他乘乱成为领主！

String.Source: A Nordic ruin. It promises treasure, but I wouldn't hold my breath. That will get you killed.
String.Dest: 一个诺德废墟……里面可能有财宝，但我可没什么兴趣……那玩意是要拿命去填的啊。

String.Source: The caves here are far deeper than in Cyrodiil. May the Hist guide us.
String.Dest: 这里的洞穴比赛洛帝尔的深多了。愿希斯特指引我们。

String.Source: Warlocks. I pray they attack us first.
String.Dest: 是术士！但愿他们会先对我们出手。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was the only company member I didn't always trust. I got the same shivers around him as I do in place like this.
String.Dest: 月尾是我唯一不那么信任的公会成员。我在他身旁发现了一些东西，就像我现在在这里做的一样。

String.Source: So this is your home, huh. It's a fine place to live.
String.Dest: 所以这就是你的家，哈。真是个居住的好地方。

String.Source: These old Nord tombs smell like sweat and flies. Always best to raid them on an empty stomach.
String.Dest: 这些远古诺德墓穴闻着一股臭汗苍蝇味儿。咱最好空着肚子进去。

String.Source: Draugr. At least these mummies have flesh. Nothing feels more awkward than trying to cut bone.
String.Dest: 尸鬼。至少这帮干尸身上还算有点肉。没有什么比直接往骨头上砍所带来的手感更糟的东西了。

String.Source: A Falmer hive. The Hist demands justice. Let's not let any of these eyeless freaks smell tomorrow.
String.Dest: 一个雪精灵的聚居地。历史终须公义，让我们把这帮瞎子都给收拾了吧。

String.Source: How nice of the bandits to all pile together in one place, with no avenue of escape.
String.Dest: 这堆强盗全聚在一个地方唠嗑真是太妙了，看他们还能往哪里逃。

String.Source: Another camp chock full of bandits. So good to see young people taking an interest in crime. Means more bounties for us.
String.Dest: 另一个塞满了强盗的营地。看见这么多年轻人沉溺于犯罪真好。这意味着我们有更多的赏金。

String.Source: Have you ever tried reasoning with bandits? No? Well, you're smarter than you look!
String.Dest: 你还试过跟强盗讲道理? 没？看上去你也不傻啊……

String.Source: Traps, centurions, spiders...that's the thing about Dwarven Ruins. It's almost as if they were expecting us.
String.Dest: 陷阱，百夫长，蜘蛛……整个矮人洞穴装的都是啥玩意？他们不会是故意列队欢迎我们呢吧？！

String.Source: Odd that the technology of the Dwemer was never stolen by the other races. I suppose it isn't as practical as the secret to Nord swill!
String.Dest: 奇怪的是锻莫的技术从未被其他种族窃取。我猜它还没诺德人的废话实用呢！

String.Source: Vampires! If ever there were a more wretched monster, I'd probably faint at the sight of him. So try not to look in my direction.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼！没有比这更卑劣的怪物了，他看我一眼我都可能晕过去。所以不要看我不要看我不要看我。

String.Source: Orc strongholds are full of strong warriors. Says so right in the name.
String.Dest: 兽人要塞全是精英战士。我以我的人格担保。

String.Source: I once tried wielding a blade of orichalcum. Never could get used to the weight.
String.Dest: 我曾经摆弄过一柄黑铜剑。根本习惯不了它那重量。

String.Source: A Giant camp. And here I thought I'd never get a chance to fly.
String.Dest: 一个巨人营地。我还以为自己没机会自由飞翔了呢。

String.Source: Giants! You must want me dead, taking me to a place like this. Well, today's as good a day as any.
String.Dest: 巨人！带我来一个这样的地方，你肯定很想要我死。好吧，今天的确是个好日子。

String.Source: You would've made an excellent addition to our company. Although "Honorable Nine" doesn't quite have the same ring to it. If only we were nefarious!
String.Dest: 你为我们团队又添了辉煌的一笔。尽管神圣九人并没有相似的荣耀……我们要是大坏蛋该多好啊！

String.Source: An inn's a good place for rumors, mercs, and drink. Unless you're the kind who preaches sobriety. If so, I'll have to reevaluate our friendship!
String.Dest: 旅馆是流言的集散地，也是提供雇佣兵和啤酒的好地方。除非你是个推崇节制的家伙，如果是那样，那我得重新审视我们之间的友谊了！

String.Source: So the Companions live in a mead hall, eh? Although I could say the same about every Nord home.
String.Dest: 所以战友团住在蜜酒大厅？……尽管我看见每个诺的人的居住地都会这么说。

String.Source: Whiterun, jewel of Skyrim. Home of the Skyforge and the Companions, but also, the best salmon steak this side of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 白漫城，天际的一颗宝石。战友团和天空熔炉的所在地，当然，也是泰姆瑞尔最美味的三文鱼排的所在地。

String.Source: The banner of Markarth is bronze, green, and gold. The same colors as a lunatic! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 马卡斯城的旗帜是青、绿、金相间的。跟它的愚蠢正搭！(笑声)

String.Source: You sometimes forget that Markarth was a Dwemer ruin before it became a Silver-Blood one.
String.Dest: 有时候你会忘记马卡斯城在银血家族来之前只是片矮人废墟。

String.Source: Some say Dragon Bridge is as old as the Hist, but that's just the Nords waving their branches. Someone should inform them it's not a contest!
String.Dest: 有人说龙桥跟希斯特一样古老。但那只是诺德人在夸夸其谈。应该有人告诉他们这没啥好争的！

String.Source: Dragon Bridge. Suicide central. You could build a bridge to Sovngarde from all the bones lying in the Karth, but I suppose it's easier to jump.
String.Dest: 龙桥。自杀的圣地。你可以用所有埋于卡尔斯里的骨头建一座通往松加德的桥,但我想还是直接跳下去比较容易。

String.Source: I met the former Captain of the Sea Squall when it was docked at Leyawiin. Strange to see that ship now, and to see it a widow.
String.Dest: 我曾经在海风暴号停在雷拉文的时候见过前任船长……很奇怪在这又见到这艘船了，看见这艘船没了主人感觉怪怪的。

String.Source: Hjaalmarch can hardly be called a marsh. What kind of marsh doesn't have fleshflies and green slime?
String.Dest: 希雅陲领几乎不能被称为沼泽，什么样的沼泽才会没有苍蝇和绿色的稀泥？

String.Source: This town has suffered many a tragedy, and yet through it all they endure. The Nords are hard people, traveler.
String.Dest: 这个镇子的惨剧可真够多的啊……尽管他们活该。诺德人还真是冷酷啊，对吧旅行者？

String.Source: The dockworkers here wear their sorrow like a tunic. Is there anything nudity can't solve?
String.Dest: 这些码头工人穿着束腰工作服很难受吧？裸着上身展现健美肌肉不好么？

String.Source: Ah, Windhelm. The Nords do love their stonework! How many blocks does one have to stack upon each other before it's declared a work of art?
String.Dest: 噢，风盔城。诺德人确实很喜欢他们的石雕工艺！在它被宣布是种艺术作品之前，有多少块彼此堆叠在一起了啊？

String.Source: They say in Riften, everyone keeps their head covered, and pointed at the floor.
String.Dest: 他们说在裂谷城，每个人都把他们的脑袋遮住，并垂着头。

String.Source: Black robes and ominous words. The past never tires of mocking the present.
String.Dest: 黑色的长袍与不祥的语言。历史总在不停地嘲讽着现实。

String.Source: Ah, Middas. I joined the Honorable Eight on a Middas. That day was warm, but fresh, unlike any day in Black Marsh.
String.Dest: 啊，周三。就在一个周三，我加入了神圣八人众。那一天很暖和，空气也很新鲜，跟黑沼泽省的任何一天都不一样。

String.Source: I've been told bears in Skyrim won't attack unless provoked. Hah! You'll find less aggression sticking your tail in a hornet's nest!
String.Dest: 有人告诉我在天际省的熊不会主动攻击至少被激怒之前不会。哈！结果你会发现熊的进攻就像你的尾巴上粘着一个马蜂窝一样！

String.Source: Anyone who ever complains about the rain has never been to Black Marsh. There's a reason they call it "Hist Piss."
String.Dest: 抱怨过下雨的人他们肯定没去过黑沼泽省.这就是为啥那被叫做 "希斯特的尿池"的缘故。

String.Source: There are times I thought of returning to the marsh. I made it as far as Riften before realizing just how far the journey was.
