String.Dest: 有几次我想过回沼泽去，在我意识到这旅行的距离之前我还以为就和到裂谷城一样远。

String.Source: The north is a fine place to die. Wind on your scales, snow under your feet. Your past swept away in a patina of frost.
String.Dest: 死在北方是一个不错的选择。风吹过你的鳞片，雪堆在你脚下。你的过去在一片冰霜的光泽中被抹去。

String.Source: This town reeks of the dead. The odor is sour, pungent. Gets right under your scales.
String.Dest: 这座城市充斥着死亡。酸涩辛辣的气味儿满溢。注意把握好你的分寸。

String.Source: I've heard Windhelm is unkind to Argonians. Nonsense! Why, the other day a landstrider offered to spit in my drink! In Black Marsh, they don't ask.
String.Dest: 我听说风舵城对亚龙人并不友好。胡扯！问我为什么那样说？某天一只爬行类问我能不能在我杯子里吐一口痰！要是在黑沼泽省，他们在那样做之前问都不会问呢。

String.Source: The marsh is a good place to catch dragonflies. Bright ones are like the day, good for stamina. Dark ones are like night, for to sleep is to heal.
String.Dest: 沼泽是个抓蜻蜓的好地方。亮色的蜻蜓就像阳光一样，有益于补充耐力。而暗色的蜻蜓就像夜色一样，能让你睡个好觉得到充分的休息。

String.Source: Sometimes when the fog is thick, I'll wade through the thorny brambles, or stand in the shadow of a mangrove, and think of home.
String.Dest: 有的时候雾很浓，我就到带刺的草丛里走上一趟，或者站在红树的影子里，想家。

String.Source: The flora and insects in Hjaalmarch make it ideal for alchemists. For chaurus, the abundance of alchemists makes it an ideal place for lunch.
String.Dest: 希雅陲领的植物和昆虫简直就是炼金师的天堂啊！对于查鲁斯来说，炼金师的那些废弃材料就够他们吃喝不愁了。

String.Source: They say the Dragonborn comes, but I haven't the faintest clue where you're going. Perhaps we ought to stop and ask fate for directions.
String.Dest: 他们都说龙裔来了，但是他们没有一丁点的证据证明你的位置……要不咱们也停下脚步问问圣灵们你的未来方向？

String.Source: Nightmares, pirates, surly miners...what's not to like about Dawnstar?
String.Dest: 噩梦，海盗，总是板着脸的矿工……你对晨星城的还有哪些地方不满意呢？

String.Source: I'm beginning to think this city's Argonian population is wherever I happen to be standing.
String.Dest: 我开始感激这座城市对亚龙人的包容，这也是我站在这里的支柱。

String.Source: I'm beginning to think this city's Argonian population is wherever we happen to be standing.
String.Dest: 我开始觉得，这个城市的亚龙人总数……也就是你面前站着的的亚龙人的全部数量了……

String.Source: If bandits are ransoming captives, then there's a chance they're still alive. Even if we don't find this man's wife, there may be others.
String.Dest: 如果强盗只是绑票，那他们有可能还活着。就算我们不能找到那个男人的老婆，那也能找到其他人质。

String.Source: I don't know what the Forsworn want with Dibella, but if you're dabbling with witchcraft, whatever reasons you have can't be good.
String.Dest: 我不知道弃誓者要迪贝拉的人做什么，不过对于碰过巫术的人，不管什么原因都好不到哪儿去。

String.Source: It's some kind of blood sacrifice. The Falmer used to be Elves. And just as their hearts have turned black, so has their magic.
String.Dest: 那是一种血祭。伐莫曾经是精灵族。当它们的心灵被黑暗扭曲的时候，它们的魔法也是。

String.Source: Silver ingots? Rubies? And he wants to turn that into incense? I don't know, traveler, are you sure those aren't code words for skooma?
String.Dest: 银锭？红宝石？他说要把这些化为一缕香气？我不明白，旅行者，你确定那些不是指代斯库玛的暗号吗？

String.Source: I've heard about this ship. They call it the Dainty Sload. Ha, maybe I'll call my ship the portly skeleton!
String.Dest: 我听说过这艘船。他们叫它“优雅斯洛德号”。哈，也许我把我自己的船叫做“肥胖的骨头号”！

String.Source: There's a lot of evidence that points to the Falmer. Arrows, ears...it's almost too much. Like it was planted. Ah, maybe I'm over-thinking it.
String.Dest: 有很多的证据指向了雪精灵。箭啊，耳朵什么的……简直是太多了，雪精灵的这些东西就像是一夜之间长出来了一样，也许我得思考一番。

String.Source: I'd say this was a strange place for a Giant camp, but then again, what do I know? This might be the perfect place for them to be.
String.Dest: 我想说，这里作为一个巨人营地来说太奇怪了，但是，谁知道呢？或许这对他们来说是个绝佳的地点。

String.Source: Widow's Watch is a very sad name. I wonder how many husbands and wives watched the sea, waiting for soldiers who would never come home.
String.Dest: 望夫塔，多么令人忧伤的地方。有多少人总是注视着那海平面，守望着那些上了战场却不会再归来的另一半。

String.Source: Look at these bandits. They had nice little camp by the water, with plenty of food and a warm fire. They thought of everything it seems. Except us.
String.Dest: 啧啧啧，看看那些强盗……洁净水源旁边的营地、足够的食物、温暖的篝火……他们居然还想要更多？当然我确信这个“更多”的名单里没有我们的存在。

String.Source: You could pay the sellswords to leave, but they'd just come back the moment they ran out of gold. If you want them gone, you pay them with steel.
String.Dest: 你可以付钱让那些雇佣兵离开，但一旦他们手头的钱花完了就又会回来找你。如果你想要让他们永远消失，那你就得用剑来对付他们。

String.Source: Hagravens betraying each other? Well, can't say I'm surprised. If anything, I'm surprised it doesn't happen more often.
String.Dest: 乌鸦鬼婆会经常背叛彼此？嗯哼，也不是说我有多惊讶。真要说的话，我很惊讶这种背叛情形居然不是每一次都发生。

String.Source: I don't think that regiment's coming. The Jarl needs every available guard to be outside his chambers and ready to polish his boots.
String.Dest: 我不认为大部队马上就要来了。真的要来的话，领主一般会召集每一个守卫站在他房间的门口准备好给他擦皮鞋。

String.Source: You know, I'm beginning to suspect that bandits just aren't very smart.
String.Dest: 知道吗，我开始发现强盗们脑子都不大灵光了。

String.Source: This Forsworn camp overlooks Rorikstead, but that isn't part of the Reach. Something tells me these Bretons have their eyes trained elsewhere.
String.Dest: 这个弃誓者营地能俯瞰整个洛利克镇，可那不是瑞驰的地盘。看来这帮布莱顿人还是有野心啊。

String.Source: The Gildergreen's back, but I don't know...bringing the dead back to life doesn't seem all that holy. If anything, it's necromancy.
String.Dest: 翠苒树恢复了生机，但我不知道……让死物复生好像并不那么神圣。要说的话，这完全是死灵法术。

String.Source: You did the smart thing, traveler. The Gildergreen was already dead, and trying to keep the dead alive isn't priestly. It's necromancy.
String.Dest: 你做了件聪明事儿，旅行者。翠苒树已经死了，试图让死去的东西复活不是牧师的事儿，那得用巫术。

String.Source: Animal sacrifices, witches, and hags. I've got a feeling this Priestess of Kynareth is playing with dark forces, and making a foul bargain.
String.Dest: 动物祭品。巫师，和女巫。我老感觉这个凯娜瑞斯的女祭司在跟那些黑暗势力厮混在一起，想搞什么肮脏的交易呢。

String.Source: Something tells me Saadia isn't telling the whole story. Then again, neither are the Alik'r!
String.Dest: 某种感觉告诉我萨迪亚没说完全，然后这次也是，阿利克尔也在遮掩什么！

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: What, that dragon trying to bite your head off wasn't evidence enough?
String.Dest: 什么，那龙差点咬下你的脑袋还不够证明的吗？

String.Source: Some say all dragons are monsters, but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 一些人说所有的龙都是恶魔……我可不这么确定。

String.Source: But I jest, Dragonborn. Truth is, I get what you're saying. No one's seen a dragon in thousands of years. They might not all be godless killers!
String.Dest: 但我是开玩笑的，龙裔。事实上，我知道你在说什么。几千年以来，没人见过龙。也许他们并不都是邪恶的杀手！

String.Source: Some say all dragons are monsters, but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 一些人说所有的龙都是恶魔……我可不这么确定。

String.Source: Some say all dragons are monsters, but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 一些人说所有的龙都是恶魔……我可不这么确定。

String.Source: Yet if I were you, I wouldn't be in a hurry to invite them to dinner. It's more likely one of you will end up the main course!
String.Dest: 如果我是你，我就不会急着请他们去吃晚餐。很有可能你们中的一个就会当成主菜被吃了！！

String.Source: I've seen their teeth. I've smelled their breath. I wasn't impressed.
String.Dest: 我见过他们的牙，闻到过他们的呼吸，我不觉得有什么好。

String.Source: Wasn't Helgen turned into rubble? Seeing that probably would've impressed me!
String.Dest: 海尔根不是变成一堆废墟了吗？光是看看备不住就能留给我深刻的印象！

String.Source: Maybe ten years ago, I would've thought like you. Whether it was dragons or Daedric Princes, I thought I could take them all.
String.Dest: 也许十年前我不会像你这样思考问题，不管是巨龙还是魔族王子，我想我都能把他们全都干掉。

String.Source: I've seen their teeth. I've smelled their breath. I wasn't impressed.
String.Dest: 我见过他们的牙，闻到过他们的呼吸，我不觉得有什么好。

String.Source: But Dalum-Ei was always teaching me, and over time, some of the words managed to stick in my scales.
String.Dest: 但是达卢姆‧艾一直在教导我。时间长到他的一些话都陷入我的鳞片了。

String.Source: I've seen their teeth. I've smelled their breath. I wasn't impressed.
String.Dest: 我见过他们的牙，闻到过他们的呼吸，我不觉得有什么好。

String.Source: I've seen their teeth. I've smelled their breath. I wasn't impressed.
String.Dest: 我见过他们的牙，闻到过他们的呼吸，我不觉得有什么好。

String.Source: So it's only right I pass those words on to you. It's okay to be confident in your abilities. Just don't underestimate your opponent's.
String.Dest: 我把这消息告诉你真是太好了。对自己能力有自信没问题。总之别低估了你对手的实力。

String.Source: The townsfolk may have suspected him, but thankfully they never acted.
String.Dest: 镇上的居民可能怀疑过他，不过幸好他们没表现出来。

String.Source: Falion probably has Idgrod to thank for that. Although I suppose the townsfolk are the lucky ones.
String.Dest: 法利昂可能让伊格罗德为那件事情致谢了。但我还是觉得市民们才是幸运的一方。

String.Source: Outside of maybe Benor, the townsfolk are just that. Townsfolk. And even Benor's biggest weapon is that mudcrab he calls a face!
String.Dest: 就连本诺，那帮镇民也一样对待。那帮镇民们。本诺最大的武器就是他称为脸面的那只泥沼蟹啊。

String.Source: The townsfolk may have suspected him, but thankfully they never acted.
String.Dest: 镇上的居民可能怀疑过他，不过幸好他们没表现出来。

String.Source: Oh, you missed out. Ancano's dying screams were sweet, sweet poetry.
String.Dest: 哦，你错过好戏了。安卡诺那垂死的尖叫简直比诗歌还甜美。

String.Source: (Laughs) I imagine it was. Some might say that's Dark Brotherhood talk, but those people never suffered a loss. Vengeance is sweeter than moon sugar.
String.Dest: (笑声)我猜是的。一些人可能觉得这是黑暗兄弟才会说的话，但那是因为这些人从未遭受过什么损失。复仇可是比月亮糖更加甜蜜的东西。

String.Source: Oh, you missed out. Ancano's dying screams were sweet, sweet poetry.
String.Dest: 哦，你错过好戏了。安卡诺那垂死的尖叫简直比诗歌还甜美。

String.Source: My old company friend, Bodan, was driven by it. He spent his entire life in Black Marsh hunting the Argonian who slew his love.
String.Dest: 我的老朋友，波登，他就是为此而活的。他在黑沼泽省度过了一生，只为搜寻那个杀掉了他爱人的亚龙人。

String.Source: Oh, you missed out. Ancano's dying screams were sweet, sweet poetry.
String.Dest: 哦，你错过好戏了。安卡诺那垂死的尖叫简直比诗歌还甜美。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei assured him he would get his vengeance. That was his condition for joining the Honorable Eight. It was a promise I wish he kept.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾向他保证他复仇成功的。这也是他加入神圣八人众的条件。我希望他一直继续这个承诺。

String.Source: Oh, you missed out. Ancano's dying screams were sweet, sweet poetry.
String.Dest: 哦，你错过好戏了。安卡诺那垂死的尖叫简直比诗歌还甜美。

String.Source: But I'm glad you got yours. Mirabelle and Savos can rest easy knowing you avenged their deaths.
String.Dest: 但是我很高兴你能如愿以偿。米拉贝尔和萨沃斯知道你替他们的死报仇的话肯定能安息了。

String.Source: (Laughs) As long as you let me pay for it! What kind of lizard would I be if I didn't buy a drink for the savior of Skyrim!
String.Dest: (笑声) 只要你让我掏钱！要是我不请上天际的救星喝上一杯的话我就是个超级大二逼。

String.Source: This isn't goodbye. I'll slay that dragon, and we'll go for a drink.
String.Dest: 这不是告别。我会杀了那头龙，之后我们可以去喝一杯。

String.Source: And I reckon you'll save it. That's what heroes do, and you Dragonborn, are one for the ages.
String.Dest: 我打赌你会搞定这一切的。这才是英雄真正的意义啊……你，龙裔必会在历史上写下浓厚的一笔。

String.Source: This isn't goodbye. I'll slay that dragon, and we'll go for a drink.
String.Dest: 这不是告别。我会杀了那头龙，之后我们可以去喝一杯。

String.Source: Now go on. Slay that dragon. I've got to track down the Jarl's maid. I bet the floor here hasn't been swept for ages, with all this dust in my eyes.
String.Dest: 继续吧，去屠龙吧。我已经查到了领主的女儿。这地板多少年没扫过了？这么厚一层灰！

String.Source: This isn't goodbye. I'll slay that dragon, and we'll go for a drink.
String.Dest: 这不是告别。我会杀了那头龙，之后我们可以去喝一杯。

String.Source: There's prestige with the name, but also pressure to live up to it.
String.Dest: 这个名字很有威信，但要想不辜负它同样很有压力。

String.Source: I can't even imagine. Our company had to live up to an ideal, but the only people we let down was ourselves.
String.Dest: 这真是超乎我的想象了。我们的队伍应当承担起一个理想，而我们偏偏就让自己失望了。

String.Source: There's prestige with the name, but also pressure to live up to it.
String.Dest: 这个名字很有威信，但要想不辜负它同样很有压力。

String.Source: But Ysgramor is a real person, and he's up there in Sovngarde, shaking his finger at Torvar every time he gets drunk.
String.Dest: 但伊斯格拉谟是个真实存在的人，而他现在正在松加德，每每喝醉了就对着托瓦尔指手画脚呢。

String.Source: Or maybe he's nodding his head in approval. I can't tell with these Nords if drinking yourself stupid is a sin.
String.Dest: 或者说他点着头表示支持？我不能跟诺德人说出他们的窘况……如果喝多了出丑也算一种罪过的话。

String.Source: There's prestige with the name, but also pressure to live up to it.
String.Dest: 这个名字很有威信，但要想不辜负它同样很有压力。

String.Source: (Laughs) What if we put it in a canteen, and made it look like it was water? You know, the way mothers trick their hatchlings into taking medicine?
String.Dest: (笑声) 要是我们把它放到水罐里，然后让它看起来像水一样会怎么样？你懂得，这是那些妈妈让她们的小崽子吃药的方法。

String.Source: It would just go to waste on these idiots.
String.Dest: 反正都要浪费在这些蠢货们身上了。

String.Source: Sure, the Greybeards may be our elders, and have probably forgotten more things than we'll ever learn, but we know what's best for them.
String.Dest: 当然，灰胡子可能是我们的长辈，忘了的东西比我们学到的还多，但我们知道什么是对他们最好的。

String.Source: It would just go to waste on these idiots.
String.Dest: 反正都要浪费在这些蠢货们身上了。

String.Source: Thought I'd say hello before you became Chaurus chow.
String.Dest: 在你变成查鲁斯的美餐之前，我应该先跟你打个招呼。

String.Source: Ha! Don't worry, I'll makes sure your cousin gets plenty of exercise before he chews my leg off.
String.Dest: 哈！没事！你的亲戚在把我的腿咬烂之前会刷出来不少经验值的！

String.Source: By the way, I know the Greybeards. They are still whiny children.
String.Dest: 顺便一提，我知道灰胡子。他们仍然是爱发牢骚的孩子。

String.Source: (Laughs) But they have beards! Gray ones, even. That makes them wise.
String.Dest: (笑声)但是他们有胡子啊！灰色的胡子，让他们看上去更聪明的胡子。

String.Source: By the way, I know the Greybeards. They are still whiny children.
String.Dest: 顺便一提，我知道灰胡子。他们仍然是爱发牢骚的孩子。

String.Source: Maybe if our company had more whiskers, we would've never made that horrible mistake.
String.Dest: 如果我们的伙伴有更多的胡须，我们也许就不会犯那个可怕的错误了。

String.Source: You're a clever one! Saw right through my glib response. Alright, I'll tell you, but it's a long story, so you might want to sit down for this one.
String.Dest: 挺聪明的嘛！竟然看懂了我的暗示。好吧，我会告诉你，但这是个很长的故事，你得坐下来仔细听听。

String.Source: There's obviously more to it than just being Argonian.
String.Dest: 很明显，不只是成为亚龙人而已。

String.Source: Strong will, maybe. Strong character? Tell that to all the people I've killed.
String.Dest: 强大的意志，也许。强大的性格？去告诉那些我杀了的人吧。

String.Source: Well, I guess not. Sometimes I forget that being a legendary hero doesn't make you perfect!
String.Dest: 好吧，我想或许不是。有时我会忘记，成为一个传奇英雄并不会使你变得完美。

String.Source: Strong will, maybe. Strong character? Tell that to all the people I've killed.
String.Dest: 强大的意志，也许。强大的性格？去告诉那些我杀了的人吧。

String.Source: Besides, you're the only thing standing between us and the dragons. Good, evil, at this point it doesn't matter. We're all on your side.
String.Dest: 而且，只有你挡在巨龙面前，保护我们。善良也好，邪恶也罢，此时此刻都已不再重要。我们都站在你这一边。

String.Source: Strong will, maybe. Strong character? Tell that to all the people I've killed.
String.Dest: 强大的意志，也许。强大的性格？去告诉那些我杀了的人吧。

String.Source: Still, it'd be nice if you kept your murdering sprees to corrupt nobles and Thalmor. And say, it turns out you'll be entertaining both! Good luck.
String.Dest: 不过，如果你能继续疯狂谋杀堕落的贵族和梭默的话，那一定很赞。其实，原来你也挺会娱乐的。祝你好运。

String.Source: I find white lies and drunken confessions to be in the spirit of honor.
String.Dest: 我认为善意的谎言与酒后的忏悔是同样值得荣耀的。

String.Source: That may be true, but even knowing your intentions were good is not enough to absolve. Knowing...won't rid you of the shame.
String.Dest: 也许这是真的。但就算知道你的本意是好的，也不足以得以宽恕。要知道……你摆脱不掉这种羞耻。

String.Source: Gabania's dead. I saw the knife go in his back.
String.Dest: 卡贝尼亚死了。我看见刀锋往他的背上画去。

String.Source: Then maybe that's the end of it. But I don't know. Powerful men have a way of lingering, even after death.
String.Dest: 也许就那样结束了吧。不过我不确定。强者自有他绵绵不绝的影响力，即使是死后。

String.Source: I'm just glad Bodan isn't around to hear this awful bard lay waste to his work.
String.Dest: 我只是高兴波登不在附近，听不到这个可恶的吟游诗人破坏他的工作。

String.Source: I can't disagree more, traveler. Bodan must have recognized a kindred spirit. Someone with her own ghosts.
String.Dest: 我完全赞同，旅行者。波登一定感受到了血脉中的灵魂相通，有些还是他自己的灵魂。

String.Source: I'm just glad Bodan isn't around to hear this awful bard lay waste to his work.
String.Dest: 我只是高兴波登不在附近，听不到这个可恶的吟游诗人破坏他的工作。

String.Source: When Bodan played, it was as much for him than it was for his love. When he released all that anger, he was able to better hide his pain.
String.Dest: 当波登演奏时，他完全地投入其中。他把愤怒都释放出来，这样他可以更好地把痛苦埋藏在心里。

String.Source: Yet for all its rage and defiance, in the end, what I hear most is sadness. That's what the Hist heard too, and what moved them to listen.
String.Dest: 到现在他所有的愤怒与反抗，我最后听到最多的是悲伤。希斯特也听到了，这也是使他们去倾听的动力。

String.Source: I'm just glad Bodan isn't around to hear this awful bard lay waste to his work.
String.Dest: 我只是高兴波登不在附近，听不到这个可恶的吟游诗人破坏他的工作。

String.Source: They say the trees cry for no one, but when he played, I know in my heart they wept for him.
String.Dest: 他们说大树不为任何人哭泣，但是当他演出的时候，我知道在我心里大树是为他而哭。

String.Source: I'm just glad Bodan isn't around to hear this awful bard lay waste to his work.
String.Dest: 我只是高兴波登不在附近，听不到这个可恶的吟游诗人破坏他的工作。

String.Source: Yes. Beautiful, sad, and angry. A lost love, a death without an answer, and Gods who cared not for either.
String.Dest: 是的，美丽，难过和愤怒。一个失落的爱， 一个没有答案的死亡，不是任何人都会被圣灵所在意。

String.Source: It was a beautiful song.
String.Dest: 这真是一首优美的歌曲。

String.Source: It was a beautiful song.
String.Dest: 这真是一首优美的歌曲。

String.Source: But as I said the day we met, despite what Bodan may think, in the end the sheer force of that song drove the Hist to listen.
String.Dest: 不过正如我们第一次见面时我说的那样，不管波登是怎么想的，那首歌的澎湃力量最终让希斯特圣树侧耳聆听。

String.Source: They say the trees cry for no one, but when he played, I know in my heart they wept for him.
String.Dest: 他们说大树不为任何人哭泣，但是当他演出的时候，我知道在我心里大树是为他而哭。

String.Source: It was a beautiful song.
String.Dest: 这真是一首优美的歌曲。

String.Source: Then traveler, I'd say you were a sodding Draugr, because damn if you don't have a heart.
String.Dest: 那么旅行者，我会说你是个该死的尸鬼，因为你他妈的没有良心。

String.Source: I didn't really care for the song to be honest. No wonder he tossed it aside.
String.Dest: 老实说我真的不在意那首歌儿。更别说他弃之不顾怎么的。该我何事。

String.Source: I didn't really care for the song to be honest. No wonder he tossed it aside.
String.Dest: 老实说我真的不在意那首歌儿。更别说他弃之不顾怎么的。该我何事。

String.Source: Bodan may think his prayers went unanswered, but the force of that song made the Hist listen.
String.Dest: 波登也许会想他的祷告从未被回应，但那首歌蕴含的力量让使得希斯特神树倾听。

String.Source: I didn't really care for the song to be honest. No wonder he tossed it aside.
String.Dest: 老实说我真的不在意那首歌儿。更别说他弃之不顾怎么的。该我何事。

String.Source: They say the trees cry for no one, but when he played, I know in my heart they wept for him.
String.Dest: 他们说大树不为任何人哭泣，但是当他演出的时候，我知道在我心里大树是为他而哭。

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei told me that vengeance is a powerful weapon, but like all things of great strength, it has the power to consume.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾跟我说过，仇恨是一件威力很大的武器，但是如所有的强力装备一样，它会反噬。

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: In his last days, I was thankful to get a glimpse of who Bodan really was, and not the man he was pretending to be.
String.Dest: 在他最后的日子里，我很感激我得到了身为波登应得的目光，而不是他假装是的那个人。

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: Back then, Bodan wore a mask of courtesy, and the only time he took it off was to play that song.
String.Dest: 在那时，波登时刻戴着善意的面具，而只有在他演奏那首乐曲时，他才将那伪善的面具摘下来过。

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: He may still think the Gods ignored him, but the force of that song drove the Hist to listen.
String.Dest: 他可能仍认为众神忽视了他，但这首歌蕴藏的力量驱使希斯特去聆听。

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: They say the trees cry for no one, but when he played, I know in my heart they wept for him.
String.Dest: 他们说大树不为任何人哭泣，但是当他演出的时候，我知道在我心里大树是为他而哭。

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. I'll do my best to remember the fallen. Moon-Tail, for his surprises, Arnwulf for his laugh.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者。我会尽力记住那些逝者的。我会记住特别容易吃惊的月尾，还有总喜欢开怀大笑的阿恩武夫。

String.Source: In any case, this is how it ends. Your company has its peace.
String.Dest: 无论如何，就这样结束了。你们也得以安宁了。

String.Source: Bodan for his wisdom, Ula-Wei for his cunning, and Elia, for being the sister I never had.
String.Dest: 波登是因为他的智慧，乌拉卫因为他的可爱，伊利亚，是因为她就像一个我从未有过的妹妹。

String.Source: In any case, this is how it ends. Your company has its peace.
String.Dest: 无论如何，就这样结束了。你们也得以安宁了。

String.Source: And of course, Dalum-Ei, for taking pity on a little hatchling from the swamp and showing her the way.
String.Dest: 还有达卢姆‧艾，当然了。记得他是因为他给我这个沼泽来的小可怜虫展示了前路。

String.Source: In any case, this is how it ends. Your company has its peace.
String.Dest: 无论如何，就这样结束了。你们也得以安宁了。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei was an honorable knight. May the Gods take his soul.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾是个正直诚实的骑士，愿他的灵魂能够安息。

String.Source: He was. I know someday, wherever the Hist takes us, we'll all see each other again, and for once, we'll never have to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 他确实是的。总有一天希斯特会带我们到达永生之国，在那里我们还会再见面，永不分离。

String.Source: I don't know what's right or wrong anymore. All I know is today, I lost two friends.
String.Dest: 我不知道什么是对，什么是错。我只知道今天，我失去了两个朋友。

String.Source: He did what he thought was right. Even when it was so wrong.
String.Dest: 他做了自己认为是正确的事。即使那其实是错的。

String.Source: Sometimes, there isn't a right or wrong. It's just the way its.
String.Dest: 很多时候是没什么具体的对或者错。事情就应该是那样。

String.Source: Well said, traveler. Dalum-Ei had his honor, and I had mine. Either way, I'm glad you were here with me, to help me defend it.
String.Dest: 说的好，旅行者。达卢姆‧艾有他的荣耀，而我也有我的。无论如何，我很高兴你和我来这儿，帮我扞卫我的荣耀。

String.Source: Do you need some time alone?
String.Dest: 你需要一些独处的时间吗？

String.Source: No, I'll be alright traveler. I just needed a moment to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 不，我会没事的。我只是需要点时间道别。

String.Source: For all he did, and all he put me through, I still forgive him. More than that, I understand him. All he ever wanted was to be clean.
String.Dest: 因为他所做的一切，以及所有他帮助我的，我还是原谅了他。更重要的是，我了解他。所有他所想要的是变得正派。

String.Source: Do you need some time alone?
String.Dest: 你需要一些独处的时间吗？

String.Source: Maybe, but he was also a great leader, and a true knight. I mourn his loss as I do the others.
String.Dest: 也许吧，不过他也确实是个伟人，真正的骑士。我对他的哀悼像对其他人一样。

String.Source: He was a deranged lunatic.
String.Dest: 他是个精神错乱的疯子。

String.Source: No. As much as I don't want to believe it...Bodan's words ring true.
String.Dest: 不，尽管我不想去相信...但波登的话确实是真的。

String.Source: We should kill them both. It's the only way to ensure our safety.
String.Dest: 我们应该把他俩都杀了。这样才能保证我们的安全。

String.Source: But maybe we can still do something. Come on, they must have left for the marsh. It's the only place they could be alone.
String.Dest: 但也许我们还可以做些什么。来吧，他们必须去沼泽。这是他们唯一独处之地。

String.Source: We should kill them both. It's the only way to ensure our safety.
String.Dest: 我们应该把他俩都杀了。这样才能保证我们的安全。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei suggested Bodan was the traitor.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾暗示波登就是那个叛徒。

String.Source: Well then, by the Hist, maybe they're both wrong. Either way, we have to find them before they do something stupid.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上，那么也许他们都错了。无论如何，我们都必须在他们做出什么傻事儿之前找到他们。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei suggested Bodan was the traitor.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾暗示波登就是那个叛徒。

String.Source: If they're going to fight, it'd be somewhere they were both comfortable. The marsh. It has to be there!
String.Dest: 如果他们要干架，有个地方他俩肯定都满意。就是那片沼泽。它就在那儿！

String.Source: There's only one place I can think of. The marsh. Come on, maybe we can still do something!
String.Dest: 我能想到的只有一个地方。沼泽。快走，也许我们还能做点儿什么。

String.Source: He isn't dead yet. Where would they go?
String.Dest: 他还没死。他们要去哪？

String.Source: Bodan has always been polite, but he's never been one to hide his true feelings. If he wanted us dead, I'd know. Let me see that note.
String.Dest: 波登一直谦逊有礼，但他从不是一个会隐藏自己真实感情的人。如果他想让我们死，我会知道的。让我看看这笔记吧。

String.Source: It's just more of Bodan's lies.
String.Dest: 这只不过是波登的又一个谎言罢了。

String.Source: It's just more of Bodan's lies.
String.Dest: 这只不过是波登的又一个谎言罢了。

String.Source: No...this says Dalum-Ei betrayed us...and Bodan...
String.Dest: 不……上面说达卢姆‧艾背叛了我们……还有波登...

String.Source: Dalum-Ei is the assassin.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾就是那个刺客。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei? No, I...I refuse to believe it! Let me see that note.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾? 不, 我...我不相信! 让我看看那纸条.

String.Source: Dalum-Ei is the assassin.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾就是那个刺客。

String.Source: Bodan...thank you.
String.Dest: 波登……谢了……

String.Source: I don't know how you can be so excited. I'm frightened for our lives.
String.Dest: 我真不知道你怎么能这么兴奋……咱们能活下来吧！

String.Source: Is that so? Then I'd hate to see you when you're angry! (Laughs) You just need to trust in your companions, and you'll feel as strong as the Hist.
String.Dest: 真的假的？你发怒的时候我可不想看到你！（笑声）相信你的战友，你会和希斯特一样强壮。

String.Source: I don't know how you can be so excited. I'm frightened for our lives.
String.Dest: 我真不知道你怎么能这么兴奋……咱们能活下来吧！

String.Source: In any case, let's go back to Morthal. If this Baron isn't responsible, maybe Bodan knows who is.
String.Dest: 无论如何，让我们会墨索尔城去吧。若这个男爵并不可靠，那说不定波登会知道谁才比较可靠。

String.Source: If we're lucky, maybe he'll leave a few for us.
String.Dest: 如果咱们运气好，也许他会给我们留点东西。

String.Source: I never knew Bodan to be that generous! We better hurry, or he might kill this assassin too! That old bard always did hog the glory!
String.Dest: 我不认为波登会宽容别人！我们最好快点，不然他会把这个刺客也杀了！老不死吟游诗人总想抢头功!

String.Source: Let's go back to Morthal. If this Baron isn't responsible, maybe Bodan knows who is.
String.Dest: 咱们回墨索尔城吧。如果这个男爵不负责，也许波登知道该谁负责的。

String.Source: If we're lucky, maybe he'll leave a few for us.
String.Dest: 如果咱们运气好，也许他会给我们留点东西。

String.Source: Maybe even a mage thrown in as well! (Laughs) And why not? When all of us are together, I feel almost invincible. Let's go.
String.Dest: 也许一个法师也加入！(笑声) 为什么不呢? 当我们在一起，我觉得我们所向披靡。我们走吧.

String.Source: Let's pray he gets twice the sellswords we did. You can never have enough.
String.Dest: 让我们祈祷他有比我们多两倍的佣兵吧。反正来多少对你都无关紧要。

String.Source: I am, and I'm not. It's different when we're all working together...I get that old feeling...like the Gods and the Hist are on our side.
String.Dest: 我是，而我又不是。不同的是当我们一起干活儿时……我老感觉……众神和希斯特是站在我们这边的。

String.Source: You aren't worried about this assassin?
String.Dest: 你不担心这个刺客吗？

String.Source: You aren't worried about this assassin?
String.Dest: 你不担心这个刺客吗？

String.Source: In any case, let's go back to Morthal. If this Baron isn't responsible, maybe Bodan knows who is.
String.Dest: 无论如何，让我们会墨索尔城去吧。若这个男爵并不可靠，那说不定波登会知道谁才比较可靠。

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: It's not. And I don't mean from assassins, but from himself.
String.Dest: 并不是。我不是在说刺客，而是在说他自己。

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: Bodan never really got over his wife's death. I don't know if I told you this, but every day he was with us was a fight to keep him alive.
String.Dest: 波登一直没有从她妻子离世的悲痛中真正振作起来。我不知道这事儿有没有跟你说过，但是每天我们都跟他在一起，就是怕他想不开了。

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: Dalum-Ei used vengeance to motivate him. Looking into his eyes, I wonder if that's all but settled.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾常常用复仇来刺激他。看着他的眼睛， 我不知道这一切是否妥当。

String.Source: But honor is a funny thing. Sometimes, it trumps even love. We may not be a company, but he'd never abandon us now.
String.Dest: 但是荣誉是一个有趣的事情。有时候,它甚至胜过爱情。我们或许不是同伴,但他却从未放弃过我们。

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: If he thinks this is the best way to go about it, then I trust him.
String.Dest: 如果他觉得这是最好的处理方式，那我相信他。

String.Source: It's a shame your company couldn't reunite under better circumstances.
String.Dest: 你和你的小伙伴不能在个好一点的环境下重逢真是太遗憾了。

String.Source: Truth be told, it was always going to be in death.
String.Dest: 说实话，它总是得迈向死亡。

String.Source: It's a shame your company couldn't reunite under better circumstances.
String.Dest: 你和你的小伙伴不能在个好一点的环境下重逢真是太遗憾了。

String.Source: Maybe that's what the mourner's clothes were for, so when I saw them next, at least I'd be properly attired.
String.Dest: 也许那就是为什么要穿悼衣的缘故，这样我下次再见到他们时，至少我的穿着整齐得体。

String.Source: It's a shame your company couldn't reunite under better circumstances.
String.Dest: 你和你的小伙伴不能在个好一点的环境下重逢真是太遗憾了。

String.Source: I never thought I would be mourning them in this way.
String.Dest: 我可从来没想过会用这种方式悼念他们。

String.Source: No, I don't think I'm going to be alright. Not for a while. I'm going to be confused, frustrated, and angry.
String.Dest: 不，我并不认为我会变得更好。用不了多久，我会变得糊涂、失落和愤怒。

String.Source: Are you going to be alright?
String.Dest: 你还好么？

String.Source: Still, I appreciate the concern, traveler. At times like this, I'm reminded what it is I value most, and why I have to see this through.
String.Dest: 总之，我感谢你的关心，旅行者！每当这种时候，我就想起我最珍惜的应该是什么，还有我为什么要看透这些。

String.Source: Are you going to be alright?
String.Dest: 你还好么？

String.Source: I'm sorry about your friends.
String.Dest: 关于你的朋友我很抱歉。

String.Source: (Sigh) As am I. It seems like I'm always mourning someone. There will be plenty of time for that though, when this business is done.
String.Dest: (叹气) 我也是。我受够了参加一个有一个的葬礼了。一切都搞定之后我会有足够的时间来好好悼念的。

String.Source: I'm sorry about your friends.
String.Dest: 关于你的朋友我很抱歉。

String.Source: For now, I just want to do right by the ones that are living.
String.Dest: 而现在，我只想要给那些还活着的人公平的对待。

String.Source: Even a good bottle of ale will leave you in the end. A good friend never will.
String.Dest: 即使是一瓶再好的啤酒最终也会离你而去，但一个好朋友永远不会。

String.Source: I'd feel better if I had some ale by my side, but I guess you'll do.
String.Dest: 随身带点麦芽酒确实不错，不过我估计你会带的。

String.Source: I'd feel better if I had some ale by my side, but I guess you'll do.
String.Dest: 随身带点麦芽酒确实不错，不过我估计你会带的。

String.Source: That is, not unless someone takes them, and I won't stand idly by while they do.
String.Dest: 不过呢，除非有人从我身边把它们拿走，但我可不会放任它们就那样消失。

String.Source: This isn't for you. I go where the challenge is greatest.
String.Dest: 这不是因为你，哪里有最艰难的挑战哪里就有我。

String.Source: Fair enough. Then let's find this murdering lord, and test both our mettle.
String.Dest: 很公平。那就让我们把这家伙打得落花流水来测测我们的胆量吧。

String.Source: Your fight is my fight. We do this together.
String.Dest: 你的战斗就是我的战斗。我们一起来。

String.Source: You're a true friend. Even better, you're a strong one. This Baron has no idea who he's messing with.
String.Dest: 你是个真正的朋友。不只如此，你还很强。这个拜伦可不知道他在找谁的麻烦。

String.Source: You and Dalum-Ei go have your little chat. I'll be here.
String.Dest: 你跟达卢姆‧艾侃大山去吧，我在这。

String.Source: Get some rest, traveler. I'm sure Dalum-Ei will have a plan when he's ready.
String.Dest: 去歇会儿吧，旅行者。我相信当达卢姆‧艾准备好了，他会有个计划的。

String.Source: I know this isn't your fight, traveler, but whoever killed the others must be one damn good fighter, and I'd feel better if you were by my side.
String.Dest: 我知道这不是你的战斗,旅行者,但是能杀死其他人的人必定是经历过生死战斗的优秀战士,而且如果你在我身边，会让我的感觉更好。

String.Source: Well, we better check on Bodan. If these sellswords are any indication, he's going to have a lot of corpses to burn tonight.
String.Dest: 嗯，我们最好查查波登。如果这些佣兵有什么异常，他今天晚上就有很多尸体要烧干净了。

String.Source: Keep looking. Maybe he left it on one of the dressers.
String.Dest: 仔细找，也许他把它丢在哪个衣柜里了。

String.Source: It's over. May Dalum-Ei find the peace in death he could not find in life.
String.Dest: 一切都结束了。愿达卢姆‧艾在死后能寻到他生前求而不得的安宁。

String.Source: So he was finally able to let go.
String.Dest: 所以他最后终于得以解脱了。

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: (Laughs) Was it now? Is that modesty or bravado? With you, sometimes it's hard to tell.
String.Dest: (笑声) 现在怎么了？自谦，还是虚张声势？对你来说，有时候很难区分。

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was much the same. His words were as slippery as his scales.
String.Dest: 月尾差不多也是这样。他的言辞就和他的鳞片一样油滑。

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: When I asked him about his past, he'd start with half-truths, before saying "If you really want to know what happened, talk to the bard."
String.Dest: 当我问起他的过去，在说出‘如果你真的想要知道发生了什么，就去问吟游诗人吧’这话之前，他一直都半真半假的给我讲故事。

String.Source: Because when it comes down to it, it's the scribes and the singers who have the final say.
String.Dest: 因为每当尘埃落定时，都是由作家和歌手来总结陈词。

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: The bottom line is you killed him. You saved Skyrim. Let the snow-striders figure out how.
String.Dest: 最重要的是你杀了他。你救了天际省。让冰雪漫游者看看你是怎么做到的吧。

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: I believe I she can be reformed. There's good inside of her.
String.Dest: 我相信我可以改变她，她心中还有部分是良善的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Now that's the craziest sodding thing I've heard all day! Didn't I warn you to lay off the hist sap?
String.Dest: (笑声) 我现在听到一天里最他妈疯狂的事了。我是不是警告过你别去打希斯特树汁的主意？

String.Source: I believe I she can be reformed. There's good inside of her.
String.Dest: 我相信我可以改变她，她心中还有部分是良善的。

String.Source: There's something about that girl that's bound to the shadows. You can drag her to the light, but it'll kill her in the end.
String.Dest: 这有些关于那个被阴影束缚的女孩的。你可以把她拽向光明，但你这么做这最后会要了她的命。

String.Source: What happened in Elsweyr?
String.Dest: 埃斯沃拉省发生了什么事？

String.Source: Ula-Wei was our scout, and by tradition he always went first. But when he placed his feet on that desert sand...
String.Dest: 乌拉卫曾是我们的侦查员，按习惯他总是在前。但是当他把脚踩上沙漠时……

String.Source: What happened in Elsweyr?
String.Dest: 埃斯沃拉省发生了什么事？

String.Source: He started to wobble, and his tail lashed recklessly against the sand. I couldn't believe my eyes. He was struggling for balance!
String.Dest: 他开始摇晃，他的尾巴鲁莽地摇摆着，企图对抗沙子。我简直无法相信我的眼睛，他居然努力想保持平衡！

String.Source: What happened in Elsweyr?
String.Dest: 埃斯沃拉省发生了什么事？

String.Source: (Laughs) I've seen drunken jesters with more grace! The poor fool came to the desert and thought he didn't need any boots!
String.Dest: (大笑) 我可没见过喝醉了的小丑还能摆出这么优雅的姿势来！那个白痴居然没穿靴子就跑进了沙漠里！

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: I remember when Arnwulf used to get drunk, he and Elia would fool around a bit. But one time he had a little too much, and got a little too brave.
String.Dest: 我记着之前阿恩武夫喝醉的时候，他和伊利亚都会干些蠢事。但有一次他喝的太多了，有点儿变的太勇敢了。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: Half naked and beard soaked with saliva, he climbed up the tree Indrel was sleeping in. I've never heard such a high pitched scream.
String.Dest: 他半裸着身体，胡子上还沾着口水，就这么爬上了英卓尔睡觉的树。(笑声) 我头一次听到那么大的尖叫声。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: Moments later, Arnwulf slumped down the tree, a gash running across the breadth of his face! He ran to Elia, of course, but she refused to heal him.
String.Dest: 片刻之后，阿恩武夫从树上跌了下来，一道伤口深深的横过了他的脸！他当然赶紧跑到伊利亚跟前，但她却拒绝为他治疗。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: We never did find out who let out that scream. Although we all suspect it was him.
String.Dest: 我们没有发现那个发出尖叫的人。虽然我们都怀疑是他。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: We used to ask Moon-Tail which clan he was from, and every day it was a different clan.
String.Dest: 我们曾经问过月尾他来自哪个氏族，结果每天的结果都不一样。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: Twice he swore we were hatched from the same mother! "How dare you forget your own sibling!" he'd say.
String.Dest: 他每次都强调他真的是从一个母亲的肚子里爬出来的。“你怎么敢忘记你的兄弟姐妹！” 他说。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei never told us who the conjurer was. But according to him, Moon-Tail had already told us countless times.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾从未告诉我们那个巫师是谁。但是，据他所说，月尾已经跟我们提起无数次了。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: There were truths in every lie. Parts of different stories that told the same tale. And if you pieced it all together, you would know.
String.Dest: 每个谎言里面都有真相的成分。不同的故事讲述着同样的传说。只要你能把碎片拼起，就能得到答案。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: On dreary nights, Bodan would lift our spirits with a song. And when he sang our spirits would indeed lift, provided Arnwulf didn't join him.
String.Dest: 在每个枯燥的夜晚，波登用歌声来鼓舞我们的精神。每当他唱完，我们的确能感觉多了些干劲儿，如果阿恩武夫没跟他一起唱的话。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: But on some nights, when he thought everyone was asleep, he would drift out into the swamp, where only the Gods and the Hist could hear his tune.
String.Dest: 但在某些夜晚，当他觉得每个人都睡着的时候,，他会游荡到沼泽，在那里唯有圣灵和希斯特才能听到他的歌声。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: He would play a song that wasn't part of his normal routine. A solemn dirge about a lost love. A song so sad it moved the trees to tears.
String.Dest: 他所演奏的那首曲子并不在他平时的曲目单中。那是一曲关于依然逝去的恋情的哀歌。那首歌是如此地悲伤，以至于甚至能让古树潸然落泪。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: Ula-Wei never spoke much, but when he did, people listened. Even Arnwulf trusted him, and I've never known a Nord to heed the advice of a lizard.
String.Dest: 乌拉卫话不多，可是只要他说，人们都会听。就连阿恩武夫都相信他，我还真没见过哪个诺德人会听一只蜥蜴的意见。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: He strode through the swamps like a cold breeze, and I realized how clumsy I was in comparison.
String.Dest: 他像一阵寒风那样大步走过沼泽,相比之下,我意识到了我是多么的笨手笨脚。

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: That is, until a week after we boarded a ship for Elsweyr. A Khajiit lord had heard of our feats and commissioned us for a job in Jorval.
String.Dest: 也就是说，在我们登上开往艾斯维尔的船一周后，一个虎人领主听到了我们的功绩，于是委托我们到约瓦尔城工作。

String.Source: I didn't even think. My company looked to me. They trusted me. And I knew then, it didn't matter how many of them were waiting for me in that mist.
String.Dest: 我甚至想都没想。我的伙伴注视着我。他们信任我。那时我就觉得，不管这雾中有多少敌人在等着我也没关系。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: It was me against them, and I couldn't lose.
String.Dest: 那是我反抗了他们。我不能输。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: The others wished me luck. Bodan stood up to speak. But it was Moon-Tail, of all people, who said the words I'll never forget.
String.Dest: 其他人都祝我好运。波登站起来讲话。但那应该轮到月尾了，所有说出那些话的人我都永远不会忘记。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Remember child, he said, it matters not the size of their blades, or the size of their numbers. Only the size of your heart.
String.Dest: 记着孩子, 他说, 他们的武器和人数并不重要。你自己的意志才是关键。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: And on that day, it was big enough.
String.Dest: 在那一天，这已经足够大了。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: I thank you, traveler. Your words are kind. Still, to some we were traitors, and it wasn't long before they made their feelings known.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者，你的话语很温暖。不过对于某些人来说我们就是叛徒，并且这种情绪出现的时间可不长。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: They ambushed our camp one night when the mist was thick. Skilled warriors with poison-tipped spears. The others fought them off as best they could.
String.Dest: 在那个雾气蒙蒙的夜晚，他们伏击了我们的营地。老练的战士们将长矛涂上毒药。其他人尽他们所能的赶走了那些人。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei ordered me to stay with the cargo. One by one I watched my friends emerge from the white, blood dripping from their wounds.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾命令我跟货物一呆着。我眼睁睁看着我的朋友们一个接一个的从雾气中慢慢浮现，他们的伤口还都滴着血。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: Bodan arrived carrying Ula-Wei on his shoulder. He said more were on the way. He turned to Elia, but she shook her head. She was all out of magicka.
String.Dest: 波登扛着乌拉卫出现在了雾气中。他说他大部分时间都花在了路上。他转向了艾拉，但是艾拉摇了摇头。她已经耗尽了魔力。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: Indrel was the first to suggest we drink the potions from the shipment. Dalum-Ei said he would kill anyone who tried.
String.Dest: 英卓尔第一个建议我们喝一下货里的药剂， 达卢姆‧艾说谁那样做他就杀了谁。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: The boy probably wanted a mother. And not a score of fathers to share her with.
String.Dest: 这个男孩想要一个母亲。而不是和她共有二十几个父亲。

String.Source: Ha, I don't think Elia would've wanted him around either! Males grow squeamish at the mere talk of children, let alone the sight of one.
String.Dest: (笑声)哈，我可不觉着伊利亚喜欢他在身边转悠！仅仅是单纯的谈论孩子都会让男人变得过于拘谨，更别说是看见一个孩子了。

String.Source: Just passing through.
String.Dest: 只是路过而已。

String.Source: Then pass. Be like the wind. At least it has the courtesy not to speak.
String.Dest: 那就放下吧。像风一样飘过。至少风有不说话的雅量。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: What about battle did he love?
String.Dest: 他热爱的战斗如何？

String.Source: He loved the way your palms sweat before a fight and how your blood boils during it. He basked in the roar of a battlecry as it echoed in your chest.
String.Dest: 他爱死了你战斗前那汗湿的手掌，以及从你掌心传来的热血沸腾的感觉。他沉浸在从你胸膛中喷涌而出的战吼怒涛中无法自拔。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: What about battle did he love?
String.Dest: 他热爱的战斗如何？

String.Source: You remind me of him in that sense. They can shower you with boon, and hire a thousand bards to sing your story.
String.Dest: 在某种意义上你提醒了我，他们能让你享尽荣华富贵，还能雇上一千个吟游诗人来歌唱你的故事。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: What about battle did he love?
String.Dest: 他热爱的战斗如何？

String.Source: But in the end, none of it will sound as good as battle feels.
String.Dest: 但是直到最后，没有谁会感受到那种战斗的快感。

String.Source: A typical Nord then.
String.Dest: 那时的典型诺德人。

String.Source: He loved the way your palms sweat before a fight and how your blood boils during it. He basked in the roar of a battlecry as it echoed in your chest.
String.Dest: 他爱死了你战斗前那汗湿的手掌，以及从你掌心传来的热血沸腾的感觉。他沉浸在从你胸膛中喷涌而出的战吼怒涛中无法自拔。

String.Source: What do you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你指的是什么意思？

String.Source: A typical Nord then.
String.Dest: 那时的典型诺德人。

String.Source: What do you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你指的是什么意思？

String.Source: You remind me of him in that sense. They can shower you with boon, and hire a thousand bards to sing your story.
String.Dest: 在某种意义上你提醒了我，他们能让你享尽荣华富贵，还能雇上一千个吟游诗人来歌唱你的故事。

String.Source: A typical Nord then.
String.Dest: 那时的典型诺德人。

String.Source: What do you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你指的是什么意思？

String.Source: But in the end, none of it will sound as good as battle feels.
String.Dest: 但是直到最后，没有谁会感受到那种战斗的快感。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: My old friend Arnwulf would agree. He wasn't like Indrel, who loved to count our spoils, or Bodan, who favored the glory over the gold.
String.Dest: 我的老朋友阿恩武夫会同意的。他不像英卓尔，老是惦记着我们的赃物，或是波登，把荣誉看得比金子还金贵。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: He wasn't like Elia, who treasured the company, or Dalum-Ei, who fought only for honor.
String.Dest: 他不喜欢艾拉，她只重视战友团, 还有达卢姆‧艾,达卢姆‧艾只会为荣誉而战。

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: Arnwulf was a Nord. And like all sons and daughters of Skyrim, he cared only for battle.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫是个诺德人。像所有天际的儿女一样，他只在乎战斗。

String.Source: I am poorly educated and unfamiliar with Black Marsh. Please enlighten me.
String.Dest: 我受过的教育很少，并且也完全不熟悉黑沼泽省。请教教我吧。

String.Source: Ah, don't be so hard on yourself! I used to think Skyrim was nothing but snow and werewolves. But there's trolls too.
String.Dest: 啊，不要对自己要求太严格！我曾经认为天际省只有雪和狼人。但现在看来这还有巨魔。

String.Source: I am poorly educated and unfamiliar with Black Marsh. Please enlighten me.
String.Dest: 我受过的教育很少，并且也完全不熟悉黑沼泽省。请教教我吧。

String.Source: To be honest, there's more to the name than just living in a swamp and sticking things with the pointy end.
String.Dest: 说实话，这地方可是比那只有一丁点儿立足之地的沼泽有着更多无法想象的困境。

String.Source: What are your plans going forward?
String.Dest: 你接下来的计划是什么？

String.Source: As opposed to going backwards? (Laughs) I haven't thought about it, but your company makes me long for the old days.
String.Dest: 转身回去？ (笑声)我没这么想过，但是你的同伴让我想起了一些陈年往事。

String.Source: In truth, I only came to Skyrim to rid myself of that urchin. Now that I'm here, maybe I'll adventure for a bit.
String.Dest: 是真的，我来天际省只是为了历练。现在我到了，也许我该来点小冒险。

String.Source: What are your plans going forward?
String.Dest: 你接下来的计划是什么？

String.Source: What are your plans going forward?
String.Dest: 你接下来的计划是什么？

String.Source: Or maybe I'll forge a new legend, right here in this adorable little puddle the Nords call a marsh.
String.Dest: 或者我来打造一个全新的传说，就在这片诺德人称之为沼泽的可爱小水塘里。

String.Source: And the politeness continues! Perhaps I am speaking with a noble! My apologies, my lord!
String.Dest: 并且这种粗鲁的行为还是会继续的！也许我是在跟贵族说话！真是抱歉啊大人！

String.Source: Forgive my impertinence. I would simply like to know your name.
String.Dest: 请原谅我的急躁。我只想知道你的名字而已。

String.Source: Forgive my impertinence. I would simply like to know your name.
String.Dest: 请原谅我的急躁。我只想知道你的名字而已。

String.Source: Ha! Don't worry traveler, I meant no offense. There are simply so many bandits here in Skyrim, and such few persons of character.
String.Dest: 哈！别担心旅行者，我无意冒犯。天际省这里有很多强盗，基本上像你这种人不多……

String.Source: As for my name, my clan once knew me as Anum-La, but fighting folk call me The Swamp Knight.
String.Dest: 至于我的名字，我的族人曾叫我安努姆菈，但是佣兵叫我沼泽骑士。

String.Source: Forgive my impertinence. I would simply like to know your name.
String.Dest: 请原谅我的急躁。我只想知道你的名字而已。

String.Source: What did you see?
String.Dest: 你看到了什么？

String.Source: I saw how the serpent camouflaged itself in the foliage. How the leviathan waded effortlessly through the swamp, simply by refusing all effort.
String.Dest: 我看到了毒蛇如何将自己隐藏在叶子中，庞大的怪兽如何毫不费力地穿过沼泽地而没有借助任何外部的力量。

String.Source: What did you see?
String.Dest: 你看到了什么？

String.Source: I saw how on bright days, the lizard used the hackwing's own shadow to scuttle around unseen, and how on dark days all creatures clung to the mist.
String.Dest: 我目睹过, 光明的日子里，蜥蜴如何在刀翼的阴影里消失，阴暗的日子里，万物如何在霭霭的迷雾中依存。

String.Source: What did you see?
String.Dest: 你看到了什么？

String.Source: By the time I was grown, I could slay five feathered serpents with a single slash, and do it with my eyes closed.
String.Dest: 等我长大了，我可以一刀劈死五只飞蛇，而且还是闭着眼睛。

String.Source: What happened then?
String.Dest: 然后发生了什么？

String.Source: I committed myself to killing a feather serpent. On the second night, I thought, I'd vanquish three. By the first hour, my only goal was to survive.
String.Dest: 我决心要亲自杀死一条翎羽蛇。在第二晚，我感觉以一敌三不是问题。但在跟它对上的第一个小时，我所想的只有活下去。

String.Source: What happened then?
String.Dest: 然后发生了什么？

String.Source: Somehow I managed. I labored through the bog and hid inside a hollowed out tree. I waited and watched for predators. And as I watched, I learned.
String.Dest: 不知何故，我已经尝试过了。我费劲了九牛二虎之力才在沼泽中的树洞里寻得了一处隐蔽点。我静静的等待着那些肉食者，但就在我观察的时候，我也懂得了不少事情。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: We were on the trail of a kidnapper, and didn't have much time. But I was acting like a hatchling, and he let me know it.
String.Dest: 我们当时在跟踪一个绑匪，而且时间紧迫。但我却像个臭小子一样笨拙，是他让我认识到了这一点。

String.Source: I should've appreciated the smith's sacrifice. I was the one who asked him to sharpen my sword, and now I was scaring his little ones.
String.Dest: 我应该感谢这个铁匠的牺牲。我是那个要求他磨利我的剑的人，而现在我又把他的孩子吓得半死。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: I was so ungrateful. Even though if it weren't for blacksmiths like him, I'd still be swinging a hist branch.
String.Dest: 我是如此让人不愉快。哪怕不是因为铁匠喜欢他，我也要改变希斯特的决定。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: It's never about one person. Maybe that's why Dalum-Ei did what he did. He felt we were all responsible.
String.Dest: 这绝不可能是一个人的事。也许这就是为什么达卢姆‧艾会这么做，他觉得我们都难逃干系。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: We were on the trail of a kidnapper, and didn't have much time. But I was acting like a hatchling, and he let me know it.
String.Dest: 我们当时在跟踪一个绑匪，而且时间紧迫。但我却像个臭小子一样笨拙，是他让我认识到了这一点。

String.Source: I should've appreciated the smith's sacrifice. I was the one who asked him to sharpen my sword, and now I was scaring his little ones.
String.Dest: 我应该感谢这个铁匠的牺牲。我是那个要求他磨利我的剑的人，而现在我又把他的孩子吓得半死。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: I was so ungrateful. Even though if it weren't for blacksmiths like him, I'd still be swinging a hist branch.
String.Dest: 我是如此让人不愉快。哪怕不是因为铁匠喜欢他，我也要改变希斯特的决定。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: Great accomplishments always are. That was the first thing I learned when I joined the Honorable Eight.
String.Dest: 保持修养. 这是我加入荣光八人众学到的第一件事.

String.Source: Vanquishing the World Eater was a collective effort.
String.Dest: 是集体的力量让我们击败了奥杜因。

String.Source: Vanquishing the World Eater was a collective effort.
String.Dest: 是集体的力量让我们击败了奥杜因。

String.Source: I was an aggressive little scaleback, always charging on ahead, trying to prove myself to the others.
String.Dest: 我为人比较冲动,经常冲在前面, 并尝试表现自己。

String.Source: Vanquishing the World Eater was a collective effort.
String.Dest: 是集体的力量让我们击败了奥杜因。

String.Source: But it wasn't until I woke up a blacksmith in the middle of the night and demanded my blade that Dalum-Ei pulled me aside.
String.Dest: 但直到我深更半夜摇醒一个铁匠向他要我的剑时，达卢姆‧艾才把我拉到一边。

String.Source: Clearly you lack compassion, you heartless shrew.
String.Dest: 很明显你根本就没有同情心，你这禽兽不如的泼妇！

String.Source: Ha! You're right, of course. But I assure you, I am no Draugr. My heart does beat, but not to the call of motherhood.
String.Dest: 哈！你当然是对的。但我向你保证，我不是尸鬼。我的心脏确实在跳动，不过这并非是出自母性。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: Well, I certainly wouldn't have expected you to protect me! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 哈哈哈，我可没指望过你能保护我！ (笑声)

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: But maybe that's your way of making me feel better. It was hard to stomach not being able to be there at the end.
String.Dest: 但是大概这只是你让我开心的法子吧？没有最终到达那个目的地，这种事情我可很难忘怀。

String.Source: You would've fit in well with our company. Nobody ever minced words, least of all Dalum-Ei, and everything he said had a point.
String.Dest: 你会和我们的伙伴相处的很好的。没人会拐弯抹角的说话，除了达卢姆‧艾，他说什么事儿都有点儿兜圈子。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: He was a harsh and demanding leader, but he had to be. It was the only way I'd listen.
String.Dest: 作为一个领袖，他太严厉而苛刻了，但他必须得成为这种领袖。只有这样他说的话我才会听。

String.Source: In the end, maybe my stubbornness won out. Still, without him, I wouldn't be who I am.
String.Dest: 最后，或许会是我的顽固取得了胜利。但是，没有他，我就不会是我了。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: Well, I certainly wouldn't have expected you to protect me! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 哈哈哈，我可没指望过你能保护我！ (笑声)

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: But maybe that's your way of making me feel better. It was hard to stomach not being able to be there at the end.
String.Dest: 但是大概这只是你让我开心的法子吧？没有最终到达那个目的地，这种事情我可很难忘怀。

String.Source: You would've fit in well with our company. Nobody ever minced words, least of all Dalum-Ei, and everything he said had a point.
String.Dest: 你会和我们的伙伴相处的很好的。没人会拐弯抹角的说话，除了达卢姆‧艾，他说什么事儿都有点儿兜圈子。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: He was a harsh and demanding leader, but he had to be. It was the only way I'd listen.
String.Dest: 作为一个领袖，他太严厉而苛刻了，但他必须得成为这种领袖。只有这样他说的话我才会听。

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Is that so? Well traveler, that might say more about you than it does her. But as one of your companions, I trust you.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真是这样吗？好吧旅行者，看起来支持她的人比支持你的更多。但作为朋友，我相信你。

String.Source: Morndas is perfect the way she is.
String.Dest: 这样的摩恩达丝是那样的完美。

String.Source: We all have are faults, and sometimes we just have to wise up to see them. Maybe the Redguard will figure that out eventually.
String.Dest: 我们每个人都有缺点，有时我们不得不清楚的认识那些缺点。也许这个红卫人最终会明白这个道理的。

String.Source: Morndas is perfect the way she is.
String.Dest: 这样的摩恩达丝是那样的完美。

String.Source: Morndas is perfect the way she is.
String.Dest: 这样的摩恩达丝是那样的完美。

String.Source: But if I were a betting lizard, I'd say the shadows are as much as part of her as the knight's code is a part of me.
String.Dest: 如果我是一个爱赌博的蜥蜴，我想说：阴影作为她的一部分就好比骑士准则是我的一部分一样。

String.Source: I understand that most travel is done by boat.
String.Dest: 我知道大多数旅行都得靠船。

String.Source: Right you are. But few boats stopped by my village.
String.Dest: 你说的对。但很少有船会停在我的村子啊。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: I do. Just as I'll miss you, when we part ways. Still, every goodbye is just another detour before our paths cross once more.
String.Dest: 我会的。正如当我们分离，我会想念你。尽管如此，在我们道路交汇之前，每一次再见只是另一种迂回。

String.Source: The same is true for the old company. Even Dalum-Ei. Whether it's in this world or the next, we'll all be together again.
String.Dest: 我的老伙计也是一样。连达卢姆‧艾也是如此。不管是今生还是来生，我们总会再相聚的。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: So whether you want to stick with me or say goodbye, I want to say this now, before the moment passes.
String.Dest: 所以要么你跟我在一起要么趁早说拜拜，我现在把这话说了，免得下次没机会。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: It was an honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 能够见识到你战斗时的英勇身姿真是荣幸之至，能让你陪伴我左右更是让我勇气倍增。非常感谢你。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: I do. Just as I'll miss you, when we part ways. Still, every goodbye is just another detour before our paths cross once more.
String.Dest: 我会的。正如当我们分离，我会想念你。尽管如此，在我们道路交汇之前，每一次再见只是另一种迂回。

String.Source: The same is true for the old company, and the same is true for home. Whether it's in this world or the next, we'll all be together again.
String.Dest: 对我的老朋友是一样，对家人也是一样。不管是这个世界还是来生转世，我们总有一天会重聚。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: So whether you want to stick with me or say goodbye, I want to say this now, before the moment passes.
String.Dest: 所以要么你跟我在一起要么趁早说拜拜，我现在把这话说了，免得下次没机会。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: It was an honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 能够见识到你战斗时的英勇身姿真是荣幸之至，能让你陪伴我左右更是让我勇气倍增。非常感谢你。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: Well, brave traveler, I have to admit I miss the swamp. Bodan used to say at the end of a battle, a warrior's first thoughts are always of home.
String.Dest: 好吧，勇敢的旅行者，我不得不承认我怀念沼泽。波登常说，在战斗结束后，战士最先冒出的念头总是回家。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: But to be honest, when I think of home I don't think of the rivers of tar or the clouds of fleshflies.
String.Dest: 但说实话，当我想起家乡，首先想到的并不是汇聚成河的汩汩焦油，或者如云笼罩的食肉蝇虫。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: I think of faces and names. I think of friends. Seems to me a lot of the faces have more skin than scales.
String.Dest: 我会想到面庞和名字，想到朋友们。貌似其中许多脸孔不属于长着鳞片的亚龙人。

String.Source: Jonna and Ingarte at the inn. Agni and Falion. Even old Lurbuk, annoying all the Nords in Sovngarde with his song.
String.Dest: 乔娜和印卡塔在旅馆里。阿格尼还有法利昂。甚至还有老卢布克，用他的歌声骚扰松加德所有的诺德人。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Most of all I think of you, Dragonborn. It was an honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我主要在思考你的事，龙裔。看着你战斗是我的荣耀，和你搭档是一种享受。谢谢你。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Well, brave traveler, I have to admit I miss the swamp. Bodan used to say at the end of a battle, a warrior's first thoughts are always of home.
String.Dest: 好吧，勇敢的旅行者，我不得不承认我怀念沼泽。波登常说，在战斗结束后，战士最先冒出的念头总是回家。

String.Source: But to be honest, when I think of home I don't think of the rivers of tar or the clouds of fleshflies.
String.Dest: 但说实话，当我想起家乡，首先想到的并不是汇聚成河的汩汩焦油，或者如云笼罩的食肉蝇虫。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: I think of faces and names. I think of friends. Seems to me a lot of the faces have more skin than scales.
String.Dest: 我会想到面庞和名字，想到朋友们。貌似其中许多脸孔不属于长着鳞片的亚龙人。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Jonna and Ingarte at the inn. Agni and Falion. Even old Lurbuk, still making sure no one in Morthal gets a good night's sleep.
String.Dest: 这家酒馆的乔和印卡塔，阿格尼和法利昂，甚至是老卢布克，也都在墨索尔城睡不好觉。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: Most of all I think of you, Dragonborn. It was honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我主要在思考你的事，龙裔。看着你战斗是我的荣耀，和你搭档是一种享受。谢谢你。

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: We were, and we did.
String.Dest: 我们就是，而且我们还作下去了。

String.Source: It sounds like your company was tricked into making a bad choice.
String.Dest: 听起来似乎你的伙伴是被蒙骗着做出这样一个糟糕的决定的。

String.Source: That, and I actually wash behind my ears regularly.
String.Dest: 那个，好吧，我洗耳恭听。

String.Source: Really? (Laughs) I admire you Dragonborn. You never forget to take care of the little things.
String.Dest: 真的? (笑声) 我佩服你龙裔. 你从来不忽视细节.

String.Source: That, and I actually wash behind my ears regularly.
String.Dest: 那个，好吧，我洗耳恭听。

String.Source: Me, I still have a long way to go. After all, real knights keep their armor polished and their scales clean.
String.Dest: 我？我还有很长的路要走呢。不管怎么说，真正的骑士总会随时擦亮他们的装甲，清洁它们的鳞片。

String.Source: In any case, I'm sure someone like you will be the talk of the party. Just try not to stand out too much. You still have a job to do.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我敢肯定像你这样的人会成为大家的话题的。不过也不要太抢风头了。你还有活要干呢。

String.Source: That, and I actually wash behind my ears regularly.
String.Dest: 那个，好吧，我洗耳恭听。

String.Source: (Laughs) True. If I saw a bunch of crazy adventurers charging at me with weapons drawn, a conversation is probably the last thing I'd expect.
String.Dest: (笑声)确实。如果我看见一帮逗逼冒险者举着武器向我冲过来，我绝对不会想到要跟他们讲道理。

String.Source: Dragons attack because they're afraid. Just look at us. We're terrifying.
String.Dest: 那些巨龙攻来是因为它们在害怕。看看我们自己，我们长得可吓人了。

String.Source: Dragons attack because they're afraid. Just look at us. We're terrifying.
String.Dest: 那些巨龙攻来是因为它们在害怕。看看我们自己，我们长得可吓人了。

String.Source: Maybe if we gave it a peace offering, like a goat or the Jarl of Windhelm, it might not be in such a rush to fight!
String.Dest: 或许如果我们给它一份和解的礼物，比如说一只山羊或者风盔城的领主之类的，它就不会这么急着跟咱干架了。

String.Source: Dragons attack because they're afraid. Just look at us. We're terrifying.
String.Dest: 那些巨龙攻来是因为它们在害怕。看看我们自己，我们长得可吓人了。

String.Source: Oh well, Dragonborn, there's always next time.
String.Dest: 很好，龙裔。永远都是下一次再说。

String.Source: Maybe for you, but I like to fight at close range.
String.Dest: 对你而言也许吧，但我更喜欢贴身战斗。

String.Source: Chomping I can handle. It's the dragon fire that worries me.
String.Dest: 我能克制不打牙战，但龙炎我不一定能抗住啊。

String.Source: I can block fire, maybe even dodge it, but I don't think I can fight my way out of a dragon's stomach!
String.Dest: 我可以格挡掉火焰，甚至躲开它，但我不认为我能从一条龙的肚子里逃出来！

String.Source: Chomping I can handle. It's the dragon fire that worries me.
String.Dest: 我能克制不打牙战，但龙炎我不一定能抗住啊。

String.Source: Chomping I can handle. It's the dragon fire that worries me.
String.Dest: 我能克制不打牙战，但龙炎我不一定能抗住啊。

String.Source: Or maybe I can! Who knows if these dragons even have stomachs? That's what so exciting. We have no idea what we're dealing with!
String.Dest: 或者我可以！谁知道这些龙有没有胃？这真是太刺激了，我们根本不知道接下来要面对的是什么！

String.Source: I know. I've long held a suspicion of mages, and magic. But after what happened with my old company, I've been a little hesitant.
String.Dest: 我知道，但我一直以来都对法师和魔法有所怀疑。但在跟我的老伙计发生这档子事儿之后，我就有所犹豫了。

String.Source: Falion's still is a danger. Not because he's a bad man, but with mages...
String.Dest: 法利昂终归是个大麻烦……不怕坏人，但是一个会魔法的坏人就……

String.Source: It might've been different if he hadn't adopted Agni. That part just hit too close to home.
String.Dest: 如果他没接受阿格尼就不一样了。那部分恰恰击中了要害。

String.Source: Falion's still is a danger. Not because he's a bad man, but with mages...
String.Dest: 法利昂终归是个大麻烦……不怕坏人，但是一个会魔法的坏人就……

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, that solves one problem, but I don't see how I'll be much of help, after dying from shock!
String.Dest: (笑)好啊，那就解决了一个问题，不过我没看出自己帮上了什么忙……我是说在被电的半死之后！

String.Source: There might be room if we strap you to Odahviing's tail.
String.Dest: 如果我们把你抽到傲达伟英的尾巴上你是不是就有空了？

String.Source: No, I think I'll go to Aetherius the normal way. Through old age and a belly full of wine.
String.Dest: 不，我想我会凭着我这年老满腹酒水之体，用平常的方法去艾瑟瑞斯。

String.Source: There might be room if we strap you to Odahviing's tail.
String.Dest: 如果我们把你抽到傲达伟英的尾巴上你是不是就有空了？

String.Source: There might be room if we strap you to Odahviing's tail.
String.Dest: 如果我们把你抽到傲达伟英的尾巴上你是不是就有空了？

String.Source: And it's not like you'll need my help. You didn't come this far by riding my tail.
String.Dest: 他跟你找我帮的忙不一样。你还没有走到骑上我的尾巴这一步。

String.Source: So go on, slay the World Eater. Show him we mortals taste a little funny going down.
String.Dest: 去罢，勇者！将世界吞噬者送回虚空。让他见识一下凡身的厉害！.

String.Source: There might be room if we strap you to Odahviing's tail.
String.Dest: 如果我们把你抽到傲达伟英的尾巴上你是不是就有空了？

String.Source: I agree. I am honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意。成为他们中的一员这点让我很自豪。

String.Source: That's right. Everyone in a company is different, and in the Companions, no one is anyone's master.
String.Dest: 是啊。每一个同伴都是不同的，在战友团，没有谁高人一等。

String.Source: But a group of warriors isn't a company without a common thread to hold you together. Without honor, it all falls apart.
String.Dest: 但是一群各怀鬼胎的战士可不是和你并肩作战的伙伴。没有荣誉感，他们会在瞬间被冲的七零八落。

String.Source: I agree. I am honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意。成为他们中的一员这点让我很自豪。

String.Source: I agree. I would be honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意，很荣幸加入他们。

String.Source: That's right. Everyone in a company is different, and in the Companions, no one is anyone's master.
String.Dest: 是啊。每一个同伴都是不同的，在战友团，没有谁高人一等。

String.Source: I agree. I would be honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意，很荣幸加入他们。

String.Source: But a group of warriors isn't a company without a common thread to hold you together. Without honor, it all falls apart.
String.Dest: 但是一群各怀鬼胎的战士可不是和你并肩作战的伙伴。没有荣誉感，他们会在瞬间被冲的七零八落。

String.Source: Sounds like a plan. Although I don't know if they'll drink any of it.
String.Dest: 听上去是不错。不过我觉得他们一滴也不会喝。

String.Source: Probably not, but they'll appreciate the sentiment. It's like giving a piece of advice, without having to say the words.
String.Dest: 多半不会，但是他们会感到感激的。这就像”一切尽在不言中“那种感觉。

String.Source: For people who've vowed to spend the rest of their lives as mutes, it'll make for a fitting gift.
String.Dest: 对于那些许下誓言要一辈子保持缄默的人们来说，这是个合适的礼物。

String.Source: Sounds like a plan. Although I don't know if they'll drink any of it.
String.Dest: 听上去是不错。不过我觉得他们一滴也不会喝。

String.Source: And if they don't drink it, it'll be our secret stash. Well, so long as we stick to ale and beer. I never liked Nord mead.
String.Dest: 假使他们没有喝掉它，那就让它成为我们的小秘密。所以我们只要忠于我们的麦芽酒和啤酒就好了。我就没喜欢过诺德蜜酒。

String.Source: Sounds like a plan. Although I don't know if they'll drink any of it.
String.Dest: 听上去是不错。不过我觉得他们一滴也不会喝。

String.Source: It was. I could tell you a thousand stories of the glory days, but most of them only remind me of how it ended, and what we lost.
String.Dest: 是的。我能告诉你几千个过去发生的荣耀战绩，但是我现在想起来的……却只有他们的消亡和我们的损失。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) The Honorable Eight. It must have been more than a name.
String.Dest: (荣耀的召唤) 八圣灵之荣。不仅仅是个名字。

String.Source: But the one I'll always remember fondly is the day we were delivering sacks of potions to a village full of Dunmer refugees.
String.Dest: 我印象最深的应该是那天我们把大袋的药剂分发给暗精灵难民。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) The Honorable Eight. It must have been more than a name.
String.Dest: (荣耀的召唤) 八圣灵之荣。不仅仅是个名字。

String.Source: Many of my fellow Argonians didn't like what we were doing. Even Moon-Tail scowled at the notion. But Dalum-Ei stood his ground.
String.Dest: 我的许多亚龙人同伴都不喜欢我们在做的事。甚至连月尾也对这打算怒目而视。但达卢姆‧艾却还是固执己见。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) The Honorable Eight. It must have been more than a name.
String.Dest: (荣耀的召唤) 八圣灵之荣。不仅仅是个名字。

String.Source: There were sick children who needed these potions. It was the honorable thing.
String.Dest: 那些生病的孩子需要这些药水。这是件光荣的事儿。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) The Honorable Eight. It must have been more than a name.
String.Dest: (荣耀的召唤) 八圣灵之荣。不仅仅是个名字。

String.Source: I had a different plan. Poisoning their food.
String.Dest: 我还有个主意：在他们食物里下毒。

String.Source: Why? They're practically dead already! And besides, they want to help you! Sometimes the things you say make no sense at all.
String.Dest: 为什么？他们事实上已经死了！而且除此之外，他们想要帮你！有时候你说的话真是让人无法理解。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: Well, Delphine seems to think you'll do just fine, but are you sure we can't find someone, I don't know, with a little less dirt on the boots?
String.Dest: 恩，戴尔菲娜似乎认为你能干好，但难道说我们就不能找个，或许，鞋子上泥巴少点儿的家伙吗？

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: (Laughs) I say that in jest, Dragonborn. I know you'll fit right in.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我在开玩笑呢，龙裔。我知道你会很合适的。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: And it's not because of the way you're dressed or because you've practiced speaking with a funny accent.
String.Dest: 这不是因为你穿着很搞笑或者是你操着一口很搞笑的口音。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: You'll fit in because you have a strong will, and strong character.
String.Dest: 你会适应的，因为你有着坚强的意志和性格。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: You may not be nobility, but you have a presence that rivals any king. And that's why they'll know you belong.
String.Dest: 你大概不是贵族，但你却有着比肩于任何一个过往的气质。这就是他们认出你的原因。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: Well, Delphine seems to think you'll do just fine, but are you sure we can't find someone, I don't know, with a little less dirt behind their ears?
String.Dest: 好吧，戴尔芬似乎认为你会做的很漂亮，但是你确定我们连个耳朵后面污垢少的家伙都找不到吗？反正我不知道。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: (Laughs) I say that in jest, Dragonborn. I know you'll fit right in.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我在开玩笑呢，龙裔。我知道你会很合适的。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: And it's not because of the way you're dressed or because you've practiced speaking with a funny accent.
String.Dest: 这不是因为你穿着很搞笑或者是你操着一口很搞笑的口音。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: You'll fit in because you have a strong will, and strong character.
String.Dest: 你会适应的，因为你有着坚强的意志和性格。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: You may not be nobility, but you have a presence that rivals any queen. And that's why they'll know you belong.
String.Dest: 你也许不是贵族，可你有种媲美任何女皇的气质。这样他们才知道你是谁。

String.Source: I wanted to meet the one who braves the marsh.
String.Dest: 我想认识那位有勇气挑战沼泽的人。

String.Source: And I am honored to meet one so fragile as to think squashing bugs requires bravery.
String.Dest: 能见到胆小得连碾碎一只虫子都要鼓足勇气的人真是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Well, I've seen ringing plants and singing Orcs, so a talking mudcrab wouldn't be the craziest thing I've come across, but it'd be up there.
String.Dest: 呃，我见过会发声的植物和会唱歌的兽人，所以一个会说话的泥沼蟹不会是我遇到的最疯狂的事，但这也足够疯狂了。

String.Source: You probably have a better chance of finding a talking mudcrab.
String.Dest: 你可能有了一个更好的机会去找到一只会说话的泥沼蟹。

String.Source: In any case, I think you're right. If we see a dragon, it's best to swing first and apologies after.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我认为你是对的。如果我们看到龙，最好先走位后道歉。

String.Source: You probably have a better chance of finding a talking mudcrab.
String.Dest: 你可能有了一个更好的机会去找到一只会说话的泥沼蟹。

String.Source: Hm...maybe it's us who should act like hackwings then. Strike and flee.
String.Dest: 唔……或许到时我们可以像刀翼那样活动，比如打击和开溜。

String.Source: (Laughs) Where would we flee to? It seems like the dragon's the one who can fly.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我们应该逃到哪儿去？似乎那个人可以像龙一样的飞。

String.Source: Hm...maybe it's us who should act like hackwings then. Strike and flee.
String.Dest: 唔……或许到时我们可以像刀翼那样活动，比如打击和开溜。

String.Source: But maybe there's something about you I don't know. Are you hiding a pair of wings under those clothes?
String.Dest: 但总该有什么事是你不知道的吧！你确认衣服下面没藏着一对翅膀？

String.Source: Hm...maybe it's us who should act like hackwings then. Strike and flee.
String.Dest: 唔……或许到时我们可以像刀翼那样活动，比如打击和开溜。

String.Source: Wouldn't be the first time someone kept a secret from me. I need to get you drunk more!
String.Dest: 这也不是第一次有人想要在我面前守住秘密了。我应该让你再多来几杯！

String.Source: They shouldn't feel guilty. Falion is up to something. I know it.
String.Dest: 他们不该有负罪感。法利昂和这有关。我知道。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, I can't say I don't have my own suspicions. Truth is, when I was talking about townsfolk, I was talking about me!
String.Dest: (笑声) 我不能说我没自己的想法，事实上是，当我讲到镇民的时候，我是在说我自己。

String.Source: They shouldn't feel guilty. Falion is up to something. I know it.
String.Dest: 他们不该有负罪感。法利昂和这有关。我知道。

String.Source: Maybe it was a death wish, to challenge a Master Conjurer. I'd be lying if I said I hadn't thought about it. But Agni made me change my mind.
String.Dest: 大概只有想死才会许下愿望去挑战一个魔法大师。如果我说我从没考虑过这个那一定是扯谎。但是阿格尼让我改变了想法。

String.Source: Well, Falion does do strange experiments at night.
String.Dest: 嗯……法利昂在晚上总做些奇怪的实验。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, I can't say I didn't have my own suspicions. Truth is, I've heard all manner of strange noises echoing through the marsh.
String.Dest: (笑声) 好吧，我不得不说我也起疑心了。事实是我听到了湿地回响着各种奇怪的声音。

String.Source: Well, Falion does do strange experiments at night.
String.Dest: 嗯……法利昂在晚上总做些奇怪的实验。

String.Source: Maybe it was a death wish, to challenge a Master Conjurer. I'd be lying if I said I hadn't thought about it. But Agni made me change my mind.
String.Dest: 大概只有想死才会许下愿望去挑战一个魔法大师。如果我说我从没考虑过这个那一定是扯谎。但是阿格尼让我改变了想法。

String.Source: I thank you, brave traveler, for the only thing more rewarding than a good battle, is to fight alongside someone like yourself.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，勇敢的旅行者，这样的结局肯定比打一架伤到边上像你这样看热闹的人好得多。

String.Source: I've never seen you flinch. You can fight by my side any day.
String.Dest: 你还真是天不怕地不怕，愿意跟我混的话随时欢迎！

String.Source: When we're together, I get whisked back to the old days. Sometimes I'll look up, and half expect Indrel to be sleeping atop a bookcase!
String.Dest: 当我们在一起时，我会突然想起过去的日子。有时我往上看，还以为英卓尔仍睡在书架上呢！

String.Source: I've never seen you flinch. You can fight by my side any day.
String.Dest: 你还真是天不怕地不怕，愿意跟我混的话随时欢迎！

String.Source: Together, the eight of us wanted to be honorable. But you already are. You are everything a knight aims to be.
String.Dest: 一起吧。我们八个都想获得荣誉。但是你早已功成名就了。你是所有骑士努力的目标。

String.Source: I've never seen you flinch. You can fight by my side any day.
String.Dest: 你还真是天不怕地不怕，愿意跟我混的话随时欢迎！

String.Source: You're right. But if nothing else, you've given me hope that my crimes can be atoned for. Maybe not today, but someday down the road.
String.Dest: 你是对的。但是没有别的东西的话，你已经给了我赎罪的希望。或许不是今天，而是之后的某一天。

String.Source: You still have much to atone for. Tagging along with me doesn't change that.
String.Dest: 你仍然有许多过错要弥补。跟着我并不能改变这一点。

String.Source: You still have much to atone for. Tagging along with me doesn't change that.
String.Dest: 你仍然有许多过错要弥补。跟着我并不能改变这一点。

String.Source: Up until now I've been going in circles. It's you who's pointed me toward the path of redemption. And I promise I won't ever lose my way.
String.Dest: 直到现在，我一直在兜圈子。是你给我指出了走向救赎之路。我保证不会再失去自己的方向了。

String.Source: The Companions are still around because they have power. Honor is irrelevant.
String.Dest: 战友团依然团结在一起是因为他们拥有力量。而荣誉则是无关紧要的。

String.Source: Not true, traveler. How many rotten, evil, horrible sons of a werecroc have survived as long as the Companions?
String.Dest: 不，旅行者。有多少堕落的，邪恶的，恐怖的邪恶之子子存活得和战友团一样长？

String.Source: The Companions are still around because they have power. Honor is irrelevant.
String.Dest: 战友团依然团结在一起是因为他们拥有力量。而荣誉则是无关紧要的。

String.Source: Bad men don't live to see tomorrow. Honor stays.
String.Dest: 坏人活不到看见明天的太阳，荣耀者才可以留下。

String.Source: Yeah, one of them might actually smile! (Laughs) But I suppose if they did find their way down the mountain, they might cause a little havoc.
String.Dest: 是啊，他们中没准真有人能笑出来！（笑声）但是我认为他们如果真的找到下山的路的话，他们可能会引起一场灾难。

String.Source: Are you proposing we get the Greybeards drunk? Do you realize the consequences?
String.Dest: 你建议我们把灰胡子灌醉？你知道后果吗？

String.Source: Are you proposing we get the Greybeards drunk? Do you realize the consequences?
String.Dest: 你建议我们把灰胡子灌醉？你知道后果吗？

String.Source: Still, I think these monks have a little more discipline than that. Besides, they'd never make it to Ivarstead. It's a long way down.
String.Dest: 我还是想，这些僧侣受过更好的训练。另外，他们没有去紫杉镇，而是往下一直走。

String.Source: Or maybe that's what you're afraid of! Give them one beer, and all of a sudden it's raining monks.
String.Dest: 或者说这正是你所担心的! 给他们一扎啤酒，然后他们马上就全都不省人事了。

String.Source: Are you proposing we get the Greybeards drunk? Do you realize the consequences?
String.Dest: 你建议我们把灰胡子灌醉？你知道后果吗？

String.Source: I suppose not. But I hold out hope that somewhere out there, there are people who speak my name with the same reverence as a real one.
String.Dest: (笑声)我想不是。但是我心怀希望世界某处，有人带着尊敬感地说出我的名号，如同我就在他眼前。

String.Source: So you aren't even a real knight. Might as well just call yourself "The Swamp."
String.Dest: 所以，你甚至不是一个真正的骑士。还不如干脆称自己为 "沼泽人"

String.Source: There were visitors. In fact, every few years a recruiter from the city would come to the village and conscript those in the clan who showed promise.
String.Dest: 曾经这里有很多旅行者. 事实上, 每隔几年，从城市的招聘人员会来村里，并征召那些显露才华的氏族成员.

String.Source: You said you were born in a tribal village. But it couldn't have been isolated.
String.Dest: 你说你出生于一个部落村落，可那也不可能与世隔绝。

String.Source: You said you were born in a tribal village. But it couldn't have been isolated.
String.Dest: 你说你出生于一个部落村落，可那也不可能与世隔绝。

String.Source: Only a handful of hatchlings were chosen. All of them were males. Males I bested in combat a hundred times over.
String.Dest: 只有极少数的小家伙被选中。他们都是男性。数量是我在战争中击败男性的100倍。

String.Source: You said you were born in a tribal village. But it couldn't have been isolated.
String.Dest: 你说你出生于一个部落村落，可那也不可能与世隔绝。

String.Source: I figured the only way I'd be a soldier was to train on my own. So one night I went out into the deepest swamps with nothing but a hist branch.
String.Dest: 我发现唯一能让自己愿意当兵的方法就是自己训练自己。于是有天晚上我独自走入沼泽深处，随身只带了一根希斯树枝。

String.Source: We lazy people prefer to call it "stamina conservation."
String.Dest: 我们这些懒人更喜欢叫它 "节省体力"。

String.Source: (Laughs) Indrel would've liked you. She conserved enough stamina for the eight of us, yet when battle came, she still lagged behind like a rootworm.
String.Dest: (笑声)但愿英卓尔会喜欢你。她有足够的体力对付我们八人,然而,当战争来临,她仍然像条虫一样落在我们后面。

String.Source: It's alright, young traveler. I used to think people in Skyrim rode giant sleds pulled by wolves!
String.Dest: 很好，旅行者，我曾经以为天际省的人坐狼拉雪橇呢。

String.Source: Oh right. The swamp makes for tough terrain.
String.Dest: 噢对。沼泽地崎岖不平。

String.Source: Oh they did, but Dalum-Ei assured them I was on the up and up. He was our leader, and the one who assembled the crew. I never asked him why.
String.Dest: 他们真的这么干了， 但是达卢姆‧艾确信我爬得越来越高。他是我们的头儿，他负责组织所有人。我从不问为什么。

String.Source: Strange that no one questioned your involvement.
String.Dest: 你这件事居然没人过问，真是奇怪。

String.Source: Maybe he was just curious. Maybe he ascribed it to fate. Maybe he thought he could make a wife out of me. (Laughs) Poor fool never had a chance.
String.Dest: 也许他只是好奇。也许他把这一切归结于命运。也许他以为他能让我的妻子离开我。 (笑声)可怜的呆子从没有过机会。

String.Source: Strange that no one questioned your involvement.
String.Dest: 你这件事居然没人过问，真是奇怪。

String.Source: Agreed. And while I had some anxiety joining such an esteemed company, I quickly discovered that I indeed belonged.
String.Dest: 没错。当我加入这样一个仰慕已久的组织时我有些紧张，但很快我就明白我真的是这里的一员了。

String.Source: It's not the method of training, but your skill on the battlefield that counts.
String.Dest: 这不是训练的方法,不过你的技能在战场上才是最重要的.

String.Source: You're right. She's a no good thief. But that has its uses.
String.Dest: 你说的对。她不是个好盗贼，但是自有其用途。

String.Source: Be careful, traveler. Dalum-Ei said it's a slippery slope, once you start making exceptions to your code.
String.Dest: 当心，旅行者。达卢姆‧艾说一旦你以你自己的名义做这种不受保护的项目，就会发生灾难性的跌价。

String.Source: You're right. She's a no good thief. But that has its uses.
String.Dest: 你说的对。她不是个好盗贼，但是自有其用途。
