String.Source: Maybe today she's picking a lock in a Nord ruin. Maybe tomorrow, it's somebody's home.
String.Dest: 她今天撬开的只是诺德废墟里的锁，但说不定明天她撬开的就是某户住家的大门了。

String.Source: You're right. She's a no good thief. But that has its uses.
String.Dest: 你说的对。她不是个好盗贼，但是自有其用途。

String.Source: You might tell yourself it's okay, because you need the gold more than they do, and what you do is more important.
String.Dest: 你可以告诉自己没什么大不了的，因为你比他们更需要钱。而你所做的事也比他们更重要。

String.Source: You're right. She's a no good thief. But that has its uses.
String.Dest: 你说的对。她不是个好盗贼，但是自有其用途。

String.Source: But that isn't honor, traveler. A true knight keeps to their code, not because it's easy, but because it's hard.
String.Dest: 但是旅行者，这可不光彩。一名真正的骑士遵守他们的戒律，不是因为这些清规戒律很容易做到，相反，这是因为它们很难办到。

String.Source: Do you mean to tell me the Nords have gained horse and cart technology? By the Gods! They're practically Dwarves!
String.Dest: 你的意思是说那群诺德人还是学会了怎么造马车？额滴神啊！他们都快成了矮人了!

String.Source: Why didn't your people just make carriages like the Nords?
String.Dest: 为什么你们的人把马车做的像是诺德风格？

String.Source: If only we Argonians had thought of the same! We'd have no use for those pesky boats!
String.Dest: 我们亚龙人怎么就不能心往一块想呢！那样就用不着这些讨厌的破船了！

String.Source: Why didn't your people just make carriages like the Nords?
String.Dest: 为什么你们的人把马车做的像是诺德风格？

String.Source: I was halfway through the marsh, when I decided to head back to Morthal. I turned to the pesky urchin and told him, "Alright, you win."
String.Dest: 当我决定掉头回莫萨尔时我正在通过沼泽的半路上。我回到那个孩子那里，然后告诉他，“好吧，你赢了。”

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: Imagine my surprise when I found myself talking to a patch of deathbells. (Laughs) There was no one there!
String.Dest: 你猜当时我多震惊啊……发现自己在对着一丛丧钟花说傻话。（笑）那儿根本没人！

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: Some may ask why I'm a knight without armor. Others contend I wear the mourner's clothes to honor the brave warriors I slay.
String.Dest: 有些人会问我为什么作为一个骑士却不穿盔甲。而另一些人则认为我穿着丧服是为了表达我对那些被我所杀的英勇战士们的纪念。

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: Those in my company will tell you I wear it to mourn the refugees who died that day, and all the innocents who die in the pangs of war.
String.Dest: 我的战友都会告诉你，我穿这套衣服是为了悼念那天死去的人们，以及因为战争的悲痛而死掉的善良的人。

String.Source: I will tell you that there's only one thing in this world I truly mourn. My sanity! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 我会 告诉你,在这个世界上只有一件事是我真正悲哀的。那就是我的理智！(笑)

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: I kept going north, figuring at some point the boy would stop following me. Got to give it to the little runt, he had courage.
String.Dest: 我保持一路向北，想着也许在某一时刻这孩子能停止跟随我。我可以把他放到一头小兽的背上让小兽拖着他走，他就会有勇气了。

String.Source: What happened to him?
String.Dest: 发生了什么事？

String.Source: Eventually I realized I could've walked right into the Sea of Ghosts, and the little histcarp would've dove right in.
String.Dest: 最后我才想到我本可以径直进幽灵之海，然后那个小家伙就会掉到里头。

String.Source: What happened to him?
String.Dest: 发生了什么事？

String.Source: The only good dragon is a dead dragon.
String.Dest: 唯一可爱的龙就是死龙。

String.Source: Sometimes not even that! Did you see that thing rise up out of the ground? I'm not so sure it was ever alive!
String.Dest: 有时并不是这样！你看到那个东西从地上爬起来了吗？我可不知道它到底是不是活物！

String.Source: The only good dragon is a dead dragon.
String.Dest: 唯一可爱的龙就是死龙。

String.Source: Either way, it doesn't take a shaman to see a there's a storm coming. But I don't mind getting a little wet.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，不需要萨满都看得出有一场风暴要来了。不过我不介意弄得湿漉漉的。

String.Source: I can't stand the stuff, but the Nords seem to like it. All the honey and fruits they put into it takes away from the bite.
String.Dest: 我不能忍受这种东西，但诺德人似乎喜欢它。他们把所有蜂蜜和水果都倒进去调味儿。

String.Source: What sort of drink would they prefer? I know you aren't a fan of mead.
String.Dest: 他们可能会喜欢什么样的饮料呢？我知道你不是蜂蜜酒的拥趸。

String.Source: What sort of drink would they prefer? I know you aren't a fan of mead.
String.Dest: 他们可能会喜欢什么样的饮料呢？我知道你不是蜂蜜酒的拥趸。

String.Source: Arnwulf use to complain that in Black Marsh, all the drinks taste like the swamp. Which is just the way we like it.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫经常抱怨黑沼泽省的酒尝起来都是沼泽味儿的。可我们就喜欢这样的酒。

String.Source: What sort of drink would they prefer? I know you aren't a fan of mead.
String.Dest: 他们可能会喜欢什么样的饮料呢？我知道你不是蜂蜜酒的拥趸。

String.Source: A Greybeard though, I'd probably put a little spiced wine in their supply chest. It's warm, it's refined, and it'll get you drunk all the same.
String.Dest: 居然是位灰胡子，我八成是把香料酒给误放进了他们的补给箱里。那酒是被提纯过的，非常烈，就算让你来喝，你也会醉的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Sure, why not. I was going to say three hundred, but who really knows? No one's seen a dragon in thousands of years.
String.Dest: (笑声) 是啊，为什么不。我可以说三百，但是谁又真的知道呢？已经有一千多年没人看见过龙了。

String.Source: So it's like fighting three hackwings?
String.Dest: 因此就像是跟三个刀翼干架?

String.Source: Maybe it's because they were weak. Maybe dragons were the original milk-drinkers. Only one way to find out.
String.Dest: 也许是因为他们很弱。也许这些龙的本质其实就是个吃奶的货。只有一个办法能找出答案。

String.Source: So it's like fighting three hackwings?
String.Dest: 因此就像是跟三个刀翼干架?

String.Source: People fear what they don't understand. Which is why I fear mammoth cheese.
String.Dest: 人们会对他们不了解的东西抱有恐惧。正因为如此，我害怕长毛象乳酪。

String.Source: What, never seen a Giant milk a mammoth? (Laughs) I'm guessing anyone who has was seeing stars shortly after.
String.Dest: 什么，你没见过巨人给长毛象挤奶? (笑声)我猜看过的人立马都被巨人送去登月了。

String.Source: Are you saying you get nervous? Your mouth is jovial enough.
String.Dest: 你是说你会紧张吗？你的嘴倒是说的挺顺溜的。

String.Source: (Laughs) You tell it true, traveler. In my old company, it was always up to me to lighten the mood.
String.Dest: （笑）你说的没错，旅行者。在我以前的那伙人里边，能帮别人放松心情的事都靠我。

String.Source: Sometimes Indrel would surprise us with a line or two, or Arnwulf would make a fool of himself, but mostly it was me who played the jester.
String.Dest: 有时英卓尔会用一两个笑话让我们惊喜一下，或者阿恩武夫会冒个傻气，但是大多数情况是我在扮演小丑的角色。

String.Source: Are you saying you get nervous? Your mouth is jovial enough.
String.Dest: 你是说你会紧张吗？你的嘴倒是说的挺顺溜的。

String.Source: Are you saying you get nervous? Your mouth is jovial enough.
String.Dest: 你是说你会紧张吗？你的嘴倒是说的挺顺溜的。

String.Source: Maybe that's why Dalum-Ei kept me around. I was but a hatchling then. I had energy, and I had confidence.
String.Dest: 大概这就是达卢姆‧艾为什么让我在他身边了。我可不是弱鸡，我有力量，还有勇气。

String.Source: These days, I'm just glad I have someone to laugh with. So traveler, thanks for listening.
String.Dest: 这些天，我很高兴自己把一些人逗笑了。所以旅行者，感谢聆听。

String.Source: Are you saying you get nervous? Your mouth is jovial enough.
String.Dest: 你是说你会紧张吗？你的嘴倒是说的挺顺溜的。

String.Source: It was a privilege to fight by your side.
String.Dest: 能与你并肩作战真是三生有幸。

String.Source: There you go, polite as ever. The tales will talk of your bravery and aplomb, but I will remember you most for your manners! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 那么你走吧，彬彬有礼的走吧，传说只会记录你的勇敢和沉着，但我会一直记得你的那些不为人知的一面！ (笑声)

String.Source: It was a privilege to fight by your side.
String.Dest: 能与你并肩作战真是三生有幸。

String.Source: But yes, I consider it a privilege to have known you, and fought with you. I've known many great heroes in my time, but none more honorable.
String.Dest: 但是……使得，我觉得了解你并跟你并肩作战是一种荣誉……我在过去的时光里见到过许多英雄，但没有一个有你的荣耀和成就。

String.Source: It was a privilege to fight by your side.
String.Dest: 能与你并肩作战真是三生有幸。

String.Source: Now go on. Slay that dragon. I've got to track down the Jarl's maid. I bet the floor here hasn't been swept for ages, with all this dust in my eyes.
String.Dest: 继续吧，去屠龙吧。我已经查到了领主的女儿。这地板多少年没扫过了？这么厚一层灰！

String.Source: But they're still around, which is more than you can say for mine! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 但他们还在附近，这一点你可以替我说！ (笑声)

String.Source: Actually, most of the Companions are either hunters or sellswords.
String.Dest: 事实上所谓的战友团里除了猎人就是佣兵.

String.Source: But in all honesty, if a Companion tells you they only care about gold, I'd take their words with a grain of void salt.
String.Dest: 但是说实话，如果战友团告诉你他们只在乎钱，我会持保留意见。

String.Source: Actually, most of the Companions are either hunters or sellswords.
String.Dest: 事实上所谓的战友团里除了猎人就是佣兵.

String.Source: Actually, most of the Companions are either hunters or sellswords.
String.Dest: 事实上所谓的战友团里除了猎人就是佣兵.

String.Source: Some of these Nords are too afraid they'll sound like milk-drinkers to tell you how they really feel.
String.Dest: 那些诺德人中的一部分太害怕被人看成吃奶娃娃了……以至于不敢说实话。

String.Source: Actually, most of the Companions are either hunters or sellswords.
String.Dest: 事实上所谓的战友团里除了猎人就是佣兵.

String.Source: But I don't think they'd be here if Kodlak didn't believe in them as much as Dalum-Ei believed in me.
String.Dest: 如果克拉科信任他们并不像我信任达卢姆‧艾一样程度的话，他们大概不会来吧？

String.Source: If that's the case, we ought to get you a crown! And servants! And one of those big thrones from where you can give orders to them!
String.Dest: 如果这是真的，我们该推举你为王！再给你些侍从! 还有一个可以向大家发号施令的大王座!

String.Source: Yes, I've always thought of myself as royalty.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直认为自己是皇室。

String.Source: Sounds pretty dull to me, Dragonborn. Maybe you're better off not being royalty.
String.Dest: 我听着好没意思啊，龙裔。也许你还是别做什么皇家身份比较好。

String.Source: Yes, I've always thought of myself as royalty.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直认为自己是皇室。

String.Source: But who knows, you might enjoy milling around with Elenwen and her flock of nobles. Just make it out safe, and then you can tell me what I missed.
String.Dest: 但是谁知道呢，也许你会享受在爱琳温以及她的那些贵客之间转来转去。确保你能安全地从那里出来，然后你才能告诉我我都错过了些什么。

String.Source: Yes, I've always thought of myself as royalty.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直认为自己是皇室。

String.Source: (Laughs) So you both enjoy the company of men?
String.Dest: (笑声) 所以你还是喜欢跟爷们在一起组团？

String.Source: This Elia and I share similar interests.
String.Dest: 这位艾拉真是跟我臭味相投。

String.Source: I hope you're just as adept a healer then. Bedding a male can be filthy business. At least when it's done right.
String.Dest: 真希望你也是个熟练的治疗师。睡男人可是个脏活儿。不过至少她做了该做的事情。

String.Source: This Elia and I share similar interests.
String.Dest: 这位艾拉真是跟我臭味相投。

String.Source: Ha! Then let me make sure you carve it correctly. I apologize for giving you such a hard time. But you adventurers make such easy targets.
String.Dest: (笑声) 然后让我确保你正确的切开了它。很抱歉让你这么犯难。但你们冒险家这样做还是挺容易的。

String.Source: You're bold. I'd like to know your name so I can carve it on your headstone.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢。我想问问你的名字，到时候好刻在你的墓碑上。

String.Source: Greetings, brave traveler. My clan once knew me as Anum-La. The fighters I stand beside, however, call me The Swamp Knight.
String.Dest: 你好，勇敢的旅行者。在我的氏族里他们称呼我为安努姆菈。而那个与我并肩作战的斗士，则叫我沼泽骑士。

String.Source: You're bold. I'd like to know your name so I can carve it on your headstone.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢。我想问问你的名字，到时候好刻在你的墓碑上。

String.Source: Thank you, my friend. I won't let you down.
String.Dest: 多谢，我的朋友。我不会让你失望的。

String.Source: You never have, and I suspect you never will. But if something goes wrong, let out a shout, and I'll do my best to crash the party.
String.Dest: 你从来没有，我怀疑也永远不会有失手的时候。但是如果事情出错，就大喊一声，我会尽我所能来破坏这场派对的。

String.Source: Thank you, my friend. I won't let you down.
String.Dest: 多谢，我的朋友。我不会让你失望的。

String.Source: What's a few dozen toadies against a Swamp Knight, anyway? But I'm sure with you doing the sneaking, it won't be necessary.
String.Dest: 是不是有一大堆马屁精在那里反对沼泽骑士啊？但你偷偷潜伏进去听这些乌七八糟的东西还真是辛苦你了……

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords had scales!
String.Dest: （笑）我还真没听说诺德人有鳞片的！

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords were so ugly!
String.Dest: （笑）我都不知道诺德人都这么丑呢！

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords had fur!
String.Dest: (笑声) 我真不知道诺德人还有绒毛！

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: (Laughs) You think you're a Nord? Then I must be a dragon! Climb on my back, and we'll fly to new worlds!
String.Dest: (笑声) 你以为你是一个诺德人？那我则是一条龙！爬到我的背上，我们将飞向新的世界！

String.Source: And a sensitive one at that! But take heart, traveler, in the knowledge that we Argonians are the beasts.
String.Dest: 一个敏感的家伙！ 既已知道我们亚龙人是野兽，旅行者，振作起来。

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: I wanted to meet the one who braves the marsh.
String.Dest: 我想认识那位有勇气挑战沼泽的人。

String.Source: And I am honored to meet one so thick as to think this pond is a marsh.
String.Dest: 以及，居然让我遇见一个会认为这个池塘是个沼泽的蠢货，我还真是荣幸。

String.Source: What do you want, stranger? I don't have time for chit-chat.
String.Dest: 你到底想要什么，陌生人？我可没时间闲扯。

String.Source: What do you want, stranger? I have a date with the marsh, and the chaurus that call it home.
String.Dest: 陌生人，你想要什么？我还得去与查鲁斯称之为家的那个沼泽约会呢。

String.Source: The truth was I was never supposed to be there. I had found the invitation on a courier while traveling west toward Gideon.
String.Dest: 事实是我从来没有去过那里。当我向西往吉德昂那里走的时候，我就收到了一个信使捎过来的邀请。

String.Source: How come?
String.Dest: 怎么这样？

String.Source: Undaunted, I told them the story of how I trained to become a knight. I used that exact word. In truth, I'd only heard the word "knight" in passing.
String.Dest: 鼓起勇气，我给他们讲了我被如何被训练为一名骑士的故事。我确实用了那个词。实际上，我以前只是听说过“骑士”这个字眼。

String.Source: How come?
String.Dest: 怎么这样？

String.Source: But when travelers from strange lands used the term, their words spoke with a tone heavy with reverence. That's how I wanted them to speak about me.
String.Dest: 但是当异乡旅行者度过了这段时间，他们的语言里就带有了浓浓的尊敬。这就是我想让他们谈谈我的原因。

String.Source: How come?
String.Dest: 怎么这样？

String.Source: Naturally, the company laughed uproariously at my expense. They dubbed me "The Swamp Knight," and I've been that ever since.
String.Dest: 当然，我的同伴们老是拿我开涮取乐。他们给我起了“沼泽骑士”这么个外号儿，自那以后我一直被这么叫了。

String.Source: How come?
String.Dest: 怎么这样？

String.Source: You mean the day, or a certain Redguard thief you keep in your company?
String.Dest: 你的意思是这天某个红卫人的小偷还隐藏在你的同伴中间？

String.Source: What's your opinion on Morndas?
String.Dest: 关于摩恩达斯，你做了什么样的决定?

String.Source: One will steal your coin purse, the other will steal your weekend! (Laughs) But in all seriousness traveler, be careful around the Redguard.
String.Dest: 有人会偷你的钱包，而有人则会偷走你的周末！（笑声）不过说真的，旅行者，小心堤防着点周围的红卫人。

String.Source: What's your opinion on Morndas?
String.Dest: 关于摩恩达斯，你做了什么样的决定?

String.Source: What's your opinion on Morndas?
String.Dest: 关于摩恩达斯，你做了什么样的决定?

String.Source: I admit, I've made a lot of mistakes in my life. But I've always owned up to them. I wear them on my back. Morndas, she wears them on her chest.
String.Dest: 我承认，我在生活中犯了很多错误。但我一直承担它们，将那些错误负于背上。而摩恩达丝，则把它们压在胸口。

String.Source: That's to say, she wears them proudly. But she's loyal, I'll give her that. She has a thief's honor, and I suppose that counts for something.
String.Dest: 也就是说，她自豪的穿着它们。但她是忠诚的，我会把那交予她。她是盗贼的荣耀，我想这很重要。

String.Source: What's your opinion on Morndas?
String.Dest: 关于摩恩达斯，你做了什么样的决定?

String.Source: Would it be better if the weapon was a pie?
String.Dest: 如果武器是张馅饼的话是不是更好点？

String.Source: (Laughs) If it was, I'd have to give the Gods credit for originality! I suppose it doesn't really matter what it is, so long as it works.
String.Dest: （笑声）如果是这样的话，我就得赞美诸神的匠心独运了！我猜那是什么其实无所谓，毕竟这东西已经工作很长时间了。

String.Source: You speak true, Dragonborn. A long quest gives us purpose.
String.Dest: 你说得对，龙裔。一个长久的任务让我们活得有目标。

String.Source: Yes. There's nothing quite as exhilarating as embarking on a long quest.
String.Dest: 是的。没有什么比从事一个长期任务更让人兴奋的了。

String.Source: You know what's at stake, what you have to lose, and that if you stand together as one, there's no way you possibly can.
String.Dest: 事有轻重缓急，你必须做出取舍。如果你打算两者兼得，那是不可能的。

String.Source: Yes. There's nothing quite as exhilarating as embarking on a long quest.
String.Dest: 是的。没有什么比从事一个长期任务更让人兴奋的了。

String.Source: Is that humility, or false modesty? Or maybe you've been picking too many deathbells!
String.Dest: 这是谦卑，还是假惺惺的客气？或者可能是你摘了太多死亡丧钟！

String.Source: You're the hero. I'm just some weakling the Gods chose to give this power to.
String.Dest: 你才是英雄，我只是一个有点运气，被神眷顾的人罢了。

String.Source: I'd take you over any of those heroes they have in Sovngarde, and if you can't see that, it might be time to visit the apothecary.
String.Dest: 我会把你往死里打，好让你看看他们口中的松嘉德的诸位英灵，如果看不到，我也会打的你去找药剂师。

String.Source: You're the hero. I'm just some weakling the Gods chose to give this power to.
String.Dest: 你才是英雄，我只是一个有点运气，被神眷顾的人罢了。

String.Source: You should try it. I think shouting is something you would be good at.
String.Dest: 你应该试试。我想你应该很擅长吼叫。

String.Source: Is that you're way of saying I'm too loud? (Laughs) Maybe you have a point. Who needs an Elder Scroll when you have lizard lungs!
String.Dest: 你是在暗示我声音太大吗？（笑）你说不定没错。如果有蜥蜴的肺活量，就算是上古卷轴又能算什么呢！

String.Source: Maybe if you're a dragon! (Laughs) Now if this shout were called "Lizardrend," then I might have reason to worry.
String.Dest: 如果你是条龙的话！(笑声)现在如果这种喊叫可以称得上是 "亚龙裂" ，那也许我还会稍微担心一小下。

String.Source: Rein in your emotions. This weapon is potentially dangerous.
String.Dest: 放轻松，武器可没长眼。

String.Source: But alright, traveler, I'll do my best.
String.Dest: 好吧，旅行者，我会尽力而为的。

String.Source: Rein in your emotions. This weapon is potentially dangerous.
String.Dest: 放轻松，武器可没长眼。

String.Source: If the Greybeards say it it's one thing, but I trust you to know the difference between peace and indifference.
String.Dest: 尽管灰胡子说这是同样的东西，但我相信你明白与世无争与漠不关心之间的差别在哪。

String.Source: Rein in your emotions. This weapon is potentially dangerous.
String.Dest: 放轻松，武器可没长眼。

String.Source: Not likely, traveler. Hackwings like to hit and run. They'll swoop down and nip you and wait for you to bleed out.
String.Dest: 不太可能，旅行者。刀翼喜欢打游击。它们会突然俯冲下来攻击你然后等你慢慢流血死去。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) You mentioned fighting hackwings. Will that experience help?
String.Dest: （龙族兴起）你曾提到剿灭刀翼。这段经历会有所帮助吗？

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) You mentioned fighting hackwings. Will that experience help?
String.Dest: （龙族兴起）你曾提到剿灭刀翼。这段经历会有所帮助吗？

String.Source: I venture dragons aren't the nipping type. They probably like to chomp, and have much bigger teeth.
String.Dest: 我敢说龙可不是那种细嚼慢咽的类型。他们更应该大口吞吃，他们的牙大得多。

String.Source: Chasing this scroll makes me feel like a knight again. You have ancient evils, legendary weapons and heroes to claim them.
String.Dest: 追求这卷轴让我觉得自己又像一个骑士一样了。你能够召唤远古恶魔，传奇武器和英雄。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) What do you think about all this Elder Scrolls business?
String.Dest: （上古知识）你对上古卷轴的事了解多少？

String.Source: It's an exciting time to be alive, isn't it? Although I never expected the weapon to be a shout! I guess it's a Nord thing.
String.Dest: 活到这一刻还真是激动啊，是吧? 真没想到那件所谓的武器原来是一种吼声！我猜应该是诺德人的玩意吧。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) What do you think about all this Elder Scrolls business?
String.Dest: （上古知识）你对上古卷轴的事了解多少？

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) That's another dragon on our kill list.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的刀刃）这是我们的死亡名单上的另一个龙。

String.Source: (Laughs) Careful, traveler, people might think we're a company of Dragonslayers!
String.Dest: (笑声) 小心，旅行者，人们可能会误以为我们是屠龙者的同伴!

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) That's another dragon on our kill list.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的刀刃）这是我们的死亡名单上的另一个龙。

String.Source: It's a title I can get used to. I mean, there's no such thing as a "good" dragon is there?
String.Dest: 这是个我能适应的头衔。我是说，这里可没有一条“好”龙吧？

String.Source: I bet they do. If I were Klimmek though, I'd probably sneak in a bottle of liquor every now and then.
String.Dest: 我打赌就是他们做的。虽然如果我是科林麦的话，我大概会不时地偷拿几瓶烈酒。

String.Source: (Climb the Steps) The Greybeards must really depend on Klimmek.
String.Dest: （爬台阶）灰胡子看来还真是得依靠科林麦来运送东西啊。

String.Source: (Climb the Steps) The Greybeards must really depend on Klimmek.
String.Dest: （爬台阶）灰胡子看来还真是得依靠科林麦来运送东西啊。

String.Source: The Greybeards are an honorable lot, but even wise men need a break from all the wisdom. Sometimes you just want to act stupid.
String.Dest: 灰胡子是高贵的，但哪怕是最聪明的人也该暂时从智慧中抽出身来。有些时候，你只需要装糊涂就好。

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯被干掉了。莫萨尔应该安全多了吧。

String.Source: Yeah, the town seems much more at ease, although people still don't look Falion in the eye. Only now it's out of guilt.
String.Dest: 这个镇子气氛还是很轻松的，唯一的问题就是法利昂还是没被放在眼里。这可不是负罪感的事情了。

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯被干掉了。莫萨尔应该安全多了吧。

String.Source: But in all honesty, while I didn't fear Falion, I suspected him. It's just after what happened with my old company, even my doubts have doubts.
String.Dest: 不过坦白讲，虽然我不怕法利昂，也还是怀疑他。在我的老伙计发生过那些事之后，我的疑虑就变得更深更难以解开。

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯被干掉了。莫萨尔应该安全多了吧。

String.Source: And with Agni living with him, I didn't want to be responsible for another orphan.
String.Dest: 那么让阿格尼跟他住在一块儿吧。我不想负责另外一个孤儿。

String.Source: Ancano is dead. The College is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了。冬堡学院安全了。

String.Source: But who will save the mages from themselves? (Laughs) That was a jest, traveler. I, for one, am glad to see one less Thalmor in the world.
String.Dest: 但谁会去拯救法师他们自身？（笑）那就是个小丑，旅行者。而那些会为世界上少了一个梭默而庆幸的人，也算我一个。

String.Source: It's just too bad I didn't get to strike the killing blow. Ever since my company disbanded, I've wanted to test my mettle against a true sorcerer.
String.Dest: 很遗憾我没有成功施展出致命一击。自从跟我的同伴分别以来，我一直想要通过对抗一名真正的巫师而证明自己的勇气。

String.Source: Ancano is dead. The College is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了。冬堡学院安全了。

String.Source: I just want to make sure I don't flinch. A knight has to be decisive on the battlefield. Sometimes, I wonder if I still am.
String.Dest: 我只想确认我不会退缩。 一个骑士在战场上必须要果断。 有时我在想我是否依旧这样。

String.Source: Ancano is dead. The College is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了。冬堡学院安全了。

String.Source: Yes, and unless there's room on that overgrown lizard for two, this is where we part ways.
String.Dest: 是的，我们得在这分别了，除非那大蜥蜴身上能多坐一个人。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: I just want to say thank you. A part of me died the day my company disbanded, and the part that remained was unclean.
String.Dest: 我只想说谢谢你。当我的队友解散之后，我的身体一部分已经算是死了。另一部分……我觉得他是污秽的。

String.Source: But traveling with you, fighting by your side, I was able to reclaim a sense of honor. A belief that I was doing some good.
String.Dest: 但和你一起旅行，在你身边战斗，能让我拾回那久违了的荣誉感。我相信我是在做好事。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: I no longer have to mourn the person I was. I can spend the rest of my life celebrating who I am. And I couldn't have done it without you.
String.Dest: 我不会再自怨自艾了。我会穷尽我的一生为自己的身份而骄傲。是你让我有了如此大的转变。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: So if you'll kindly go and save this world, I'll do my best to live in it. Not as a Swamp Knight, but a real one.
String.Dest: 所以如果你会去拯救这个世界的话，我将尽力为此而存在。不是作为沼泽骑士，而是一个真正的人。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: Hard to say. Aside from the fact that Dalum-Ei recruited mages, I'd say the biggest difference is the name.
String.Dest: 很难说。事实上，除了达卢姆‧艾招募了一些法师外，我认为我们和战友团最大的不同之处是名字。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) How do the Companions compare to your old company?
String.Dest: (荣誉召唤)这个同伴和你以前的同伴比起来如何？

String.Source: The Companions already have a long history. We were trying to make one.
String.Dest: 战友团已经有很长一段历史，我们也曾试过去创造一段历史。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) How do the Companions compare to your old company?
String.Dest: (荣誉召唤)这个同伴和你以前的同伴比起来如何？

String.Source: But we both were founded on honor and glory. The fact that a few people around here still believe in it is a testament to their company.
String.Dest: 但是我们都是为了荣耀和赞颂。实际上这里很少还有人始终相信他们同伴的遗嘱。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) How do the Companions compare to your old company?
String.Dest: (荣誉召唤)这个同伴和你以前的同伴比起来如何？

String.Source: It's done. Alduin's dead. Skyrim, saved.
String.Dest: 成功了。奥杜因死了。而天际省得到了拯救。

String.Source: (Laughs) So that's what all the commotion is about? And here I thought the Nords had discovered a poorer tasting mead!
String.Dest: (笑声) 那么，这就是骚乱的原因了？我觉得这些诺德人找到了难喝的蜜酒！

String.Source: It's done. Alduin's dead. Skyrim, saved.
String.Dest: 成功了。奥杜因死了。而天际省得到了拯救。

String.Source: Although I suppose you vanquishing Alduin is something worth celebrating as well! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 尽管我认为你打败奥杜因这事儿也值得庆祝庆祝！ (笑声)

String.Source: It's done. Alduin's dead. Skyrim, saved.
String.Dest: 成功了。奥杜因死了。而天际省得到了拯救。

String.Source: But in all seriousness, it must have been an epic battle. I wish I could've been there and fought by your side.
String.Dest: 但说实在的，那肯定是一场史诗般的战斗。我真希望我当时能和你并肩作战啊。

String.Source: Don't Argonians travel inside giant worms?
String.Dest: 难道亚龙人不是在那些巨大的虫子中旅行的种族吗？

String.Source: Ah, you speak of the rootworm. Not a preferred method of travel, on account of speed. Smuggler's prefer the secrecy, however.
String.Dest: 啊，你说的那是食根虫。不算是个旅行的好方式，速度不行。只不过玩走私的觉得比较隐蔽而已。

String.Source: Don't Argonians travel inside giant worms?
String.Dest: 难道亚龙人不是在那些巨大的虫子中旅行的种族吗？

String.Source: Nothing we were involved with in our little neck of the swamp.
String.Dest: 我们在沼泽的那块小地方里与世无争。

String.Source: What was the company's makeup?
String.Dest: 这战友团都是些什么人？

String.Source: We were an elite band of fighters, hired to do jobs common sellswords weren't equipped for.
String.Dest: 我们是一群精锐战士组成的团体，被雇佣来做一般佣兵搞不定的事儿。

String.Source: What was the company's makeup?
String.Dest: 这战友团都是些什么人？

String.Source: At first, I thought the "honorable" part was a joke. Our company was made up of liars, drunkards, and lying drunkards.
String.Dest: 首先，我认为“荣耀”部分完全就是个笑话。骗子，醉汉，说谎的酒鬼构成了我们的团队。

String.Source: What was the company's makeup?
String.Dest: 这战友团都是些什么人？

String.Source: But they were all loyal. And they were all honorable. They were good beasts, mer and men.
String.Dest: 但他们心中充满忠诚。而且他们心中充满荣耀。他们是优秀的兽类，精灵和人类。

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: When we got there, the Shadowscale, Ula-Wei, scouted ahead as the rest of us waited near the entrance. He found bear traps and trip wires.
String.Dest: 当我们到那里时，那个影鳞，乌拉卫，在我们等在路口的时候侦察到了一些东西。他找到了捕熊的陷阱和绊绳。

String.Source: The occupants were further in, he said. Black robed mages. Chanting. The whole thing stunk like a Thalmor's wet diaper.
String.Dest: 居住者还在更远处，他说。黑袍法师。吟唱。整件事情都跟臭得跟个梭默的湿尿布似的。

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: Traps or no, bandits usually post sentries in and outside the cave.
String.Dest: 是陷阱，或者啥都没有。强盗通常都在山洞内外设置岗哨。

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: The Nord, Arnwulf though, he got tired of all the standing around. Black robes and ominous words. Good enough for him.
String.Dest: 诺德人阿恩武夫虽然已经厌倦了一切的无所事事。但黑色的长袍和不详的话语，这些对他来说已经足够好了。

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: Dalum-Ei gave the nod. Couldn't chance it. Some poor hatchling could've been on a table, about to become some sick bastard's war puppet.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾点头了，没法变了。一些可怜的幼体没有呆在桌子上，变成了一些混蛋的战争傀儡。

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: That's an old story. Back when the Hrothgar monks had milk in their beards from sucking their mother's teats! Okay, maybe not that old, but old.
String.Dest: 这是一个古老的故事。这得回溯到高吼峰的修道士从他们母亲的乳头吸得满胡子奶的时候！好吧，也许年代没那么久远，但这个故事依然是很古老的。

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: I was traveling in Black Marsh with a company of fighters. We fashioned ourselves the "Honorable Eight."
String.Dest: 我曾经和一个战士组织在黑沼泽省旅行。我们把自己称为“神圣八人众 ”。

String.Source: What was the bad choice your company made? What caused you to split up?
String.Dest: 你的同伴做了什么坏抉择？怎么你们散伙了？

String.Source: The job was simple. Clear out a cave of necromancers that were terrorizing one of the clans that resided near the border.
String.Dest: 这个活儿很简单，只要清除驻扎在边境附近的那窝儿藏匿于山洞的亡灵法师就行了。他们好死不死的恐吓了一个氏族。

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: What was the bad choice your company made? What caused you to split up?
String.Dest: 你的同伴做了什么坏抉择？怎么你们散伙了？

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: The clan said a hatchling had gone missing, and rumors were abound of corpses stolen for experiments, and live bodies turned into corpses.
String.Dest: 这个氏族说小孩子下落不明了。于是尸体被偷走用于实验，或者将活人转换成死尸之类的谣言开始疯传。

String.Source: I almost did! I never took the road, and covered my tracks through Niben Bay.
String.Dest: 我几乎做到了！我从没走过那条路，然后不露痕迹的通过尼本湾。

String.Source: You should've ran through a horde of ogres. That would scare him off.
String.Dest: 你要是从一群食人魔中穿过就好了。那会吓跑他的。

String.Source: I thought if I made the journey rough enough, he'd leave. But whenever I looked back, he was always there.
String.Dest: 我想如果我的旅途足够艰苦的话，他就会离开。但每当我回头看的时候，他总在那里。

String.Source: You should've ran through a horde of ogres. That would scare him off.
String.Dest: 你要是从一群食人魔中穿过就好了。那会吓跑他的。

String.Source: Is the boy getting along with the other orphans?
String.Dest: 这个男孩和其他的孤儿相处的好吗？

String.Source: Can't tell. Every time I come to Riften, he starts following me again. But at least he knows better than to leave the city.
String.Dest: 没看出来。每次我来到裂谷城，他就开始跟踪我了，但是他至少知道还是离开这个城市为妙。

String.Source: Is the boy getting along with the other orphans?
String.Dest: 这个男孩和其他的孤儿相处的好吗？

String.Source: I think he finally realizes he's found a home.
String.Dest: 我认为他终于意识到他已经找到了一个家。

String.Source: I used to tell Arnwulf he was ugly enough to be one! (Laughs) He never laughed so hard.
String.Dest: 我曾跟阿恩武夫说他丑的就像个兽人。（笑声）从没见过他笑得那么生硬。

String.Source: All you needed was an Orc.
String.Dest: 你所需要的就是一个兽人。

String.Source: What chivalry! Perhaps you'll also fetch me a bib, so that I don't stain my tunic when I vomit at your words.
String.Dest: 多么强大的骑士精神！也许你该给我个围兜，那样的话当我因为你话吐了的时候就不会弄脏自己的外衣了。

String.Source: The marsh is dangerous. You should not delve into it as you do.
String.Dest: 那块沼泽相当危险，为了你的生命安全请务必远离那里。

String.Source: It was an Imperial boy, hiding in a small crevice in the rock. I didn't know who he was, or if he was even with the refugees. The boy was a mute.
String.Dest: 那是一个帝国的男孩儿，躲在一道窄小的石头缝里。我不知道他是谁，以及他到底是不是跟那些难民在一起。那男孩儿是个哑巴。

String.Source: Who was it?
String.Dest: 谁在那？

String.Source: Part of me thought it would be better to slay him. But another part of me saw the hatchling in the swamp, just trying to survive until morning.
String.Dest: 理智的一部分告诉我，把他干掉会比较好，但另一部分情感告诉我，在太阳出来前，还是在沼泽里保护他，让他别受到伤害吧。

String.Source: Who was it?
String.Dest: 谁在那？

String.Source: The company disbanded. Honor brought us together, and dishonor drove us apart. Me and the healer, Elia, went north. The boy, he followed.
String.Dest: 连队解散了。荣耀让我们聚在一起，耻辱让我们分崩离析。我还有治疗者伊利亚去了北方。那个男孩还跟着。

String.Source: Who was it?
String.Dest: 谁在那？

String.Source: We split up in Bravil. Don't know why he chose me. Seems to me he was better off with the Breton. But as I kept going north, he never left my side.
String.Dest: 我们在布拉维尔分了手，我不知道为什么他选择了我。在我看来，他和那个布莱顿人在一起会更好。但是就算我一直往北走，他也从未离开过我身边。

String.Source: Who was it?
String.Dest: 谁在那？

String.Source: Sadly, no. The child was on the table like Ula-Wei said, but she was already dead. The people around her were mourners. Black robes.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，没有。这个孩子像乌拉卫所说的那样躺在桌子上，但她已经死了。哀悼者们都穿着黑色的长袍，围绕在她身边。

String.Source: Did you rescue the child?
String.Dest: 你把那孩子救出来了？

String.Source: They were refugees from Cyrodiil. Altmer, Khajiit, and Argonian. Driven from Leyawiin. To the clans, they might as well have been wraiths.
String.Dest: 他们是从赛瑞迪尔来的难民。高精灵，虎人，还有亚龙人。这些人是从从丽雅雯来的。对于部落来说，他们估计也要变成亡魂了。

String.Source: Did you rescue the child?
String.Dest: 你把那孩子救出来了？

String.Source: I don't know who struck first. It didn't matter. We killed them all. Well, all except one.
String.Dest: 我不知道是谁先动手的。但这不重要。我们把他们全都杀光了，呃，还留了一个活口。

String.Source: Did you rescue the child?
String.Dest: 你把那孩子救出来了？

String.Source: Personally, I'd rather have a man who could wield a sword. But Bodan's lute was both.
String.Dest: 就我个人而言，我宁愿要一个会挥剑的人，但波登除了会耍剑还会弹鲁特琴。

String.Source: A man who can play the lute is handy on a weary road.
String.Dest: 在漫漫长路上，有个会弹琴的人陪着真是太有爱了。

String.Source: Tell me how you got the name "Swamp Knight."
String.Dest: 告诉我你是怎样得到“沼泽骑士”这个绰号的？

String.Source: Well, it's a short story. I carry a sword. I'm from the swamps of Black Marsh. Do you need me to continue, or can you piece it together from here?
String.Dest: 嗯，这有个小故事。我来自黑沼泽省，我还有把剑。这事你来干还是我来？

String.Source: Tell me how you got the name "Swamp Knight."
String.Dest: 告诉我你是怎样得到“沼泽骑士”这个绰号的？

String.Source: True enough. The name came when I joined a company of fighters, many of whom were celebrated warriors from all over Tamriel.
String.Dest: 对的，当我加入一队勇士的时候想起了这个名字，他们很多都是泰姆瑞尔有名的战士。

String.Source: You explained why you got the name "Swamp Knight." But not how.
String.Dest: 你解释了为什么你会得到“沼泽骑士”的称号，但我想知道你是怎么得到这个称号的。

String.Source: Tell me how you got the name "Swamp Knight."
String.Dest: 告诉我你是怎样得到“沼泽骑士”这个绰号的？

String.Source: There were members who served as honor guards for tribal chieftains, and those who trained under guild masters and various regiments of the Empire.
String.Dest: 有为部落首领服务的仪仗队成员，有经过工会大师严格训练的人，也有许许多多帝国军团的人。。

String.Source: You explained why you got the name "Swamp Knight." But not how.
String.Dest: 你解释了为什么你会得到“沼泽骑士”的称号，但我想知道你是怎么得到这个称号的。

String.Source: There were even retired assassins from the renowned Shadowscales of legend. But none knew of who I was, or why I was recruited to join the company.
String.Dest: 这儿甚至还有一些从富有盛名、带有传奇色彩的影鳞中抽身而退的杀手们。但没有人知道我是谁以及我加入这个组织的原因。

String.Source: Tell me how you got the name "Swamp Knight."
String.Dest: 告诉我你是怎样得到“沼泽骑士”这个绰号的？

String.Source: You explained why you got the name "Swamp Knight." But not how.
String.Dest: 你解释了为什么你会得到“沼泽骑士”的称号，但我想知道你是怎么得到这个称号的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Moon-Tail told me it takes a monster to kill a monster, so maybe that's why you're here.
String.Dest: (笑)月尾跟我说要干掉一只怪物就得用另一只怪物出手，也许这就是你出现在这儿的原因。

String.Source: Morndas has a long way to go before becoming a monster like me.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝要成为像我这样的怪物还有好一大段路要走。

String.Source: If you want to do monstrous things, I want no part of it. That goes without saying. But you weren't asking for my opinion about you.
String.Dest: 如果你真的打算像怪物一样行事，那可别问我要不要参与，因为就算你问了我，我也会拒绝的。但你可没问我对于你的看法。

String.Source: Morndas has a long way to go before becoming a monster like me.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝要成为像我这样的怪物还有好一大段路要走。

String.Source: Morndas is a thief. She'll steal for you, and she'll steal from you. Just be sure it's worth the trade.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个小偷。她为你而偷，也偷你所有。只为有利可图。

String.Source: Morndas has a long way to go before becoming a monster like me.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝要成为像我这样的怪物还有好一大段路要走。

String.Source: It wasn't. But Dalum-Ei founded the company to be good, and do good. To wash all the grime that stuck in his scales during the war.
String.Dest: 不是这样的。但达卢姆‧艾觉得有人陪伴是不错的，并且我看也是这样。至少在战争时有人能够帮你洗掉鳞片间的血污。

String.Source: That doesn't seem like a good business model.
String.Dest: 这似乎并不像一个很好的交易。

String.Source: As such, he'd only agree to work that didn't diminish what we stood for. But contracts have a way of leaving out the details.
String.Dest: 就这样，他只同意解决我们支持的（一方）而不会减少。可合同上还是有漏洞可以抓啊。

String.Source: That doesn't seem like a good business model.
String.Dest: 这似乎并不像一个很好的交易。

String.Source: Was Dalum-Ei saving her for last?
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾把她留到了最后吗？

String.Source: It's possible. There was no guarantee he would ever see her again, but he was always patient.
String.Dest: 有可能吧。谁也不能保证他还有没有机会见到她，可他有的是耐心。

String.Source: Was Dalum-Ei saving her for last?
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾把她留到了最后吗？

String.Source: Or maybe he didn't feel her hands were dirty. She was always watching our back, guarding the entrance. She never went inside.
String.Dest: 又或者在他眼里她一直都是个正派人。她总是守护着我们，守卫着入口。她从来没有进来过。

String.Source: It won't be up to me. Indrel does things her own way, on her own time.
String.Dest: 不关我事。英卓尔做事有她自己的门道，有她自己的时间。

String.Source: Do you think you'll ever see her again?
String.Dest: 你觉得你还会再一次见到她吗？

String.Source: If she promises to show up soon, it could mean anywhere between now and the end of days. I think it's safer not to wait.
String.Dest: 如果她承诺很快出现，这意味着从现在到世界末日都有可能。我感觉还是别去等她比较靠谱儿。

String.Source: Do you think you'll ever see her again?
String.Dest: 你觉得你还会再一次见到她吗？

String.Source: Dalum-Ei said she suspected Bodan.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾说他怀疑波登。

String.Source: That's not surprising. Indrel was always wrong about everything, and just right enough to save herself.
String.Dest: 一点都不意外。英卓尔从没搞对过什么事，只是勉强能够自保而已。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei said she suspected Bodan.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾说他怀疑波登。

String.Source: When she met Dalum-Ei, she was probably perched up high, half asleep, but out of harm's way.
String.Dest: 当她遇见达卢姆‧艾时, 她在高处迷迷糊糊的，但不危险。

String.Source: We should bring some wine and other party items.
String.Dest: 我们该带点酒和什么聚会玩的东东来才对。

String.Source: (Laughs) Sure, why not! It may not be that kind of party, but either way, we'll have something to look forward to when it's done.
String.Dest: (笑声) 当然，为什么不呢！这不是那种聚会，但是同样，我们有值得期待的事情。

String.Source: This person seems trustworthy enough. If not, we can just kill him.
String.Dest: 这个人看起来可以相信了。要是还不可靠，杀了他就是。

String.Source: (Laughs) You remind me of myself. There wasn't a trap alive I couldn't swing my way out of.
String.Dest: (笑声)你让我想起了我自己。没有一个陷阱是我不能大摇大摆活着走出来的。

String.Source: This person seems trustworthy enough. If not, we can just kill him.
String.Dest: 这个人看起来可以相信了。要是还不可靠，杀了他就是。

String.Source: That's why Dalum-Ei used to always remind me...youth fades. Every day your swing gets a little heavier, your feet a little slower.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么达卢姆‧艾总是提醒我……青春易逝。每一天，你的步伐都会慢一点儿，你的脚也会沉重一点儿。

String.Source: This person seems trustworthy enough. If not, we can just kill him.
String.Dest: 这个人看起来可以相信了。要是还不可靠，杀了他就是。

String.Source: In time, you learn it's better to avoid the traps altogether. That, or you don't live to see another.
String.Dest: 总之，你最好及时学会如何避免陷阱。否则你就没机会见到另一个陷阱了。

String.Source: Yes, we should be careful. It's always better to be wrong than unprepared.
String.Dest: 是的，我们应该小心点。做过多的准备总比毫无准备要好。

String.Source: Agreed. I didn't always think so. But you get your tail caught in enough traps, and eventually you learn to watch your step.
String.Dest: 同意。我不经常这么想。但是如果你总在同一类石头上绊倒，你就会注意脚下了。

String.Source: I have no shortage of enemies. Still, bandits don't usually write me letters.
String.Dest: 我从来不缺敌人。然而，强盗们通常不会给我写信。

String.Source: They would, if they knew how to write! (Laughs) Get someone angry enough, and they'll spend every ounce of their energy letting you know it.
String.Dest: 他们会的，只要他们知道如何写！(笑声) 只要让某些人燃起怒火，他们就会花尽每一盎司的精力来让你知道。

String.Source: I have no shortage of enemies. Still, bandits don't usually write me letters.
String.Dest: 我从来不缺敌人。然而，强盗们通常不会给我写信。

String.Source: So we can't rule out anything. Believe me, I've made that mistake far too many times than I care to count.
String.Dest: 所以我们还不能排除任何东西。相信我，我在此之前犯过的那种错误已经多到我懒得去数了。

String.Source: I think this note is for you.
String.Dest: 我想这个便条是给你的。

String.Source: An old friend? Well, I think we can rule out Arnwulf. This person's knowledge of the alphabet goes beyond the letter "C."
String.Dest: 一个老朋友？呃，我想我们可以排除阿恩武夫。这个人认识的字母表绝比字母 "C"要靠后。

String.Source: I think this note is for you.
String.Dest: 我想这个便条是给你的。

String.Source: As for who it is, well, I have no idea. In life, you make a lot of friends, and a lot of enemies, and this could be from any of them.
String.Dest: 至于是谁，啊咧，我不知道。生活中，你结交了很多朋友，还有很多仇人，这可能是从他们中任何一个人手中来的。

String.Source: I don't know what Dalum-Ei told you, but I bet she suspected one of us.
String.Dest: 我不知道达卢姆‧艾给你说了什么，可我打赌她对我们中的一个有所怀疑。

String.Source: What do you think happened to Indrel?
String.Dest: 你认为英卓尔身上发生了什么?

String.Source: Not that she had a reason too, but that girl has Nocturnal's luck.
String.Dest: 她没有那种理性，但那小妞有诺克图娜尔的运气。

String.Source: What do you think happened to Indrel?
String.Dest: 你认为英卓尔身上发生了什么?

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说吧。我听着呢。

String.Source: I was hatched in a small tribal village, lost in the swamps between Thorn and Helstrom. In other words, in the middle of nowhere.
String.Dest: 我在一个小部落中降生，在索恩和赫尔斯托姆之间的沼泽中迷失。换句话说，不知道身在何处.

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说，我在听。

String.Source: As the hatchling of a small and pitiful clan, I couldn't afford to travel to the city and train under the guidance of the tribal guard.
String.Dest: 作为一个小得可怜的氏族的小孩子，我没钱到城市旅行，也没钱在部落守卫的指导下训练。

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说吧。我听着呢。

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说，我在听。

String.Source: Ah, but greedy men insist they are "being practical," when it's an excuse to pander to one's vices. Nevertheless, greed wasn't our problem.
String.Dest: 啊，但当贪婪的人为他们的恶习找借口的时候，他们总说自己只是“更现实一些”。尽管如此，贪婪不是我们的问题。

String.Source: Honor is a word poor people throw around to justify their poverty.
String.Dest: 穷人们总是把荣耀这个词挂在嘴边来为他们的贫穷辩解。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: And children can't be blamed for the ills of their fathers, yet we burden them with history. Dalum-Ei refused to. So they came for him, and for us.
String.Dest: 再说孩子不应该因为父辈的错误被谴责，我们向来都用历史来给他们增加负担。达卢姆‧艾不想如此。因此他们为他而来，也为我们而来。

String.Source: They ambushed our camp one night when the mist was thick. Skilled warriors with poison-tipped spears. The others fought them off as best they could.
String.Dest: 在那个雾气蒙蒙的夜晚，他们伏击了我们的营地。老练的战士们将长矛涂上毒药。其他人尽他们所能的赶走了那些人。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei ordered me to stay with the cargo. One by one I watched my friends emerge from the white, blood dripping from their wounds.
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾命令我跟货物一呆着。我眼睁睁看着我的朋友们一个接一个的从雾气中慢慢浮现，他们的伤口还都滴着血。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: Bodan arrived carrying Ula-Wei on his shoulder. He said more were on the way. He turned to Elia, but she shook her head. She was all out of magicka.
String.Dest: 波登扛着乌拉卫出现在了雾气中。他说他大部分时间都花在了路上。他转向了艾拉，但是艾拉摇了摇头。她已经耗尽了魔力。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: Indrel was the first to suggest we drink the potions from the shipment. Dalum-Ei said he would kill anyone who tried.
String.Dest: 英卓尔第一个建议我们喝一下货里的药剂， 达卢姆‧艾说谁那样做他就杀了谁。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: So I grabbed my sword and demanded Ula-Wei tell me which direction they were coming from. He turned to Dalum-Ei, and our leader nodded.
String.Dest: 于是我抓住我的剑柄要乌拉卫告诉我他们从哪个方向来。他扭头询问达卢姆‧艾的意见，我们的头领点了点头。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: Yes. There was Arnwulf, a former member of the Fighters Guild in Cyrodiil. A big Nord man, with an even bigger laugh.
String.Dest: 是啊。阿恩武夫以前是赛瑞迪尔战士公会的成员。一个彪悍的诺德汉子，比他更彪悍的是他的笑容。

String.Source: In contrast, Ula-Wei never said a word. He was a retired Shadowscale, and the only noise he made was when he sharpened his daggers.
String.Dest: 相比之下，乌拉卫从不说一句话。他是个退休的影鳞，他会发出的唯一声响就是打磨自己匕首的声音。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was a conjurer, who conjured monsters as quickly as he conjured lies. And Elia, a Breton healer, whose lust for men had no cure.
String.Dest: 月尾是一个（亚龙人）巫师，他施法的速度和他倒下的速度一样快。伊利亚, 一个布莱顿人医师，她的性欲强到没得救。

String.Source: Then there was the Bosmer, Indrel. Lazy girl, that one. When we made camp, she slept in the trees. But always with one eye open.
String.Dest: 这儿曾经有个木精灵, 英卓尔. 是个懒惰的姑娘。当我们扎营的时候，她就睡在树上。但总是睁着一只眼。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: There was a Redguard named Bodan, a man whose gift of strings and tongue once earned him a place beside an Argonian tribal chief.
String.Dest: 曾经有个叫波登的红卫人，凭着出色的口才得到了一位亚龙人部族酋长的赏识。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: And lastly, our leader, Dalum-Ei, a legendary swordsman who fought in The Great War.
String.Dest: 而最后，我们的领导者，达卢姆·艾，这位传奇剑客参加了世界大战。

String.Source: A thief's honor is as good as a knight's.
String.Dest: 一个盗贼的荣耀和骑士的是一回事。

String.Source: Traveler, I'd have to disagree. A code takes discipline. It requires rules. Morals. Standards.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我不是很同意你的观点。准则带来纪律，这也需要规则、道德和标准的约束。

String.Source: A thief's honor is as good as a knight's.
String.Dest: 一个盗贼的荣耀和骑士的是一回事。

String.Source: A thief spends their whole life breaking those things. A knight spends their entire life defending them.
String.Dest: 一个小偷耗尽一生要破坏的的东西，也是一个骑士奉献一生要守护的东西。

String.Source: It would have been the honorable thing. Ula-Wei would have done it too, had Elia not stood in his way.
String.Dest: 这是件光荣的事儿。乌拉韦也会这么做的，伊利亚不会阻碍他。

String.Source: You were right the first time. The boy should've died in that cave.
String.Dest: 你终于刚才正确了一次。那男孩本来应该已经死在那洞穴了。

String.Source: You were right the first time. The boy should've died in that cave.
String.Dest: 你终于刚才正确了一次。那男孩本来应该已经死在那洞穴了。

String.Source: Of course, by the time we got to Bravil, the harlot would have nothing to do with him!
String.Dest: 当然，等我们到达布拉维尔的时候，那妓女连理都不会理他的！

String.Source: She liked them young and stupid, she said, but not that young, and not that stupid.
String.Dest: 她说，她喜欢他们的年轻和愚蠢，但他们不是那么年轻，也没有那么愚蠢。

String.Source: You were right the first time. The boy should've died in that cave.
String.Dest: 你终于刚才正确了一次。那男孩本来应该已经死在那洞穴了。

String.Source: I told her the boy was twice as smart as Arnwulf, and three times the man! She laughed so hard the ale spit out of her ass.
String.Dest: 我跟她说那个男孩儿比阿恩武夫还要聪明两倍，比起那个男人更是聪明三倍！她笑得那么厉害，麦芽酒都顺着她的屁股流了下来。

String.Source: You were right the first time. The boy should've died in that cave.
String.Dest: 你终于刚才正确了一次。那男孩本来应该已经死在那洞穴了。

String.Source: Ugh!
String.Dest: 呃！

String.Source: If that's your best, you won't live much longer!
String.Dest: 如果这就是你的最强实力，那你死定了！

String.Source: Curse you!
String.Dest: 诅咒你！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 来呀来呀，就这点本事吗？

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你这样还不够看！

String.Source: Bastard!
String.Dest: 魂淡！

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 噢！够了！一切都完了

String.Source: Like the pinch of a mudcrab!
String.Dest: 就像一只跳蚤咬的!

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Eyaargh!
String.Dest: 哎呀！

String.Source: Stand still, damnit!
String.Dest: 站住，该死的！

String.Source: Die witch!
String.Dest: 死吧女巫！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: Hrragh!
String.Dest: 哈呀！

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这无名的蝼蚁之辈！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: How about a shave, werewolf!
String.Dest: 来剃个毛怎样啊，狼人！

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你只不过会夸夸其谈而已！

String.Source: Eyraargh!
String.Dest: 伊呀阿阿！

String.Source: I'll tear you to pieces!
String.Dest: 我要把你撕碎！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 想尝尝这招吗？

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你这恶魔！

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要取你的首级！

String.Source: Victory is yours! Do what you must.
String.Dest: 胜利是你的！去履行义务吧！

String.Source: This isn't over.
String.Dest: 这事情没完。

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Is that it? Is that your best?
String.Dest: 就这？你就这点能耐？

String.Source: Not quite good enough!
String.Dest: 还不够好！

String.Source: You'll need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 不给力啊！！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: Now you'll pay!
String.Dest: 付出代价吧！

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有命的时候，投降吧！

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我能连你的鳞片都一刀切了，怪物！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 投降或着去死吧！

String.Source: You think you can best me, Orc?
String.Dest: 你以为可以打败我吗，兽人？

String.Source: I will cut off your tail, cat!
String.Dest: 我会把你的尾巴给砍下来的，你这只死猫！

String.Source: We aren't leaving without your head!
String.Dest: 不取了你的狗命我们是不会罢休的！

String.Source: For the Companions!
String.Dest: 为了同伴！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: You don't have a chance, kitten!
String.Dest: 你没有机会了，小猫咪！

String.Source: You will yield or you will die!
String.Dest: 投降！或者死！

String.Source: Let's see what you can do!
String.Dest: 看看你有什么本事！

String.Source: You're out of you league!
String.Dest: 你背叛了组织！

String.Source: The Hist take you!
String.Dest: 希思特会带你走的！

String.Source: By the Hist, you're an annoying one!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上, 你这个讨厌鬼!

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: Why won't you die already?
String.Dest: 你怎么还不去死？

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没！

String.Source: Get back in your hole Draugr!
String.Dest: 滚回你的坑里去尸鬼！

String.Source: Damn rebels!
String.Dest: 该死的叛军。

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵术士啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: Well, I knew Arnwulf the drunk, and Arnwulf the letch, and Arnwulf the brute. But Arnwulf the Wayfarer? Can't say I have.
String.Dest: 很好，我知道阿恩武夫。此人又嗜酒又色情又粗暴无礼。但你说阿恩武夫只是一个旅人？我难以言明我有多么吃惊。

String.Source: But I'm sure if I did know him, I would be proud to call him a friend.
String.Dest: 但如果我认识他，我当然为能叫他作朋友感到骄傲。

String.Source: Ugh, don't remind me. I'll never get that week back.
String.Dest: 啊，别提醒我。我永远不想回忆那一周了。

String.Source: I thank you. We were no Heroes of Riverwood, but we had our time.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我们的溪木镇没有英雄，但我们有我们的时间。

String.Source: (Laughs) True.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真的。

String.Source: Maybe for you two, but I don't see any other Argonians here.
String.Dest: 也许你俩是例外，我平时真没在这儿见过亚龙人。

String.Source: It was a tree like this. Sitting on a tiny island. The seven of them were standing there, waiting for the eighth.
String.Dest: 这就像这样的一棵树，在一个小岛上，他们中的七个人已经等候在那里，等着第八个人的出现。

String.Source: I marched up to them, lashing my tail against the water. I said "I heard this company is in need of a true knight. Well, look no further."
String.Dest: 我悄悄的靠近他们，用尾巴轻拍水面。我说 "我听说这个伙伴是个真正的骑士。好吧至少现在是。"

String.Source: They all laughed. All except Dalum-Ei. He walked up to me, shook my hand and said, "Welcome."
String.Dest: 他们都放声大笑。除了达卢姆‧艾。他走到我面前，握着我的手说，“欢迎回来。”

String.Source: I don't know if what he did was the honorable thing. But he believed it was, and that's a burden few are willing to bear.
String.Dest: 我不知道他所做的事是否值得夸耀。但是他坚信如此，而且那是个少有人愿意忍受的负担。

String.Source: Now, having slain him, I know his pain.
String.Dest: 把他杀掉之后，我知道了他的那种痛苦。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei, I stood by you, trusted you...is this what you call a knight's honor?
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾，我在你左右，信任你…这就是你所谓的骑士荣誉？

String.Source: And I swore my own vow. To protect the lives of my friends, and to never let another innocent die.
String.Dest: 我以自己生命立誓：以我全部生命保护至亲好友，让纯真在世界上不会消亡！

String.Source: No!
String.Dest: 不！

String.Source: Wake up traveler! Bodan and Dalum-Ei! They're gone!
String.Dest: 醒来！旅行者！ 波登和达卢姆‧艾! 他们跑啦!

String.Source: Bodan wouldn't have left without leaving a note. It must be around here somewhere.
String.Dest: 波登不会不留下痕迹就离开的。这附近一定还有什么。

String.Source: Don't be so sure. It's not like the old days. Maybe this time it was me doing the saving! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 话别说得太满。它不是像以前那样。也许这次我能做出一次拯救的行为！ (笑声)

String.Source: Dalum-Ei! It really is you!
String.Dest: 达卢姆‧艾！真的是你！

String.Source: He's here?
String.Dest: 他在这儿？

String.Source: So now what? What's our next move?
String.Dest: 现在怎么着？我们接下来干嘛？

String.Source: Bodan! It looks like that Thalmor was right. Gabania sent these men.
String.Dest: 波登!看上去梭默是对的。卡贝尼亚派出的这些人。

String.Source: Although by the looks of it, he's not the only one. Sellswords, traveler. Five by my count.
String.Dest: 经过观察，他可不是唯一的一个。还有佣兵呢,旅行者。至少五个。

String.Source: If what that note says is true, then Bodan may get some exercise yet.
String.Dest: 如果笔记上说的是真的，那么波登可能已经接受过一些训练了。

String.Source: Alright. I'll find out what I can.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会尽我所能。

String.Source: Forgive me, Bodan...all those years, all those lessons...and sometimes I wonder if I've learned anything at all.
String.Dest: 原谅我，波登……这么多年了，这么多的教训……有时我会想，我究竟学到了什么呢。

String.Source: Then we band together one last time. We take the fight to anyone and everyone who dares kill one of our own!
String.Dest: 最后一次，我们会联合起来。和任何胆敢杀掉我们中一员的人而抗争！

String.Source: Arnwulf...Moon-Tail...Elia...why?
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫……月尾……艾拉……为什么？

String.Source: By the Hist...What about the others? Dalum-Ei? Indrel?
String.Dest: 希斯特神啊……其他人呢？达卢姆‧艾? 英卓尔?

String.Source: With Elia, he wouldn't have to. Not if he was handsome enough.
String.Dest: 跟艾拉他也不用这样吧？这可不是因为他不够帅。

String.Source: No! How?
String.Dest: 不！怎么会？

String.Source: I haven't seen Elia since we parted in Bravil. How is she?
String.Dest: 自从我和伊利亚在布拉维尔分开以后就没再见过她了。她近况如何？

String.Source: Bodan! What are you doing here?
String.Dest: 波登! 你怎么会在这里？

String.Source: Seeing as he's our only lead, I think we do. Besides, he may have his secrets, but at least he's honest about keeping them.
String.Dest: 鉴于他是我们唯一的线索，我想我们不得不信。虽说他可能有自己的小秘密，但至少在关乎他们的方面，他还算诚实。

String.Source: What do you think? Do we trust this mage?
String.Dest: 你觉得呢？我们能相信这个法师么？

String.Source: Thank you. I know I'm asking a lot, but I don't want you to sacrifice your ideals for mine. If at any point you want to leave, I'll understand.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我知道我问的太多了，可我不愿让你为我牺牲你的理想。如果在任何时候你想离开，我会理解你的。

String.Source: Then I guess I have no choice but to come along.
String.Dest: 我猜我除了一起去以外没别的选择了对吧。

String.Source: But this is something I have to see to the end.
String.Dest: 但我是不撞南墙不会回头的。

String.Source: Then I guess I have no choice but to come along.
String.Dest: 我猜我除了一起去以外没别的选择了对吧。

String.Source: Don't worry. No matter what you decide, I'll have your back.
String.Dest: 别担心，不管你作出什么决定，我都坚定支持！

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. None of this is easy. So it means a lot, knowing you're on my side.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者。这是不容易事。所以它意义重大，我知道你站在我这边了。

String.Source: (Laughs) It could be! You wouldn't be much of a hero if you were scared of a few hundred Daedra!
String.Dest: （笑）有可能！要是一下来好几百个魔人吓你，恐怕就没什么好逞英雄的啦。

String.Source: Honestly, I think opening a gateway to Oblivion might be fun.
String.Dest: 说实话，我觉得开启一扇通往湮灭的大门会很有趣。

String.Source: But in all seriousness, I don't know if saving this boy is the smart thing. But it's the right thing, and as mortals, that's all we can ever do.
String.Dest: 但是认真的讲，我不知道救下这个男孩是不是一件聪明事，但这一定是一件对的事。作为一个凡人，这是我们所能做的全部了。

String.Source: Honestly, I think opening a gateway to Oblivion might be fun.
String.Dest: 说实话，我觉得开启一扇通往湮灭的大门会很有趣。

String.Source: Before, I didn't really get it. I mean, he was traveling with those refugees, trying to find a place far away from Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 之前我确实没能理解。我的意思是，他与这些难民一起旅行，希望能找到一个远离塞洛狄省的地方。

String.Source: How does the boy's past change things?
String.Dest: 这个男孩的过去是如何改变一切的?

String.Source: When we took that away, he had every reason to hate us. But now I realize he saw our pain. No, he didn't just see it. He understood.
String.Dest: 当我们把这个拿走的时候，他有足够的理由憎恨我们……但我现在意识到他当时看到了我们的痛苦……不，不仅是看到……他彻底懂得了这种痛苦。

String.Source: How does the boy's past change things?
String.Dest: 这个男孩的过去是如何改变一切的?

String.Source: I know this urchin means a lot to you. But the boy's too dangerous.
String.Dest: 我知道这顽童对你来说狠重要，但是这个男孩太危险了。

String.Source: If what this mage says is true, then it's not his fault. And if he's guilty of nothing, he doesn't deserve to be punished.
String.Dest: 如果这个法师说的是事实，那么就不是他的错了。再如果他问心无愧，他不会遭报应的。

String.Source: I know this urchin means a lot to you. But the boy's too dangerous.
String.Dest: 我知道这顽童对你来说狠重要，但是这个男孩太危险了。

String.Source: Look, I don't know if saving this boy is the smart thing. But it's the right thing, and as mortals, that's all we can ever do.
String.Dest: 听着，我不知道拯救那个男孩是不是明智的决定。但这是正确的决定，而且作为普通人，那也是我们力所能及的事。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. It's not his fault. Whatever doors he opens, we'll just have to close them shut.
String.Dest: 没关系。这不是他的错。无论他打开哪扇门，我们都会把它关上。

String.Source: You don't think letting the boy live comes with some risk?
String.Dest: 你不觉得让男孩住有一定的风险？

String.Source: Look, I don't know if saving this boy is the smart thing. But it's the right thing, and as mortals, that's all we can ever do.
String.Dest: 听着，我不知道拯救那个男孩是不是明智的决定。但这是正确的决定，而且作为普通人，那也是我们力所能及的事。

String.Source: You don't think letting the boy live comes with some risk?
String.Dest: 你不觉得让男孩住有一定的风险？

String.Source: All right, we'll wait for you there.
String.Dest: 好的,我们等你。

String.Source: I've got some business to attend to. I'll meet you in Riften.
String.Dest: 我还有些事情要处理，我会跟你在裂谷城见面。

String.Source: I've got some business to attend to. I'll meet you outside Mourner's Den.
String.Dest: 我有些事情要处理。我会在送葬者的藏身处外和你见面。

String.Source: All right, we'll wait for you there.
String.Dest: 好的,我们等你。

String.Source: I've got some business to attend to. I'll meet you in Riften.
String.Dest: 我还有些事情要处理，我会跟你在裂谷城见面。

String.Source: I'll probably head back to Morthal myself. But whether it's here or there, you have my steel. Now, there's just more of it to have!
String.Dest: 我会自己回到莫萨尔去的。但无论在哪，我的剑都与你同在。而现在，你还有更多的事要做。

String.Source: Thank you, my friend. I'll find you again if I need you.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，我的朋友。下次当我需要你的时候，我还会来找你的。

String.Source: So, ready to get moving? We ought to test out that new armor of yours.
String.Dest: 那，准备好行动了吗？咱得好好测试一下你的新装甲。

String.Source: You took the words right out of my mouth. To the next fight, traveler! I swear on the Hist it'll be a good one.
String.Dest: 话刚到我嘴边却被先你说了。让我们动身应对下一场战斗吧，旅者！我以圣树希斯特的名义发誓那一定是一场精彩的战斗。

String.Source: True enough, but you can't let it consume you either. At some point, you have to move on.
String.Dest: 确实如此，不过你也不可以受到它的侵蚀。很多时候，你必须放下。

String.Source: Changing clothes won't help. You can't hide the past like it didn't happen.
String.Dest: 改变服装也无济于事。你不能逃避它，就像它没有发生过。

String.Source: You can mourn the dead and live in shame. But in the end, shame won't change what happened.
String.Dest: 你可以悼念死者,生活在耻辱之中。但终究什么也不会改变。

String.Source: Changing clothes won't help. You can't hide the past like it didn't happen.
String.Dest: 改变服装也无济于事。你不能逃避它，就像它没有发生过。

String.Source: Traveling with you, and righting wrongs, that's how I want to honor the fallen.
String.Dest: 和你云游四海，匡扶正义，并将以此荣耀逝者。

String.Source: Changing clothes won't help. You can't hide the past like it didn't happen.
String.Dest: 改变服装也无济于事。你不能逃避它，就像它没有发生过。

String.Source: Ha, and here I thought I'd be more useful like this! Funeral clothes aren't exactly good for stopping arrows.
String.Dest: 哈，我以为我会表现得比现在这个样子更有用一点，葬礼礼服在抵御弓箭方面还真是差劲。

String.Source: I prefer the old clothes myself.
String.Dest: 我宁愿是自己的旧衣服。

String.Source: But I like to think It doesn't matter whether we agree or disagree, whether we're saving the world or saving a life.
String.Dest: 但我时常这样想。不管我们是同意亦或是反对，无论我们是在拯救世界还是在拯救一个生命，这些都无所谓。

String.Source: I prefer the old clothes myself.
String.Dest: 我宁愿是自己的旧衣服。

String.Source: You've got my back, and I've got yours. Mine will just be a little heavier than usual.
String.Dest: 我可以放心的把后背交给你，你也一样……我身上的担子比以往重了一点。

String.Source: I prefer the old clothes myself.
String.Dest: 我宁愿是自己的旧衣服。

String.Source: You look shiny. But strong.
String.Dest: 你看上去闪闪发光，并且很强壮。

String.Source: Ha! It's a little heavier than I remember, but I suppose I can just blind my foes instead!
String.Dest: 哈！这比我印象中还要有些沉重，但我可以把敌人弄瞎，他们就看不到我了。

String.Source: You look shiny. But strong.
String.Dest: 你看上去闪闪发光，并且很强壮。

String.Source: But for now, let me thank you. You've always been there for me. And as I long as I live, I'll try my best to do the same.
String.Dest: 而此刻，让我谢谢你。你一直守着我。所以只要我活着，就会尽全力对你一样好。

String.Source: And it's all thanks to you. I may have learned to fight on my own, but being a knight isn't just about swinging a sword.
String.Dest: 我得为这一切感谢你。也许我已学会战斗方法，但是光是会挥剑可是成不了骑士的。

String.Source: It fits you. You look like a true knight.
String.Dest: 那很适合你。你看起来像个真正的骑士了.

String.Source: Whether it was an old company or a good friend, I am what I am because of people like you.
String.Dest: 不管那是个老战友还是好朋友。我就是因为你这样的人才成为现在的我。

String.Source: It fits you. You look like a true knight.
String.Dest: 那很适合你。你看起来像个真正的骑士了.

String.Source: Then it's settled. I hate to say it, but I can't be a mother to the boy, and I can't teach him to control his magic.
String.Dest: 好了，安置好了。我讨厌说这个，但我做不了孩子的保姆……我也教不了他怎么控制魔法……

String.Source: You decide. I don't care what happens to the urchin.
String.Dest: 你来决定。我可不在乎在那个顽童身上会发生什么。

String.Source: The best I can do is stay close, and keep my sword ready.
String.Dest: 我能做的就是保持近距离，准备好剑。

String.Source: You decide. I don't care what happens to the urchin.
String.Dest: 你来决定。我可不在乎在那个顽童身上会发生什么。

String.Source: Well, we could always try Winterhold. It's not the most comfortable of surroundings, but I'm sure it beats living in some cave.
String.Dest: 嗯，我们总可以试试去冬堡。那个地方再差劲，也比住在洞穴里强。

String.Source: Are you sure? I don't trust this mage can keep him safe.
String.Dest: 你确定吗?我不相信这个法师能保证他的安全。

String.Source: We should take him to Honorhall Orphanage.
String.Dest: 我们应该带他去荣耀厅孤儿院。

String.Source: Hm...you may be right. Sometimes, the best thing for a child is to be around kids his age.
String.Dest: 嗯……也许你是对的。有些时候，对于孩子最好的东西就是他周围的同龄人。

String.Source: We should take him to Honorhall Orphanage.
String.Dest: 我们应该带他去荣耀厅孤儿院。

String.Source: Besides, all that time on the road, and not once was the boy afraid. Not of me, not of Elia, and certainly not of himself.
String.Dest: 此外，在这整一段旅途中，男孩一次都没有害怕过。我也没有，伊利亚也没有，更别说他自己了。

String.Source: The boy could stay with you.
String.Dest: 那个男孩可以和你在一起。

String.Source: Ha! You might be ready for parenthood, but as far as I'm concerned, raising a child is a thousand times scarier than any Oblivion Gate.
String.Dest: 哈! 你可能准备为人父母了，但就我而言， 抚养孩子比任何湮灭之门都要可怕一千倍。

String.Source: The boy could stay with you.
String.Dest: 那个男孩可以和你在一起。

String.Source: But I won't abandon him. I'll do my best to stay close, and keep my sword ready.
String.Dest: 可我决不会放弃他。我会尽可能地贴近，保持战斗状态。

String.Source: Well, what do you think? We came all this way, but I admit, our friend here is probably right. It's best he stay with someone who understands him.
String.Dest: 好吧，你怎么看？我们尽全力来到这里，但是我承认我们在这里的朋友可能是对的。他最好和懂他的人呆在一起。

String.Source: Well, this might take some getting used to, for the both of us.
String.Dest: 呃，对我俩来说，这可能需要花些时间去适应。

String.Source: But it's time I stopped mourning. The company, the refugees...that's all in the past now.
String.Dest: 可我是时候从哀痛中走出来了。伙伴们，难民们……现在都是过去式了。

String.Source: I just didn't want to do it until I new the boy was safe.
String.Dest: 在确保那小子安全之前我是不会干这事的。

String.Source: I'm sure it will. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我相信它会的。谢谢你。

String.Source: You're gonna like this place. It's called "Honorhall." Let's hope it lives up to the name.
String.Dest: 你肯定会喜欢这里的。它的名字是 "荣耀大厅"。 希望在这儿能生活得名副其实吧。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Come on, kid, get up. We're taking you home.
String.Dest: 我想的没错儿。来吧孩子，快起来。我们带你回家。

String.Source: They won't, not after you tell them he's dead. As for any "incidents," you let me worry about that.
String.Dest: 他们不会的，至少不会在你告诉了他们他的死讯之后。对于任何“事故”，你让我担心了。

String.Source: I'm sorry, mage, but the boy's coming with us. We're going to take him to the orphanage.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，魔法师，但这个男孩得跟我们走，我们要带他去孤儿院。

String.Source: Let's go. I don't want him to see me when he wakes up. It'll just make things more confusing.
String.Dest: 我们走吧。我不想要他醒来的时候看见我。这只会让事情变得更加混乱复杂。

String.Source: If you don't mind, I'd like to stop by the marketplace in Riften. Got one more errand I need to run.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意，我想留在裂谷城的市场。我还有许多差事要做。

String.Source: Safe travels, kid. Be good to your new guardian.
String.Dest: 旅途平安，孩子。对你新的监护人好点儿。

String.Source: I wouldn't expect anything less.
String.Dest: 我不会期待事情变得更糟的。

String.Source: Neither is this place, but it's probably where he'll end up otherwise. Face it, the three of us alone won't be enough to protect him.
String.Dest: 不是这里，但总归是一个什么地方可以让他终老一生的。面对现实吧，我们三个保护不了他的。

String.Source: We've come to a decision, mage. You can teach the boy, but it's best you do it in Winterhold. It's safer that way.
String.Dest: 我们已经做出决定了，法师。你可以教这孩子，但教学过程最好不要离开冬堡。这样可能会安全点儿。

String.Source: How's that steel coming along, smith? Is it ready?
String.Dest: 那钢玩意是从哪来的，锻造出来的？已经准备好了吗？

String.Source: I'm sure I will. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我会的，谢谢你。

String.Source: I'm sure it'll be just fine. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我确定它会很好的，谢谢你了。

String.Source: Grelka, did you get the armor I asked for?
String.Dest: 葛雷卡，你拿到我要的盔甲了吗？

String.Source: Safe travels, kid. Be good to your new guardian.
String.Dest: 旅途平安，孩子。对你新的监护人好点儿。

String.Source: Let's go. I don't want him to see me when he wakes up. It'll just make things more confusing.
String.Dest: 我们走吧。我不想要他醒来的时候看见我。这只会让事情变得更加混乱复杂。

String.Source: If you don't mind, I'd like to stop by the marketplace in Riften. Got one more errand I need to run.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意，我想留在裂谷城的市场。我还有许多差事要做。

String.Source: Take the boy, mage. And if you need me for anything, anything at all...just give me a time and place, and I'll be there.
String.Dest: 把那男孩带走吧，魔法师。如果你有任何事需要我帮助,任何事都行……只要告诉我时间和地点，我必将前往协助。

String.Source: So what now? If he's as dangerous as you say, somehow I doubt your friends will give up.
String.Dest: 现在怎么样？如果他像你说的那么危险，我怀疑你的朋友会放弃。

String.Source: The boy! Is he all right?
String.Dest: 孩子！他还好么？

String.Source: Maybe that's the problem.
String.Dest: 也许这就是问题所在。

String.Source: Listen up! I'm only going to say this once. We're taking the boy. Stand aside and you live. Get in our way, and you die.
String.Dest: 听好了！我就特么说一次！我们手上有这个孩子！你站一边去！这没你的事！你想阻拦的话就做好死的准备吧！

String.Source: And if we don't, we risk losing everything else.
String.Dest: 要是我们不做，就有可能失去一切。

String.Source: Then we better let them know we're here.
String.Dest: 那最好是让他们知道我们在这儿。

String.Source: It sounds like chanting! Come on!
String.Dest: 听起来就像是吟唱！继续吧！

String.Source: Do you hear that?
String.Dest: 你听到了么？

String.Source: I doubt that. The boy I knew was a survivor.
String.Dest: 我怀疑这个。据我所知这个孩子还是个幸存者。

String.Source: That's right. What are you hiding? What's this nonsense about an Oblivion Gate?
String.Dest: 这是正确的。你在隐瞒什么？关于湮灭之门的废话？

String.Source: An Oblivion gate? What's she talking about, mage?
String.Dest: 湮灭之门？法师啊，你在说些什么？

String.Source: The only funeral we're gonna have is for you and your friends. I swear on the honor of my company, the child will live.
String.Dest: 我们即将参加的葬礼只有你和你狐朋狗友的。以战友们的名誉发誓，那个孩子会活下来的。

String.Source: Over my dead body!
String.Dest: 踩着我的尸体过去！

String.Source: Well, I've dealt with a lot of mages, and most of them don't get angry unless you start poking around their stuff.
String.Dest: 呃，我面对过很多法师，其中大多数只要你不乱动他们的东西，他们是不会发火的。

String.Source: And what did your little group decide?
String.Dest: 那么你的小队做出决定了吗？

String.Source: Then mark it on my companion's map. Best you let him lead the way.
String.Dest: 在战友团的地图上加上这个地标。最好是让他给你带路。

String.Source: Then mark it on my companion's map. Best you let her lead the way.
String.Dest: 那就在我的同伴的地图上标记一下吧。你最好让她带路。

String.Source: If they kidnapped the boy, then we don't have much time. We need to find him!
String.Dest: 如果这个孩子被绑架了，那我们可没什么时间磨蹭了！快去找他！

String.Source: So what are we dealing with, necromancers?
String.Dest: 那我们到底在对付什么人啊，亡灵巫师？

String.Source: Trust me, mage. When it comes to mistakes, that much I understand.
String.Dest: 相信我，法师。当错误来临时的那种感觉我最清楚。

String.Source: Well, I was trying to get rid of him. What's your excuse?
String.Dest: 嗯，我是想摆脱他。你的理由是什么？

String.Source: I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about.
String.Dest: 我对你所说的东西毫无概念。

String.Source: So you're a mage. Seems a little odd for you to be hunting bandits.
String.Dest: 你是个法师啊……这种人物来处理强盗……有点怪怪的。

String.Source: What do you mean? Who are you? How do you know who I am?
String.Dest: 你什么意思？你是谁？你怎么知道我是谁？

String.Source: What sort of mistakes did you make with the boy? The less you talk, the more suspicious it sounds.
String.Dest: 你到底对那个男孩犯了什么错?你说的越少，听起来越可疑。

String.Source: Why does your friend lives in the Ratways? Not enough corpses at the college?
String.Dest: 为什么你的朋友住在鼠道？难道大学的尸体不够？

String.Source: You know, you don't have to come. These mages are part of your company, aren't they? They're people you know.
String.Dest: 你知道，你其实不用来的。那些法师是你的战友对吧？他们才是你熟悉的人。

String.Source: It doesn't look like the marketplace is open. Let's get some rest and come back in the morning.
String.Dest: 市场还没开啊……咱们先回去睡一觉（哈欠）早上再过来？

String.Source: Just in case what? This Giant ends up using one of us as a backscratcher? No wonder you want another lizard by your side!
String.Dest: 以防什么万一？这个巨人居然就被一个痒痒挠打败了？难怪你觉得你需要个巫师呢！

String.Source: Don't worry, we have a plan for slipping by the Giant. This is just in case.
String.Dest: 别担心，为了以防万一，我们还有一个绊倒巨人的计划。

String.Source: (Laughs) But why not? You've caught me on a good day. Alright, I'll help you slay this Giant.
String.Dest: (笑声) 但为什么不呢？你在这样的好天遇到了我。好吧，我会帮你杀了这个巨人。

String.Source: Don't worry, we have a plan for slipping by the Giant. This is just in case.
String.Dest: 别担心，为了以防万一，我们还有一个绊倒巨人的计划。

String.Source: Just in case what? This Giant ends up using one of us as a backscratcher? No wonder you want a lizard by your side!
String.Dest: 万一什么？这个巨人最终把我们当中的一个作为他的痒痒挠？难怪你要一个蜥蜴在你身边！

String.Source: Don't worry, we have a plan for slipping by the Giant. This is just in case.
String.Dest: 别担心，为了以防万一，我们还有一个绊倒巨人的计划。

String.Source: (Laughs) But why not? You've caught me on a good day. Alright, I'll help you slay this Giant.
String.Dest: (笑声) 但为什么不呢？你在这样的好天遇到了我。好吧，我会帮你杀了这个巨人。

String.Source: Don't worry, we have a plan for slipping by the Giant. This is just in case.
String.Dest: 别担心，为了以防万一，我们还有一个绊倒巨人的计划。

String.Source: The Giant is guarding a treasure. We'll split it four ways.
String.Dest: 那个巨人在守着宝藏。我们分四路行动。

String.Source: Traveler, I never cared much for treasure, but adventure and good company, that's another story.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我从不执着于财宝，但却热衷于冒险，在乎我的优秀同伴，而这是另外一个故事了。

String.Source: The Giant is guarding a treasure. We'll split it four ways.
String.Dest: 那个巨人在守着宝藏。我们分四路行动。

String.Source: So why not? I'll lend you my blade, if you'll lend me your ears.
String.Dest: 为什么不呢？我会把我的剑借给你，如果你稍稍借我会儿耳朵的话。

String.Source: I've sniffed many deathbells but it has no effect on my decisions.
String.Dest: 我闻过很多的死亡丧钟，而这种玩意对我的决定毫无作用。

String.Source: (Laughs) I hope you're right. Living in this swamp, you can't help but be surrounded by them.
String.Dest: (笑声)我希望你是对的。只要生活在这片沼泽里，你就不得不被他们所包围。

String.Source: I've sniffed many deathbells but it has no effect on my decisions.
String.Dest: 我闻过很多的死亡丧钟，而这种玩意对我的决定毫无作用。

String.Source: Maybe that's why I'm actually considering your offer. A Giant! By the Hist, I must be losing my mind!
String.Dest: 可能那就是为何我在考虑你的协助. 一个巨人! 希斯特在上，我快疯掉了!

String.Source: Right traveler, there's toes, cheese, and a pile of swords from all the fools who came before us.
String.Dest: 是啊旅行者，那地方有脚趾头、猛犸奶酪，和一堆之前到这里来的倒霉蛋留下的剑。

String.Source: What about the cheese? Who doesn't like cheese?
String.Dest: 那奶酪呢? 有谁不喜欢奶酪?

String.Source: (Laughs) But why not? You've caught me on a good day. Alright, I'll help you slay this Giant.
String.Dest: (笑声) 但为什么不呢？你在这样的好天遇到了我。好吧，我会帮你杀了这个巨人。

String.Source: What about the cheese? Who doesn't like cheese?
String.Dest: 那奶酪呢? 有谁不喜欢奶酪?

String.Source: (Laughs) You sure you two haven't been sniffing deathbells?
String.Dest: (笑) 你们俩确定自己不是被丧钟花呛了个半死么？

String.Source: We need your assistance with a Giant.
String.Dest: 我们需要你帮忙对付一个巨人。

String.Source: What could you possibly have to gain from slaying a Giant, besides a cracked skull and a handful of toes?
String.Dest: 就算你屠了巨人，那除了一块破碎的头骨和一把脚趾以外，你还能得到什么呢？

String.Source: We need your assistance with a Giant.
String.Dest: 我们需要你帮忙对付一个巨人。

String.Source: And yet you believed everything else? (Laughs) I don't know who's the bigger fool, you or the three idiots that followed you!
String.Dest: 至今你还相信每件事？我不知道谁才是大傻瓜，(笑声) 你还是那三个跟着你的呆瓜！

String.Source: This is all your fault you know. What did you think was down there anyway?
String.Dest: 反正这一切都是你的错。你之前到底以为那下面藏着什么呢？

String.Source: I hate to say it traveler, but the honorable don't lie. It was definitely you.
String.Dest: 我不想提这个，旅行者，但是有荣耀感的人不会说谎。全是因为你。

String.Source: By this Hist! Were you sleeping in that lake?
String.Dest: 我的希斯特大神啊！你是在湖底睡觉吗？

String.Source: Well, I plunged my sword into it enough times where it could be either.
String.Dest: 当然，我把我的剑在里面放了足够久……起码足够让它可以变成任何其他东西。

String.Source: Fine with me. Magic spells I don't really get, but sticking a sword in someone's belly makes sense to me.
String.Dest: 我无所谓。魔法啦咒语啦我是真的搞不明白，但是把剑插进别人肚子里什么的我还是可以理解的。

String.Source: And by "we" I take it you mean "me?"
String.Dest: 你说“我们”？我想你的意思是……“我”？

String.Source: Call me crazy, but I think the music is making him angrier!
String.Dest: 说我是疯子，但我认为这音乐才是让他发怒的罪魁祸首！

String.Source: Well, I hate to be the one to ask, but...is it working?
String.Dest: 呃，我确实不想问，不过……那是在运转吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) And here I thought I wasn't going to have any fun! Where should I stick this Giant?
String.Dest: (笑声)我可没感觉有什么有趣的！我该打这巨人的哪里啊？

String.Source: Just leave that to me and the traveler. We might even put this Giant to sleep the old fashioned way.
String.Dest: 就把它交给我和旅行者吧。我们甚至可能用老办法送这巨人归西呢！

String.Source: Don't pay any attention to the Elf. Mages have their way of doing things, and we have ours.
String.Dest: 不要太在意那个精灵。魔法师们都有自己的一套，当然我们也有。

String.Source: So did Bodan, at first. But that didn't stop us from doing everything we could to change his mind.
String.Dest: 一开始，波登也是。但这并不能阻止我们尝试改变他的想法。

String.Source: In a lot of ways, a good song is like good company.
String.Dest: 从很多方面上来看，好的歌曲跟好的同伴一样重要。

String.Source: (Laughs) Fair enough.
String.Dest: (笑声)很公平。

String.Source: So, are we heading out? Or do you need me to pick up an instrument too?
String.Dest: 那么，我们要出发了么？还是说你想要我再带些家伙？

String.Source: (Laughs) Now that's something we'd both like to see.
String.Dest: (笑声) 这真是喜！闻！乐！见！

String.Source: I'm sure if this treasure was guarded by a pile of firewood, those muscles would come in real handy.
String.Dest: 我很肯定如果这些财宝是被一堆傻瓜所看守的，这些雇佣兵很快就从附近跳出来。

String.Source: I can hear you, you know...
String.Dest: 我听得见你在说什么，你知道么……

String.Source: Of course! Riding a chaurus is just like riding a horse. All you need is a saddle and a strong resistance to poison.
String.Dest: 当然了！骑着查鲁斯的感觉跟骑马没什么两样。你只需要一个马鞍和强效的抗毒药剂。

String.Source: Now some people will tell you you have to be crazy to ride one. Well, you don't have to be, but it certainly helps.
String.Dest: 有些人会告诉你，你得有股子疯劲儿才能骑得上去。其实未必如此，不过能“疯”当然最好。

String.Source: (Laughs) Don't worry Elf. I'm stronger than I look, and I tend to draw attention. This Giant will definitely kill you last.
String.Dest: (笑声) 别慌啊小精灵，我可比看上去强壮的多，并且更吸引眼球……你会是最后一个被干掉的。

String.Source: I remember you. You're the bard who played Bodan's song. You two are a lot alike. When he sang, every note made you feel his pain.
String.Dest: 我记得你。你是那个会唱波登的歌的吟游诗人。你俩可真像。当他唱歌的时候，每一个音符都令人感同身受他的痛。

String.Source: I knew a bard once. He was a lot like you. When he sang, every note made you feel his pain.
String.Dest: 我曾经见过一个吟游诗人。他和你很像。当他开唱时，你会觉得杀猪也不过如此。

String.Source: Then let's go, love. Let the Hist guide us both.
String.Dest: 好的出发，亲爱的。让神指引我们。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Lead, brave one, and I will follow.
String.Dest: 领路吧，勇敢者，我将紧随其后。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Does this weapon look crooked to you? (Laughs) Everything the Orcs forge has a personality!
String.Dest: 这种武器对你而言看起来很弯吗？ (笑声) 兽人打造的每件东西都是这么有个性！

String.Source: It's not often someone asks me to hold on to their mammoth tusk. I'm sure there's one heck of a story behind this one.
String.Dest: 也不是经常有人要求我去握他们的“猛犸牙”。只是我确信这把武器背后肯定有个见鬼的故事。

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: You lead, I'll follow.
String.Dest: 你带路，我跟着你。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: May the Hist guide us.
String.Dest: 愿希思特神树指引我们。

String.Source: Lead on, brave traveler, lead on.
String.Dest: 带路吧，勇敢的旅行者，继续前进。

String.Source: Ready to get moving?
String.Dest: 准备好出发了吗？

String.Source: Ready to get moving?
String.Dest: 准备好出发了吗？

String.Source: So, what's the plan?
String.Dest: 计划是什么？

String.Source: Traveler, I've fought leviathans, and I've fought hackwings, but a dragon? By the Hist! This might be the ale talking, but I can't wait.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我上山打过鸟，下海捉过妖，可是要说龙？老天呐，就算喝多了说胡话吧，我真是等不及试试看啦！

String.Source: How are you holding up, traveler? Don't be afraid to rest early tonight. You've earned it. Don't worry, I'll drink enough for the both of us!
String.Dest: 你还好吧，年轻人？别想太多了，今晚你应该早点休息。别担心，今晚我会替你喝个够！

String.Source: To Ysgramor's Tomb then, traveler. For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 然后去伊斯格拉谟之墓吧，旅行者。为了克拉科！

String.Source: What is it? You look like you have something on your mind. Don't worry, it'll pass.
String.Dest: 怎么回事？你看上去像是忧心忡忡。别担心，会过去的。

String.Source: We're heading out? My scales are itching for a fight. It's that or a bad case of Rust Chancre! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 我们要走了吗？我的鳞片对战斗的渴望已无法抑制。 或许这对鲁斯特·查克利来说是挺糟糕的！(笑声)

String.Source: This death cannot go unavenged, traveler. Take the fight to the Silver Hand. Fight bravely, and fight well.
String.Dest: 这些人不能白白死去，旅行者。跟银手战斗吧。英勇战斗，把他们全都干翻！

String.Source: Lead on, brave traveler, lead on.
String.Dest: 带路吧，勇敢的旅行者，继续前进。

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, She's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 是龙裔，她能讨每个人的欢心。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, He's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的榜样。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, He's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的偶像。

String.Source: Oh no, don't look at me.
String.Dest: 喔不，别盯着我看。

String.Source: Be careful!
String.Dest: 小心！

String.Source: I'm on your side!
String.Dest: 我就在你身旁！

String.Source: Stop that!
String.Dest: 停下来！

String.Source: I'm glad we were able to save them.
String.Dest: 很高兴你能拯救他们。

String.Source: Yes, although I can't say they'll ever be the same. Sometimes death is the answer, but it's not an easy thing to give.
String.Dest: 是的，虽然我不能说他们将永远是相同的。有时候死亡就是这个问题的答案，但这不是一件容易的事情。

String.Source: I'm glad we were able to save them.
String.Dest: 很高兴你能拯救他们。

String.Source: I wanted to kill that boy in the cave, to spare him from the memory. But now, I see it differently.
String.Dest: 我曾经想把洞穴里的那男孩给杀了，把他从那记忆中解脱出来。但现在，我不这么想了。

String.Source: I'm glad we were able to save them.
String.Dest: 很高兴你能拯救他们。

String.Source: That's why, when this party is over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 这就是宴会一结束，我就要赶去裂谷城的原因。

String.Source: I'm glad we were able to save them.
String.Dest: 很高兴你能拯救他们。

String.Source: That boy was the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to find him, and make sure he's safe.
