String.Dest: 那个孩子是我们仅存的一点荣誉了。我答应过战友们要把他找到，并保护他的安全的。

String.Source: Let me guess. Now you want to search for the boy.
String.Dest: 让我猜猜看，现在你想做的是去找那个男孩。

String.Source: How did you know? Maybe you ought to give up adventuring and become a fortune teller!
String.Dest: 你是怎么知道的？我看你还是放弃冒险家这个职业改行算命好啦！

String.Source: Let me guess. Now you want to search for the boy.
String.Dest: 让我猜猜看，现在你想做的是去找那个男孩。

String.Source: I heard it's easy money, and you don't even have to be right! Just vague.
String.Dest: 我听说赚钱很容易。你甚至不用做得对！只要含糊其辞就行。

String.Source: Let me guess. Now you want to search for the boy.
String.Dest: 让我猜猜看，现在你想做的是去找那个男孩。

String.Source: But you're right, when this party's over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 但是你是对的，宴会结束之后我就马上返回裂谷城。

String.Source: Let me guess. Now you want to search for the boy.
String.Dest: 让我猜猜看，现在你想做的是去找那个男孩。

String.Source: That boy was the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to find him, and make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 那个孩子是我们仅存的一点荣誉了。我答应过战友们要把他找到，并保护他的安全的。

String.Source: This just gets stranger and stranger.
String.Dest: 这真是越来越奇怪了。

String.Source: Drunk already, huh? Save some for the rest of us!
String.Dest: 已经喝了，哼嗯？留一些给我们啊！

String.Source: This just gets stranger and stranger.
String.Dest: 这真是越来越奇怪了。

String.Source: But seeing all that blood, it's enough to make us all drunkards. For me, it was that cave all over again.
String.Dest: 但是你看那些血，足够我们全部喝醉了。对于我来说, 这只是重蹈那洞里的覆辙。

String.Source: This just gets stranger and stranger.
String.Dest: 这真是越来越奇怪了。

String.Source: That's why, when this party is over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 这就是宴会一结束，我就要赶去裂谷城的原因。

String.Source: This just gets stranger and stranger.
String.Dest: 这真是越来越奇怪了。

String.Source: That boy was the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to find him, and make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 那个孩子是我们仅存的一点荣誉了。我答应过战友们要把他找到，并保护他的安全的。

String.Source: What do you mean, saved? They died.
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，被拯救了？他们明明是死了！

String.Source: Oh really? You better tell our friend over there to get back in his coffin!
String.Dest: 哦真的？你最好快去那告诉我们的朋友让他赶快回到他的棺材里。

String.Source: What do you mean, saved? They died.
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，被拯救了？他们明明是死了！

String.Source: But I don't blame you for having bad memories of that place. For me, it was that cave all over again.
String.Dest: 但是我不为了那个有着糟糕回忆的地方儿怪你。对于我来说，这是那个洞穴的重演。

String.Source: What do you mean, saved? They died.
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，被拯救了？他们明明是死了！

String.Source: That's why, when this party is over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 这就是宴会一结束，我就要赶去裂谷城的原因。

String.Source: What do you mean, saved? They died.
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，被拯救了？他们明明是死了！

String.Source: That boy was the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to find him, and make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 那个孩子是我们仅存的一点荣誉了。我答应过战友们要把他找到，并保护他的安全的。

String.Source: Late for your own party, huh? Well, traveler, you've earned the right.
String.Dest: 自己的聚会都迟到了哈？好吧，旅行者，你有这个权利了。

String.Source: I'm sure all those prisoners you saved in Angarvunde can attest to that.
String.Dest: 我很确定你从安枷坟救出来的囚犯能够证明这一切。

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 我同意！

String.Source: To the Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 龙裔万岁！

String.Source: Speech!
String.Dest: 说话！

String.Source: (Laughs) True.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真的。

String.Source: Maybe for you two, but I don't see any other Argonians here.
String.Dest: 也许你俩是例外，我平时真没在这儿见过亚龙人。

String.Source: Ungh. Maybe for you two.
String.Dest: 嗯，也许是为你们两个人。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, She's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 是龙裔，她能讨每个人的欢心。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, he's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的榜样。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, he's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的偶像。

String.Source: Oh no, don't look at me.
String.Dest: 喔不，别盯着我看。

String.Source: It's a long story.
String.Dest: 说来话长。

String.Source: I'm afraid we don't. We don't even have a company anymore.
String.Dest: 我很担心我们办不到，我们甚至连其他同伴都没有。

String.Source: I thank you. We were no Heroes of Riverwood, but we had our time.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我们的溪木镇没有英雄，但我们有我们的时间。

String.Source: Well, I knew Arnwulf the drunk, and Arnwulf the letch, and Arnwulf the brute. But Arnwulf the Wayfarer? Can't say I have.
String.Dest: 很好，我知道阿恩武夫。此人又嗜酒又色情又粗暴无礼。但你说阿恩武夫只是一个旅人？我难以言明我有多么吃惊。

String.Source: But I'm sure if I did know him, I would be proud to call him a friend.
String.Dest: 但如果我认识他，我当然为能叫他作朋友感到骄傲。

String.Source: Ugh, don't remind me. I'll never get that week back.
String.Dest: 啊，别提醒我。我永远不想回忆那一周了。

String.Source: (Laughter)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: Keep digging Elf, you'll find it in there somewhere.
String.Dest: 继续挖吧精灵，就在那里面你肯定找得到。

String.Source: It was a damn good party. I thank you for having me.
String.Dest: 真是个棒得特么要死的宴会啊！感谢你带着我！

String.Source: (Laughs)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: Well, I knew Arnwulf the drunk, and Arnwulf the letch, and Arnwulf the brute. But Arnwulf the Wayfarer? Can't say I have.
String.Dest: 很好，我知道阿恩武夫。此人又嗜酒又色情又粗暴无礼。但你说阿恩武夫只是一个旅人？我难以言明我有多么吃惊。

String.Source: But I'm sure if I did know him, I would be proud to call him a friend.
String.Dest: 但如果我认识他，我当然为能叫他作朋友感到骄傲。

String.Source: Oh, before I forget, here. Someone handed me this bottle of mead. I prefer ale, so here you go. Find it a good home.
String.Dest: 哦，趁我还记得，拿着这个。有人给了我这瓶蜜酒，但其实我想要的是麦芽酒来着。所以说拿着它吧，好好地对待它。

String.Source: Zora asked me to hand out drinks. Sure, it's not the best job, but it sure beats cleaning up.
String.Dest: 佐拉让我去分发饮料。当然，这不是最好的活计，不过至少比收拾残局强。

String.Source: Enjoy the party. Drink up! You deserve it.
String.Dest: 好好享受这场宴会。干杯！这是你应得的。
